member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.DefaultOwner
member.summary: Gets a ldLocationDefault value indicating whether the default setting for a new record's owner location (unless otherwise specified) should be the assignee, or the assignee's organization.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.DefaultStore
member.summary: Gets or sets the ElectronicStore object which is the default Document Store for this Database.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.DefaultStoreForConsignmentApprovals
member.summary: Gets or sets the TRIM ElectronicStore object which will be used as a default for storing all consignment approval documentation

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.DeleteEmailCaptureDuplicates
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value to determine whether a captured email that is a copy of an email filed by a user should be deleted.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.DocumentSecurity
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether records with a higher Security Profile than the Current User should not available for document operations (view, edit, etc). Only relevant if the DataSecurity property is false. The value of this property is true by default.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.DocumentSingleInstancing
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether the storage system will do single instancing for documents that are no email messages

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.DocumentsOnlyWithinFolders
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether records that behave as documents may only be contained within records that behave as a container. It prevents a document from being directly filed under a classification. by default.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.EmailActivitySupervisors
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean parameter indicating whether the supervisor of an activity should be added to the cc list for any email notifications sent out regarding that activity.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.EmailExpandOrganisations
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean parameter indicating that when sending an email to an activity assignee, if the assignee is an organization, expand the organization to include members of the organization

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.EmailSecurity
member.summary: Gets or sets an emailSecurityMode enumeration value indicating whether email should be annotated with standard security annotations

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.EmailSubjectPrefix
member.summary: Gets or sets a string value specifying a subject prefix to place on any email message that has been catalogued into %R_TRIM%.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.EmlAttachmentSingleInstancing
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether the storage system extracts attachments from EML email messages, single instancing them separately and replace the embedded attachment with a store item reference

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.EnableScheduledTasks
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether Vital Record review tasks should be created. Corresponds to the Vital Records product feature.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.EndOfDay
member.summary: Gets or sets an integer containing the number of seconds since midnight indicating the time the working day usually ends. This is used to calculate the timing of Record Action Tracking and Workflows.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.EnsureUniqueEmails
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether email addresses are unique

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.EstoreMailAddress
member.summary: Gets or sets a Location to whom an email notification should be sent in the event of a Document Store reaching its set capacity, or a percentage of total capacity

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.FailedAutoClassifyClassification
member.summary: Gets or sets a classification object representing the default classification for records that fail auto-classification.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.FDA21CFR11compliant
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether certain features of Content Manager should work in compliance with the US FDA 21 CFR 11 standard.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.FileIntoClosedContainers
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean parameter indicating whether non-administrative users are allowed to put records into closed containers.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.FilterClassifications
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether classification plan levels that are of a higher security level than the user should not be displayed to the user in a classification list.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.FilterClassificationsByCopyACL
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean parameter indicating if classifications should be hidden from classification lists when users are not included in the default record access control list, irrespective of the copy style

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.GenerateAddAuditSummary
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether a detailed summary should be generated for Object Added events in Audit Logs

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.GenerateDeleteAuditSummary
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether a detailed summary should be generated for Object Removed events in Audit Logs

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.GenerateModifyAuditSummary
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether a detailed summary should be generated for Object Modified events in Audit Logs

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.GlobalTimezone
member.summary: Gets or sets a number indicating a global timezone as seconds after GMT. This timezone is used when determining if a formatted number needs to be reset at the end of a year.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.GoogleKey
member.summary: Gets or sets your organization's Google license key.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.HideClassificationNumbers
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether the display of Classification numbers will be limited in this database. That is, whether the Classification Number component for any records created using a Classification Plan should be hidden from users or not.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.HideCustomRecordTypes
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether custom record types (those with a non-blank RecordType.ExternalId property) should be hidden from users of standard Content Manager client applications

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.HideSQLFromClients
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean parameter indicating if SQL should be hidden from client interfaces. This affects the content of error messages produced by the server and also turns off client side SQL logging

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the Database id for this Database. Setting this property will make a connection to the specified database.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.IdolSearchStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets a idolSearchStyles enum value indicating extended usage of the content search engine

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.IgnoreAccentsInWordIndexes
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value to indicate whether TRIM should ignore accents on characters when word indexing text containing them. If enabled, words containing accents are treated identically to the same word spelt without access on any characters.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.IgnoreStaleUpdates
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether updates will be processed regardless of whether the data being used for the update is out of date.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.IncludeLargeTextUpdatesInLogs
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether full details of additions and changes to large text fields should be included in audit logs

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.InsecureContainer
member.summary: Gets or sets a csContainerSecurityHandling enum value indicating the desired behavior when placing a record in a container with a lower security profile than the record.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.InsecureCurrent
member.summary: Gets or sets a geGeneralExceptionHandling enum value indicating whether changing a record's assignee, home or owner location to a location with a lower security profile than the record should be prevented, ignored, or initiate a warning message.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.IsConnected
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether there is currently a connection to this Database object.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.IsDefault
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether this Database is the default database for this user.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.IsValid
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether this Database is valid. This property indicates if the Database is in a valid state to be used, and should be queried prior to connecting to the database. If the query indicates the database is invalid the Database.ErrorMessage property is populated with a description of the problem.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.JitcCompliant
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether user permissions and functionality specific to US DoD (United States Department of Defense) 5015.2 compliance should be enforced.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.LastDayInFiscalMonth
member.summary: Gets or sets a day of the month value to endicate which day of the month (as indicated LastMonthInFiscalYear) is the end of the financial year for the default locale that this database will operate in.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.LastMonthInFiscalYear
member.summary: Gets or sets a months enumerated value indicate which month is the last month of the financial year for the default locale that this database will operate in

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.LicenceeName
member.summary: Gets a string containing the name of the Content Manager license holder.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.LicenseMailAddress
member.summary: Gets or sets the Location to whom an email notification should be sent in the event of a Content Manager licensing breach or if the license nearing its limit

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.LocationCacheSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the default size for the caching of locations in the Content Manager business object cache.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.LocationFormatShowHonorific
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether any title (honorific) belonging to the person should be displayed for 'Person' type locations.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.LocationFormatShowInitials
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether the initials should be displayed rather than first names for 'Person' type locations.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.LocationFormatShowPostNominal
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether any suffix (post-nominal) belonging to the person should be displayed for 'Person' type locations.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.LocationFormatSurnameFirst
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether the last name should be displayed before the first name or initials for 'Person' type locations.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.LockdownSettings
member.summary: Gets or sets an lkLockdownStyles enum value indicating the type of lock down to apply to this database. This feature affects how users may use or modify Global Settings, making it possible to force users to use Global Settings. The values are 'lkNormal' (No lock down - Users can get global settings, and are also allowed to modify settings), 'lkSessionLock' (Session Lock down - Users can modify settings but the new settings are not retained past the current logged-on session) and 'lkTotalLock' (Lock down - Users are not allowed to change any settings, they must use the global settings).

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.LogStorageTransfers
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether to create an audit log entry whenever a document is transferred to a different storage device

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.LogWebServiceLogins
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether an event should be created when a user logs in or out using a web service.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.MailRecipientMustExist
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether recipients from an email message will be added as contacts in Content Manager. Recipient must exist as a Location to be attached to the Record

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.MailRecipientsAsContacts
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether all the recipients from an email message being cataloged as a Content Manager Record should be created as contacts in Content Manager and attached to the Record. Note: Recipients in the 'bcc' field will not be captured.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.MatterRecordAccessReferenced
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether the client record provides access control and security references to all records within a matter

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.MinimumThesaurusLevels
member.summary: Gets or sets an integer indicating the minimum number of required Thesaurus Terms when titling records by Thesaurus in this Database.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.ModifyLogsPreviousValues
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether previous values of properties should be displayed in the Audit Log for Object Modified events

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.MyContainersLimit
member.summary: Gets or sets a number that limits how many containers are kept in the 'Containers' tray

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.Name
member.summary: Gets a string containing the name of this Database object.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.NeedLongevityRenditionToArchive
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether archiving is prevented for records that do not have a longevity rendition.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.NENcompliant
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether certain features of Content Manager (in particular in the management of location information) should work in compliance with the Dutch NEN1888 standard.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.NotifyAssignedAction
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether an email notification should be sent to all responsible locations when an Action is first assigned to a record.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.NotifyAutomaticUserRegistrations
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean parameter to indicate whether an email message should be sent when a new user is automatically registered by the Content Manager Workgroup Server

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.NotifyDocumentReviewEvents
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating that email messages should be sent to editors, reviewers or authorizers when relevant events occur

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.NotifyNextAction
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether an email notification should be sent to the responsible location when an Action is ready to commence or has been reassigned (responsible location has changed).

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.NotifyOverdueAction
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether an email notification should be sent to the responsible location in the event of an Action becoming overdue.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.NotifyOverdueReturn
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether an email notification should be sent to the assignee location in the event of the Record Return Date becoming overdue.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.NotifyRecordRequest
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether an email notification or Digest should be sent to the service location in the event of a new Record Request.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.NotifyRequestsAwaitingAcknowledgement
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether an email notification should be sent to a requestor when a request is waiting for an acknowledgement of delivery.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.NotifyTodoItems
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether reminder email notifications should be sent regarding outstanding todo items.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.NotifyUserOptionChanges
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether changes to a user's preferred options should be notified to all machines on the network

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.NotifyWorkflowMail
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether an email notification should be sent to the responsible location when an event occurs in a Workflow Activity. The detailed settings are applied in the workflow definition itself.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.ObjectCacheSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the default size for the caching of objects in the Content Manager business object cache.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.ObjectURLFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets an ouObjectUrlFormats enum value indicating which web-based product the URL should be formatted to work with, when embedding URLs in reference files.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.OnlyEmailTRIMRefsToTRIMUsers
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether Content Manager Record References will only be sent to locations that can log in to Content Manager. Any addressee locations that are not able to log in to this database will be sent an email without the Record Reference, but the actual document attached.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.OtherBarcode
member.summary: Gets or sets a bpBarcodePrintOption enum value indicating which function should occur when printing barcodes for non-record objects (for example, Locations). The values are 'bpInternal' (Print Content Manager Barcode) which utilizes the Content Manager internal barcode and the foreign barcode to be retained, 'bpInternalClear' (Print Content Manager Barcode, Clear Any Foreign Barcode) which utilizes the Content Manager internal barcode and removes the foreign barcode upon printing, or 'bpExternal' (Print Foreign Barcode, if it exists) which utilizes the foreign barcode rather than the Content Manager internal barcode.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.OwnerFromContainer
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether the default owner of a new record (unless otherwise specified) should be determined from the owner location of its container, if it has a container record.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.PaperFoldersBypassRecordTypeRestriction
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether Paper Folder records ignore the 'Restrict To Record Type'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.PrefetchForeignBarcodes
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean parameter to indicate whether foreign barcodes are prefetched when prefetching TRIM objects into the client side object cache.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.PreventDuplicatedDocuments
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether TRIM should prevent users from storing duplicate documents (requeires Document Hashing feature to be enabled

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.PreventDuplicatedMailMessages
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether TRIM should prevent users from storing duplicate mail messages

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.PreventZeroByteFiles
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating that files that are 0 bytes in length should not be allowed to be added to the repository.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.ReadOnly
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating whether this database is in a read-only state and cannot be updated.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.RecentDocumentsLimit
member.summary: Gets or sets a number that limits how many documents are kept in the '%E_tt_documents%' view

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.RecordAssigneeDefault
member.summary: Gets a CurrLocDef enum value indicating whether the default setting for a new record's assignee location (unless otherwise specified) should be the current user (that is, the user who is logged on and creating the new record), the current user's position, or the current user's organization.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.RecordBarcode
member.summary: Gets or sets a bpBarcodePrintOption enum value indicating which function should occur when printing barcodes for records. The values are 'bpInternal' (Print Content Manager Barcode) which utilizes the Content Manager internal barcode and allows the foreign barcode to be retained, 'bpInternalClear' (Print Content Manager Barcode, Clear Any Foreign Barcode) which utilizes the Content Manager Context internal barcode and removes the foreign barcode upon printing, or 'bpExternal' (Print Foreign Barcode, if it exists) which utilizes the foreign barcode rather than the Content Manager internal barcode.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.RecordCacheSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the default size for the caching of records in the Content Manager business object cache.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.RecordOwnersInAuditLog
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether the owner of a record should appear in the offline audit log when displaying events for records

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.RelaxedActionDates
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether actions may be added to a record with a starting date earlier than the due date of existing actions already attached to the record. If true, it means that more than one action may simultaneously be active for a record. The only restriction is that the starting date of new Procedures added to the record must not be earlier than the starting date of the first (earliest starting) action on the record.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.RelaxedDates
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether chronological discrepancies in date checking should be ignored or not. That is, whether date comparisons between Date Registered, Date Created, Date Closed, Last Action Date and Retention Review Date fields should be suppressed during record creation and modification.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.ReportAddInMemoryLeaks
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating if TRIM should prompt when external add-ins create memory leaks.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.RescheduleActionsIfFinishEarly
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether subsequent actions should be automatically rescheduled when an action is completed early.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.RescheduleActionsIfFinishLate
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether subsequent actions should be automatically rescheduled when an action is completed late.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.RmTerminology
member.summary: Gets or sets a rmTerminologyType enum value indicating which style of captioning to use for records management concepts

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.SaveTransparentRedactions
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether, upon creating a redaction from an original record, a transparent form of the redaction should be saved as a rendition of the original record.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.ScanEmailForSecurityMarkings
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean parameter indicating if the subject of email messages should be scanned for a security level, eg [SEC=TOP SECRET]

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.SchemaVersion
member.summary: Gets an integer containing the version number of the Database schema.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.SecurityMailAddress
member.summary: Gets or sets the Location to whom an email notification should be sent in the event of a Security Breach. A Security Breach occurs when a record is moved to a location of a lower security profile than its own security profile.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.ServerDocumentCacheSize
member.summary: Gets or sets a number indicating how many megabytes to reserve for a document cache for an SDK-based service application.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.ServiceLocationCacheSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the default size for the caching of locations in the Content Manager business object cache, when the cache is inside a service program.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.ServiceObjectCacheSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the default size for the caching of objects in the Content Manager business object cache, when the cache is inside a service program.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.ServiceRecordCacheSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the default size for the caching of records in the Content Manager business object cache, when the cache is inside a service program.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.ShredderDelete
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether a 'Shredder Delete' should be used for electronic documents. With this option set to true, electronic documents that are deleted from this database are not only deleted but also overwritten with nonsense characters. This means that nobody with third party 'unerase' software will be able to read what was deleted on the hard-drive.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.SignatureHashingAlgorithm
member.summary: Gets or sets a haHashingAlgorithm enum value indicating the type of Signature Hashing Algorithm to be used for encrypting message digests. The values are 'haSha': Secure Hash Algorithm (default) or 'haMd5': Message Digest 5.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.SiteId
member.summary: Gets a string containing a unique identifier for the customer site which this database belongs to.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.StartOfDay
member.summary: Gets or sets an integer containing the number of seconds since midnight indicating the time the working day usually starts. This is used to calculate the timing of Record Action Tracking and Workflows.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.StatisticsDst
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether to adjust the statisticsTimeZone for daylight saving changes

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.StatisticsTimeZone
member.summary: Gets or sets a string value indicating the time zone to be used when calculating time based statistics.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.StorageHashCheck
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether TRIM should perform a hash check to verify the safe transfer of documents from the workgroup to the final storage destination

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.StoreAutoClassifyNotes
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether auto-classification details are being stored on the notes of a record

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.StoreDocumentHashes
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether document hashes should be stored for latest document revisions

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.StrictCount
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean parameter indicating if counts displayed for search results should include all security filtering.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.SuppressAutoProfile
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether automatic profiling of a record from its document profile should be suppressed in this database. With this option set to true the user will not be able to extract any profiling information for new documents - it thus may be used to prevent unreliable summary data being used to populate fields in Content Manager.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.SuppressWarningsForClosedContainers
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean parameter indicating whether to suppress warning when users put records into closed containers.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.SurnamePrefixNotInSort
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether a location's last name prefix will not impact its sort order. That is, if true, a location with Surname 'van Garderen' will be sorted by 'G' rather than 'v'. If false, the location will be sorted under 'v'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.TitleAndNotesEvents
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether to generate record title and notes events (if not, presumes that the Content Index will be used for these type of searches)

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.TNAcompliant
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether certain features of Content Manager should work in compliance with the UK National Archives standard.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.TransferHashCheck
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether TRIM should perform a hash check to verify the safe transfer of documents from a client to a server

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.UnambiguousDateDisplay
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether the dates should be displayed in reports with unambiguous day/month value

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.UpdateCommentsAreMandatory
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether audit comments are mandatory whgen using the update comment facility

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.UseClientDocumentCache
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value to determine whether TRIM clients will cache any documents added or extracted to TRIM. The client cache can speed up operations in many desktop editing situations.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.UseServerDocumentCache
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value to determine whether SDK=based service applications will cache any documents added or extracted from the dataset.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.UseServiceAPIUIinOfficeAddin
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether to use the serviceAPI UI components instead of the SDK.NET UI components in the Office addin

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.UsingStoredProcedures
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether Stored Procedures are used in this database. A Stored Procedure is a set procedure that will be run by the database software when a field is accessed in Content Manager.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.WarnWhenChangeDispositionOfRelated
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether a warning should be displayed upon removing or changing the disposition of a record if it is related to other records.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.WebServerURL
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the URL (Universal Resource Locator) where the Web Server for this database may be found, if a Context ICE Server is being used.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.WorkgroupServerName
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the name of the Workgroup Server on which this database will be found. This property is only used when making an connection - if the database is already connected, it will have no effect.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.WorkgroupServerPort
member.summary: Gets or sets a number value to indicate which RCF port to use to connect to the nominated Content Manager Workgroup Server. Note that this will only be used if you specify a value for workgroupServerName.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.WorkgroupServerURL
member.summary: Gets or sets the URL used to connect to the Content Manager Workgroup Server. The URL is in the format {protocol}://{machine}:{port}. Protocol and port components are optional and will default to TCP and 1137, respectively.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.IsOwningReference
member.summary: Returns true if the Database object is an owning reference. Owning references must be manually disposed, by calling Dispose (). If the Database object is not an owning reference, the object can be safely discarded without calling Dispose ().

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor for the Trim Database object

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.Connect
member.summary: Establishes a connection to a particular TRIM database for the given user.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.Disconnect
member.summary: Disconnects the current user from the SDK server. Call this function when the database connection is no longer required, to decrease the reference count. When all user references have been removed, the SDK server will shut down

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.SaveCaptions
member.summary: Any changes made to the default captions for objects and properties are held in memory. This method will make these changes permanent and apply them to all users of this database.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.IsModuleLicensed(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.LicenseTypes)
member.summary: Determines if the specified module is in the current TRIM license - see also IsProductFeatureLicenced, IsProductFeatureActivated.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.IsProductFeatureLicensed(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ProductFeatures)
member.summary: Determines if the specified TRIM product feature is licensed in this TRIM installation.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.IsProductFeatureActivated(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ProductFeatures)
member.summary: Determines if the specified TRIM product feature has been activated in this TRIM installation.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.ConnectAs(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Emulates the user of the nominated Windows UserName and Password for any subsequent database activity

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.SetTimezone(System.Int32)
member.summary: Primarily used by a service program satisfying a remote client. Allows you to specify a different timezone to the timezone on the machine that is running the SDK. Consider using the SetTimezoneString function instead, as it supports daylight saving

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.GetTimezone
member.summary: Primarily used by a service program satisfying a remote client. Allows you to see the timezone that has been set on the database - this may be different to the timezone of the machine that is running the SDK.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.SetTimezoneString(System.String)
member.summary: Primarily used by a service program satisfying a remote client. Allows you to specify a different timezone to the timezone on the machine that is running the SDK. Uses the standard windows timezone string to specify a timezone, which supports daylight saving times, and is therefore preferable to using the basic GMT offset approach.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.GetTimezoneString
member.summary: Primarily used by a service program satisfying a remote client. Allows you to see the timezone that has been set on the database - this may be different to the timezone of the machine that is running the SDK.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.SetTimezone(System.TimeZoneInfo)
member.summary: Primarily used by a service program satisfying a remote client. Allows you to specify a different timezone to the timezone on the machine that is running the SDK. Need to have called SetAsService or SetAsWebService prior to calling this function.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.SetStrictRecordNumbers(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Turns off the TRIM feature that finds the first part of a container, if the part suffix was not specified. For example if the feature is not turned off, passing the record number 'G05/1' to the GetRecord method will also look for the record 'G05/1-01' if no record 'G05/1' exists.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.SetClassificationTopLevelNumbering(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Allows you to set the numbering pattern and last number for the numbering of top level classification

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.BeginTrans(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a broader user-defined transaction allowing you to co-ordinate the saving of a number of TRIM objects. This transaction must execute either a CommitTrans or RollbackTrans before the database can be closed.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.CommitTrans
member.summary: Commits the current user-defined transaction as created using the BeginTrans method.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.RollbackTrans
member.summary: Rolls out changes done within the current user-defined transaction as created by the BeginTrans method.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.SpawnImpersonatedDatabase(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a copy of the this database that simulates a login by a different user

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.GetTRIMFolder(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.TrimPathType,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets the name of the nominated TRIM special folder

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.GetTRIMFileName(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.TrimPathType,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets the name of the nominated TRIM special folder

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.RunEventStatistics(System.String,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.TrimDateTime,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.TrimDateTime,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates an output file (.html or .csv) containing statistics related to events recieved by the TRIM event processor

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.RunRecordCreationStatistics(System.String,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.TrimDateTime,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.TrimDateTime,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.PrimaryRecordStatisticsGrouping,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.LocationGrouping,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.StatisticalDateRangeTypes,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Creates an output file (.html or .csv) containing statistics related to how many records were created divided into specified sub-categories

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.RefreshCache
member.summary: Clears the entire TRIM object cache, for this dataset.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.RefreshCache(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.BaseObjectTypes,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.TrimURI)
member.summary: Clears the object of the nominated uri and object type from the cache. If a 0 is passed for the uri parameter, all objects of the type specified are cleared from the cache. If Unknown is passed for objectType, the entire cache is cleared.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.Save
member.summary: Permanently commits all changes made to this database properties.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.AllowAccessFromMultipleThreads
member.summary: Indicates whether the developer has provided thread protection such that calls can be made to a database object from a different thread to that which created it.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.UsingInternetContentSearchStyle
member.summary: Indicates whether the content search string format is the ISYS 'Internet Style' or the older format ISYS search.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.LogExternalEvent(System.String,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.BaseObjectTypes,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.TrimURI,System.Boolean)
member.summary: This function allows you to create an external event which will be passed through to the event processor. An option also exists to make the retrieve the label that represents one of the special type of "Favorites" currently available for Records.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.TrustedUser
member.summary: Instruct TRIM to connect using the supplied user name, rather than the user name of the currently logged in process. This will fail if the connection is not being made by a trusted account name in the TRIM network (see TRIM Enterprise Studio - Miscellaneous).

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.ClientIPConnectionType
member.summary: Gets an IpConnectionType enum value indicating how the client is connecting to the machine running the SDK

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.ClientIPAddress
member.summary: Gets or sets the IP address of the client machine that this database is servicing. This is only relevant for web applications where the connection is being made from a remote browser. This IP address is available in audit logs - web browser developers should set this for a more comprehensive audit trail.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.IsSingleHopClient
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating that the SDK connection is being made from the same machine that is running the client application. Basically, a thick client.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.AuthenticationMethod
member.summary: Gets or sets the authentication method to be used when making the database connection

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.SetAuthenticationCredentials(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Provides credentials for use with the specified Authentication method. Currently only used by the ExplicitWindows authentication method

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.UpdateUserTrays

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.RelaxBusinessRulesForConversion
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean indicating whether certain business rules should be relaxed to assist in certain conversion scenarios. This should only be used when running a data conversion and requires administrator privileges.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.RelaxBusinessRulesForPerformance
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean indicating whether certain business rules should be relaxed to improve performance. This turns off a number of duplicate tests and should only be used when running a data conversion and requires administrator privileges.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.BusyThreadId
member.summary: Gets the id of the thread that is currently using this database for work. Mostly useful for diagnosing multi-threaded issues.

member.summary: Clears expired TrimMainObjectSearch search state held by this Database object.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database.Ping(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Checks the network connection to see if the workgroup is available. THere is also an option to test if the connection from the workgroup to the DBMS is alive. If it fails, extra information on the error can be found in the ErrorMessage property

This has been done for changes in the size of the collection but not when one of the elements of the collection is modified as it is a bit tricky to detect unmanaged code that modifies the collection under our feet.

member.name: T:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.DatasetConfiguration

member.name: T:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.DesktopHelper

member.summary: Gets or sets a string indicating a preference for a particular database.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.DesktopHelper.PreferredWorkgroup
member.summary: Gets or sets a string indicating a preference for a particular workgroup.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.DesktopHelper.PreferredPort
member.summary: Gets or sets a number indicating the preferred port number to use when connecting to a particular workgroup.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.DesktopHelper.LaunchDesktop(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.DesktopStartStates)
member.summary: Launches the TRIM Desktop executable, starting up with the specified startup window

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.DesktopHelper.AutoStartWorkgroup
member.summary: Sets a boolean variable to indicate whether an attempt should be made to automatically start a local workgroup if it in not currently running on the local machine.

member.name: T:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.DocumentQueue
member.summary: Defines a location for electronic documents that are to be transferred into Content Manager

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.DocumentQueue.AllowAutomaticProcessing
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether automatic processing of this Document Queue is allowed. If true, the Document Queue Processor program (TRIMQueue.exe) will automatically process any documents upon being placed in the Document Queue folder.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.DocumentQueue.AutoViewDocuments
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether documents from this Document Queue should be automatically displayed to the user once selected in the list of queued documents.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.DocumentQueue.CheckLinks
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether a check for internal (compound) OLE links to other documents should be carried out. This option operates independently from the 'User Options - General tab - Ignore linked documents when checking in a document' option.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.DocumentQueue.Classification
member.summary: Gets or sets the default classification that should be used to classify records created from this Document Queue.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.DocumentQueue.ConfirmCheckIn
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether the check in of each document should be confirmed by the user through a dialog. If false, the 'Check In' dialog box will be bypassed.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.DocumentQueue.Container
member.summary: Gets or sets the default container record that should be used to contain records created from this Document Queue. This container can be used to synchronize the contents of your Windows folder with Content Manager.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.DocumentQueue.DisplayEntryForm
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether the entry form should be displayed when creating new records from this Document Queue. If false, the entry form may still be displayed, if there are mandatory data entry fields for the record that are not able to be populated by details of the document; if not, then it will be bypassed.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.DocumentQueue.DocumentUpdateStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets a documentUpdateStyles enum value indicating what to do with a document after it has been processed by the document queue processor. Only applicable for a document queue based on files within a windows file system.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.DocumentQueue.EmailUpdateStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets a emailUpdateStyles enum value indicating what to do with an email message after it has been processed by the document queue processor. Only applicable for a document queue that is based on email items.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.DocumentQueue.IgnoreOriginals
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether only 'Draft' and 'Modified' Electronic Documents (i.e. only documents that have been checked out of Content Manager) should be checked in from this Document Queue. This will have the effect of ignoring any documents that have not been cataloged in Content Manager.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.DocumentQueue.LastProcessed
member.summary: Gets the date this Document Queue was last processed.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.DocumentQueue.Location
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the file path to the document queue.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.DocumentQueue.LocationDisplay
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing a readable display name for the location that is to be processed by this document queue.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.DocumentQueue.Machine
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the machine name where the directory for this Document Queue is located. Having a value indicates that the queue can only be accessed from this machine. If blank, this Document Queue has a generic directory path and may be used by anyone.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.DocumentQueue.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the name of the Document Queue represented by this DocumentQueue object.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.DocumentQueue.QueueType
member.summary: Gets or sets a qtQueueTypes enum value indicating the type of this Document Queue. It may be a Windows folder, Notes folder, FTP directory, MAPI folder, Outlook folder, or a temporary file list.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.DocumentQueue.RecordType
member.summary: Gets or sets the default record type that should be used when creating new Records from documents in this Document Queue.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.DocumentQueue.SelectFilter
member.summary: Gets or sets a string listing file extensions of documents from this Document Queue to be processed, with file extensions delimited by semicolons. The document queue will be restricted to listing documents that match these extensions. If this string is empty, the Document Queue will process all files not excluded by the File Type Filters.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.DocumentQueue.ShowBinaryFiles
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether the Document Queue should allow processing of Binary Files (i.e. application files such as those with extension '.exe', '.dll', '.obj'). If set to false these files will not be listed in the Queue.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.DocumentQueue.ShowHiddenFiles
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether the Document Queue should allow processing of hidden files (i.e. files that are hidden by the operating system). If set to false these files will not be listed in the Queue.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.DocumentQueue.ShowReferenceFiles
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether the Document Queue should allow processing of Content Manager Reference Files (i.e. files with a '.tr5' extension which link to objects in a Content Manager dataset). If set to false these files will not be listed in the Queue.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.DocumentQueue.ShowRenditions
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether the DocumentQueue should allow processing of Rendition Files (i.e. alternative copies of documents in different formats such as those with extensions defined as renditions in Content Manager Enterprise Manager). If set to false these files will not be listed in the Queue.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.DocumentQueue.ShowSystemFiles
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether the Document Queue should allow processing of system files (i.e. files that are used by the operating system). If set to false these files will not be listed in the Queue.

member.name: F:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.DocumentSecurityHandling.Prevent
member.summary: Prevent Document from being placed in Container

member.name: F:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.DocumentUpdateStyles.KeepCheckedOut
member.summary: Check document out of Content Manager

member.summary: Internal SDK class. Should not be instantiated by SDK users. See the DownloadNotifier class instead.

member.summary: Documents|Defaults when a document is dropped onto Content Manager (DroppedFilesUserOptions)

member.summary: Constructor for the DroppedFilesUserOptions option set.

member.summary: Constructor for the DroppedFoldersUserOptions option set.

member.name: T:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore
member.summary: Defines settings for a place to store electronic documents

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.AlertLevel
member.summary: Gets or sets an integer indicating the percentage of total capacity at which users should be alerted of the storage level reached.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.AutnGroup
member.summary: Gets or sets a string value indicating the AUTN_GROUP property for a IDOL CFS Connector based store. This allows a TRIM store to use distributed IDOL CFS

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.BytesRemaining
member.summary: Gets a number value indicating the actual amount of space currently availablefor this store.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.BytesUsed
member.summary: Gets a number value indicating the actual amount of space currently used for this store.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.Capacity
member.summary: Gets or sets an integer containing the maximum capacity of the Document Store (bytes).

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.Compress
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether items to be stored in this document store should be compressed.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.DefaultAccessDate
member.summary: Gets or sets a datetime value which is used as the lastAccessedDate for an item if there is no other record of a last accessed date. Used when access date logging has been implemented part way through a store implementation, also when not logging access dates during the add operation.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.DeleteRetriesQueued
member.summary: Gets a number indicating the number of delete requests that have not yet been successfully processed.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.DeploymentStatus
member.summary: Gets or sets a storeStatus enum value to indicate the availability of this document store.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.Encrypt
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether items to be stored in this document store should be encrypted.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.ExternalConfig
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing configuration information for an external store.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.ExternalProgId
member.summary: Gets or sets a COM ProgID for the external store component.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.FilesPerFolder
member.summary: Gets or sets an integer containing the maximum number of files per subdirectory in the store. A new subdirectory within the store will be created when this maximum is reached. Setting the value of this property will automatically set the ElectronicStore.MaxMBsInDir property to '0'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.InPool
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value to indicate whether this store in part of the default storage pool.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.KeepAccessDates
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether a last accessed date should be maintained for documents held within this store.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.LoginName
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the User name for connecting to the Store, if this Document Store is an External or FTP Store.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.LoginPassword
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the password used in connecting to the Store, if this Document Store is an External or FTP Store.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.MaxFolderSize
member.summary: Gets or sets an number indicating the maximum size of each subdirectory in the store, in bytes. A new subdirectory within the store will be created when this maximum is reached.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the name of this Document Store.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.Path
member.summary: Gets a string containing the full path to the directory where this Document Store is located. The electronic documents are kept in subdirectories of this location. A string containing the path to the base directory of the Document Store is held in the ElectronicStore.DbPath property.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.SecCompliant
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether this store implements SEC compliance rules.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.StorageTier
member.summary: Gets or sets a TieredStorageType enumeration value indicating the storage tier that this document store belongs to.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.StoreLocation
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the path to the base directory within which the subdirectory named after the database id which in turn contains the folder for this Document Store is located. The electronic documents are kept in subdirectories of the document store folder. Note: If connected to a network, this string must be set to the string path of a a network share. If not connected to a network, a local path must be used.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.StoreType
member.summary: Gets an esEstoreTypes enum value indicating what type of document store it is.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.UpdateAccessDateOnAdd
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether a last accessed date should be set for a document at the time the document is added to this store.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.WriteProtected
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether this Document Store should be designated read only. Use the DeploymentStatus property for version 7.2 or later.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.EnumItem.Name
member.summary: Returns a string containing the internal (uncaptioned) name for this e enumeration at the specified index of the collection.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.EnumItem.IsValid
member.summary: Gets an boolean value indicating whether this EnumItem is actually valid.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.EnumItem.Caption
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the caption for this item. Note that to set a caption, this object must have been constructed with a valid Database parameter. To make caption changes permanent, call the SaveCaptionChanges method of the database

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.EnumItem.Icon
member.summary: Gets the identifier of the TRIM icon associated with this enumerated item value.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.EnumItem.HasBeenCustomised
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating whether the caption of this EnumItem has been customized by the user.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.EnumItem.IsACustomValue
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating whether this item is a value that requires customisation.

members.member: Note that the IEnumerator documentation requires an InvalidOperationException to be thrown whenever the collection is modified. This has been done for changes in the size of the collection but not when one of the elements of the collection is modified as it is a bit tricky to detect unmanaged code that modifies the collection under our feet.

Note that the IEnumerator documentation requires an InvalidOperationException to be thrown whenever the collection is modified. member.name: T:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.EsoDateType
member.summary: Electronic Inactive Record Selection Date Types

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.EventMonitor.#ctor(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database,System.Int32)
member.summary: Setup an ApiEventMonitor object with a current database handle and a timer value in milliseconds that regulates how often counter data is checked for. The database handle should have 'AllowAccessFromMultipleThreads' set to true, otherwise it will attempt to enabled it.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.EventMonitor.GetAvailableProcessors
member.summary: Gets a list of event processor types that can be polled for counters. Only those event processors that are enabled, or in a suspended state will be returned. Any event processors that are disabled will be omitted from the list.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.EventMonitor.Initialise
member.summary: Initialise the session prior to setting up the event processors we want to gather data on. This returns a GUID or token which uniquely identifies this session. A session will have a limited lifetime. The token is used to gather data for as long as the session is alive. Once the session has expired, this method must be called again to generate a new token. The token can be stored externally and used to revitalise sessions between invocations of ApiEventMonitor objects (see SetToken()). Will return an empty string if it fails.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.EventMonitor.Initialise(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.EventProcessTypeList)
member.summary: If an existing token is passed to Initialise() as an argument, and the object belonging to the token still exists, the session can continue, otherwise a new monitor object will be initialised and the new token will be returned.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.EventMonitor.Token
member.summary: Get the current token for this session. The value can be saved and used at a later date to revitalise sessions if they are still running on the remote server.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.EventMonitor.setToken(System.String)
member.summary: If a previous token has been saved, use this method to re-initialise the session. If the session is still alive on the remote server, returns true. It is not necessary to call Initialise() if this method returns true.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.EventMonitor.EnableCounters
member.summary: Enable all the available event processors for data gathering. An available event processor is one that is active, or in the suspended state. Disabled event processors are ignored.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.EventMonitor.EnableCounters(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.EventProcessType)
member.summary: Enable the specific event processor for data gathering. The processor type must be enabled on the remote server, otherwise a false value will be returned

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.EventMonitor.EnableCounters(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.EventProcessTypeList)
member.summary: Enable the list of event processors for data gathering. All the processor types must be enabled on the remote server, otherwise a false value will be returned

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.EventMonitor.GetEnabledCounters
member.summary: Return the list of event processors that have data gathering enabled

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.EventMonitor.DisableCounters
member.summary: Disable all event processors that are currently enabled. Returns true if any counters were disabled

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.EventMonitor.DisableCounters(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.EventProcessType)
member.summary: Disable the event processor type supplied. Returns true if successful

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.EventMonitor.DisableCounters(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.EventProcessTypeList)
member.summary: Disable the list of event processors supplied. Returns true if all were successfully disabled

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.EventMonitor.IsAlive
member.summary: Determines if the Event Monitor object on the server is still viable based on the token for this object. If the workgroup server is restarted, then the current token will be invalid and this method will return false. It is then necessary to reinitialise the session using Initialise() which will return a new token. This method should be called prior to calling GetResults()..

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.EventMonitor.GetResults(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.EventProcessType)
member.summary: Return the locally cached counters of results from the last poll of the workgroup server. A call to GetResults() should always be preceded by a call to IsAlive() to ensure that the remote Event Monitor Object is still active, otherwise no results will be available.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.EventMonitor.setRefreshInterval(System.Int32)
member.summary: Set the interval (in milliseconds) between polling for new counter values. There is a strict minimum value of 1000 milliseconds which overrides the value passed in, as well as the registry setting for the minimum which can be configured by administrators (HKLM\SOFTWARE\Hewlett-Packard\HP TRIM\SDK\EventMonitorMinimumRefreshTime). If the registry value has been set, then this will override the value of the argument value (if it is less than the registry value).

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.EventMonitor.RefreshInterval
member.summary: Get the value of the refresh interval (in milliseconds)

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.EventProcessorCounters.EventType
member.summary: The type of event processor under consideration

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.EventProcessorCounters.ProcessorStatus
member.summary: The status of the event processor (suspended or active)

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.EventProcessorCounters.ProcessedEvents
member.summary: Get the number of events that have been successfully processed

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.EventProcessorCounters.FailedEvents
member.summary: Get the number of failed events

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.EventProcessorCounters.TimerEvents
member.summary: Get the number of timer events

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.EventProcessorCounters.TimerFailedEvents
member.summary: Get the number of timer events that have failed
