member.name: T:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ExtractDocument
member.summary: A helper class that encapsulates the process of extracting a document attached to a Trim object.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ExtractDocument.FileName
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the file name to be given to the document of this Extract Document when extracted. The directory to which it should be extracted is passed as a parameter of the 'DoExtract' method.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ExtractDocument.FileType
member.summary: Gets a string containing the file extension of the electronic document corresponding to this ExtractDocument object.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ExtractDocument.FileSize
member.summary: Gets an integer containing the size of the electronic document corresponding to this ExtractDocument in bytes.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ExtractDocument.FileDateTimeModified
member.summary: Gets the date and time the electronic document corresponding to this ExtractDocument was last modified.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ExtractDocument.ForWebBrowserViewing
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether extracting this ExtractDocument will retrieve a 'browser friendly' version. That is, whether it is the type of document that may be viewed within a web browser.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ExtractDocument.ConvertToHTML
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether to convert the document to HTML

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ExtractDocument.HasOleLinks
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether the electronic document corresponding to this Extract Document contains OLE links to other documents.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ExtractDocument.ConvertToZipIfHasOleLinks
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether the electronic document should be converted to ZIP format if it contains OLE links to other documents.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ExtractDocument.IsTRIMMail
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether the electronic document corresponding to this Extract Document is a TRIM mail message

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ExtractDocument.CheckoutAs
member.summary: Gets or sets a string that will be remembered by HP TRIM as the checkout path of the electronic document.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ExtractDocument.HighlightWords
member.summary: Gets or sets a string which contains a specification of which words to highlight when preparing an HTML format. The string is a comma delimited list of words.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ExtractDocument.HighlightForegroundColour
member.summary: Gets or sets the value of the foreground colour used to highlight words. The value should be a hexadecimal representation of the standard RGB values used in HTML markup. For example, the colour red would be FF0000 and black would be 000000.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ExtractDocument.HighlightBackgroundColour
member.summary: Gets or sets the value of the background colour used to highlight words. The value should be a hexadecimal representation of the standard RGB values used in HTML markup. For example, the colour red would be FF0000 and black would be 000000.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ExtractDocument.HTMLHeader
member.summary: Gets or sets a string which contains HTML that will be placed at the start of the HTML file created when using the ConvertToHTML/ForWebBrowserViewing options.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ExtractDocument.HTMLFooter
member.summary: Gets or sets a string which contains HTML that will be placed at the end of the HTML file created when using the ConvertToHTML/ForWebBrowserViewing options.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ExtractDocument.SuppressLastAction
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean property which indicates that the extract operation should not update the LastActionDate of a record.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ExtractDocument.DoExtract(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Extracts the document to the specified windows folder, giving it the name as specified by the FileName property. If the FileName property is blank, a temporary file will be created. After extraction, the FileName property will be updated to contained the full file name of the extracted file. If there is any failure in the extraction, e.g. could not convert to HTML, the FileName property will set be blank and the ErrorMessage property will explain what went wrong.

member.name: T:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition
member.summary: Defines characteristics of a user-defined metadata element that can be used to supplement standard Content Manager data elements for some objects

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.Abbreviation
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing an abbreviation for the user field corresponding to this FieldDefinition object.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.CurrencySymbol
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the currency symbol to be used for fields of type currency. Leave blank to use the default currency symbol of the dataset.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.DateTimeIsUTC
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether date time values should be entered, displayed and searched as if they are UTC values rather than local time.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.DefaultBoolean
member.summary: Gets the default boolean value for this user field, if it is a boolean user field. This FieldDefinition object is a boolean user field if the property FieldDefinition.Format has the value 'ufBoolean'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.DefaultCurrency
member.summary: Gets the default currency value for this user field, if it is a currency user field. This FieldDefinition object is a currency user field if the property FieldDefinition.Format has the value 'ufCurrency'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.DefaultDate
member.summary: Gets the default date or datetime value for this user field, if it is a date or datetime user field. This FieldDefinition object is an date user field if the property FieldDefinition.Format has the value 'ufDate', and a datetime user field if FieldDefinition.Format has the value 'ufDateTime'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.DefaultDecimal
member.summary: Gets the default decimal value for this user field, if it is a decimal user field. This FieldDefinition object is a decimal user field if the property FieldDefinition.Format has the value 'ufDecimal'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.DefaultDisplay
member.summary: Gets a string representation of the default value of the user field corresponding to this FieldDefinition object in a format that is suitable for display purposes, e.g. with leading zeroes cut off.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.DefaultInternal
member.summary: Gets a string representation of the default value of the user field corresponding to this FieldDefinition object in the same format as it is stored in the database.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.DefaultNumber
member.summary: Gets the default integer value for this user field, if it is an integer user field. This FieldDefinition object is an integer user field if the property FieldDefinition.Format has the value 'ufNumber'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.DefaultString
member.summary: Gets the default string value for this user field, if it is a string or text user field. This FieldDefinition object is a string user field if the property FieldDefinition.Format has the value 'ufString', and a text user field if FieldDefinition.Format has the value 'ufText'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.ExternalId
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the External Identification Number for the user field corresponding to this FieldDefinition object. This identifier cannot be changed through the Content Manager user interface and so guarantees your program a reliable handle to the user field aside from the URI.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.Format
member.summary: Gets or sets a ufUserFieldFormats enum value indicating the format of the user field corresponding to this FieldDefinition object. The user field may be used to store boolean, currency, date, date and time, decimal, Content Manager object (currently restricted to Content Manager location), string or text values.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.IconId
member.summary: Gets or sets an Icons enumeration value to associate a standard Content Manager icon with this user field.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.InIDOLtext
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether this user-defined field has been configured to include the value in the IDOL text indexing group.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.IsSearchable
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean property indicating if this field should be included in the IDOL metadata schema when indexing records within IDOL.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.IsUsedBy
member.summary: Gets a string listing the objects using this user field in Content Manager. Does not include record types.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.IsUsedByRecordTypes
member.summary: Gets a string listing the record types using this user field in Content Manager.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.IsVisible
member.summary: Gets the visible state of this field for the current user.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.Length
member.summary: Gets or sets an integer containing the maximum number of characters allowed in this user field, if it is a string user field. The value of this property may not exceed 255 characters.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.LocationRestriction
member.summary: Gets or sets a Location Field Type enumeration value indicating, for a field of format 'object (location)', whether internal or external locations are suitable

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.LookupSet
member.summary: Gets or sets a LookupSet object used to contain a set of acceptable string values for this user field, if it is a string or text user field.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.LowerLimit
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the lower limit, or minimum value of this user field.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.Mask
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing an edit mask to be used for this user field, if this is a string user field. The mask is a combination of normal characters with the special characters 'N,A,X,Z,\'used to restrict the format of any string entered for this field. See the Content Manager Help File for more information on the edit mask format.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the name of the user field corresponding to this FieldDefinition object.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.ObjectType
member.summary: Gets or sets a BaseObjectTypes enum value indicating the Content Manager object type of the user field, if it is an object user field.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.PluginId
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the PROGID of an COM component implementing the validation function, if this is a string user field using a COM component for validation.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.SapKeySetField
member.summary: Gets or sets a string value that maps this user defined field to one of the fields in the SAP Keys extended metadata interface provided by the ArchiveLink Content Server.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.SearchClause
member.summary: Gets a string representing a user-specified clause name for this user field.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.SearchClauseCaption
member.summary: Gets a string representing a user-friendly version of the the search clause name used for this user field.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.SearchClauseName
member.summary: Gets a string representing the string to use when composing a search involving this user field.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.UpperLimit
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the upper limit, or maximum value of this user field.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.IsUsedFor(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.TrimObject)
member.summary: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether this user defined field is used for the nominated TrimObject.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.IsUsedForAny(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.BaseObjectTypes)
member.summary: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether this user defined field is used for the objects (or any subcategory of objects) of the nominated TRIM object type.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.SetIsUsedFor(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.TrimObject,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds or removes this user field from the list of user fields for the nominated Base Object (and hence all other objects of the same type category). For example, if the nominated base object is an organization, then this method will set this user field's usage for all organization Locations.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.SetIsUsedFor(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.BaseObjectTypes,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds or removes this user field from the list of user fields for the nominated Base Object Type. You cannot use this form to turn usage on for records or Locations, since these object types have a further condition that is used to determine if a field is applicable.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.SetIsUsedForRecord(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds or removes this user field from the list of user fields for the nominated Record Type.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.SetIsUsedForLocation(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.LocationType,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds or removes this user field from the list of user fields for the nominated Location Type.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.IsMandatory(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.TrimObject)
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating if the property or field is mandatory (cannot have an empty/null value) for the supplied TRIM object.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.SetValidLocationType(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.LocationType,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets which type of location is valid for this user field (if it is a field of type 'Object (Location)'

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.IsLocationTypeValid(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.LocationType)
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating if this field definition will accept a location of the specified type.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.FindFieldBySearchClauseName(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.BaseObjectTypes,System.String)
member.summary: A static method used to find a field definition that has a search clause name corresponding to the supplied string.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.DefaultValue
member.summary: Gets or sets the default value for the user defined field corresponding to this FieldDefinition object.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.CanSearch(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.BaseObjectTypes,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating if this field definition can be used for a search for items of the specified type.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.CanSort(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.BaseObjectTypes)
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating if this field definition can be used for sorting a search for items of the specified type.

member.name: T:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.FormDefinition
member.summary: This class defines a generic layout of a data entry form that can be used to drive a web-based data entry application

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.FormDefinition.#ctor(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.BaseObjectTypes)
member.summary: Constructs the form definition for the specified object type. Do not use this form for records or locations

member.summary: Constructs the form definition for the specified object type. Do not use this form for records or locations. Allows you to use a formType specifier that may result in a simpler form in some circumstances (for example, a formType of 1 for CheckinStyle provides the simpler email link style form)

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.FormDefinition.#ctor(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.TrimObject,System.Int32)
member.summary: Constructs the form that is used for editing the supplied object. Allows you to use a formType specifier that may result in a simpler form in some circumstances (for example, a formType of 1 for CheckinStyle provides the simpler email link style form)

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.FormDefinition.PageCount
member.summary: destructor Gets the number of pages currently on this form

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.FormDefinition.GetPage(System.UInt32)

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.FormDefinition.DeleteAllPages

member.summary: Saves this form definition back to the database to be used as the default form definition whenever requiring to edit the object type specified in the form constructor. Do not use this call when working with the form property of a record type, for record type set the RecordPropertiesFormDefinition property

member.name: F:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.GeographySearchType.NearCoordinate
member.summary: Within vicinity of a specific GPS co-ordinate

member.name: T:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.History
member.summary: Stores historical information about events that have happened to Records, primarily for audit purposes

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.History.Activity
member.summary: Gets the Activity object to which the event associated with this History object occurred.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.History.ClientIPAddress
member.summary: Gets a string value indicating the IP address of the client used to originate the event.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.History.ConnectionIPAddress
member.summary: Gets a string value indicating the IP address of computer where the event originated.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.History.DoneOn
member.summary: Gets the date the audit event corresponding to this History object occurred.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.History.DoneOnGMT
member.summary: Gets the date the audit event corresponding to this History object occurred adjusted to GMT time.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.History.DoneOnLocal
member.summary: Gets the date the audit event corresponding to this History object occurred adjusted tothe local time of the originator of the event.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.History.DoneOnMachine
member.summary: Gets a string value indicating the name of the computer where the event originated.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.History.EventDescription
member.summary: Gets a string containing a full description of the audit event corresponding to this History object. It consists of the event type, details of what actually took place at this specific event, and the performing location together with the date and time at which the event occurred.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.History.EventObject
member.summary: Gets the URI of the target object of this event

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.History.EventType
member.summary: Gets a HistoryTypes enum value indicating the type of audit event represented by this History object. Applies only for Records. History objects are only created for audit events of the types enabled on the Record Type Properties - Audit tab.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.History.ForObjectType
member.summary: Gets the uri of the object to which the event associated with this History object occurred.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.History.ForObjectUri
member.summary: Gets the uri of the object to which the event associated with this History object occurred.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.History.IsSecurityViolation
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether a security violation has been detected.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.History.Location
member.summary: Gets the Location object to which the event associated with this History object occurred.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.History.Login
member.summary: Gets a string containing the network login of the location by whom the audit event corresponding to this History object was performed.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.History.LoginLocation
member.summary: Gets the Location object by whom the audit event corresponding to this History object was performed.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.History.MovementLocation
member.summary: Gets the target Location of the event corresponding to this History event. For 'Assignee Changed', for example, this property holds the Location the record was moved to; for 'Contact Added', this property holds the contact Location that was added. If this event does not involve a target Location, for example, 'Document Removed', this property has a null value.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.History.OtherEventType
member.summary: Gets a events enum value indicating the type of audit event represented by this History object. This value only applies for non-record objects that are being audited.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.History.RawEventDescription
member.summary: Gets a string containing a description of what actually took place at the audit event corresponding to this History object. For a full description which includes also the event type, performing location and the date and time of the event.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.History.Record
member.summary: Gets the Record object to which the event associated with this History object occurred.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.History.TextSummary
member.summary: Gets an text string that provides a detailed summary of the event - only applicable for the created/modified events

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.History.UpdateComments
member.summary: Gets a string value indicating any comments provided with the object modified event

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.History.Workflow
member.summary: Gets the Workflow to which the event associated with this History object occurred.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.History.XmlSummary
member.summary: Gets an XML-formatted string that provides a detailed summary of the event - only applicable for the created/modified events

member.name: T:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Hold
member.summary: Describes a restriction that may be could be applied to one or more Records, usually related to ongoing legal action

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Hold.AffectsDispositionOnly
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether this Hold only affects disposition changes for the record. That is, when a Hold with this property set to true is applied to a record, a user may not change the disposition of the record, nor delete it or any attached electronic document. The record will be available for other modifications, however. If the property is set to false then only the assignee field can be changed for the period of the hold.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Hold.Contact
member.summary: Gets or sets a Location object which is the nominated contact location for the Hold.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Hold.ExternalId
member.summary: Gets or sets a string value indicating the name of an external system that has created this hold. External holds require special permissions to be removed from records.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Hold.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the name of this Hold object.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Hold.SearchCriteria
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing a record search string used to identify records selected for this hold..

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Hold.SearchLastRunOn
member.summary: Gets or sets a datetime which indicates when a search for records was last executed for this hold.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Hold.AddRecords(System.String)
member.summary: Adds a set of records to this hold. Provides an efficient way for adding multiple records to a hold. Returns the number of records that were added to the hold (the ErrorMessage property will contain an information message describing this in more detail).

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Hold.RemoveRecords(System.String)
member.summary: Removes a set of records from this hold. Provides an efficient way for removing multiple records from a hold. Returns the number of records that were removed from the hold (the ErrorMessage property will contain an information message describing this in more detail).

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Hold.RemoveAllRecords
member.summary: Removes all records from this hold. Provides an efficient way for removing all records from a hold. Returns the number of records that were removed from the hold (the ErrorMessage property will contain an information message describing this in more detail).

member.name: T:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.HtmlLayout
member.summary: A template used in determining the format of a web publication

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.HtmlLayout.Extension
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the file extension of the web page template, for example 'html'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.HtmlLayout.ForType
member.summary: Gets or sets a baseObjectTypes enum value indicating the type of object this web page template has been designed for.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.HtmlLayout.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the name of the web page template represented by this HTML Layout object.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.HtmlLayout.Template
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the source text of this web page template.

member.summary: Display property as an icon only

member.summary: Display property as an icon and text

member.summary: Icon to appear on a heading of a column

member.summary: Icon to appear together with a caption for the property

member.summary: Icon to appear with the value of a property

member.summary: Document Content, Record Titles and Record Notes

member.name: T:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.InputDocument
member.summary: A helper class that encapsulates a document that is to be attached to a TRIM object.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.InputDocument.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Constructs an input document based on the nominated operating system file name.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.InputDocument.#ctor(System.String,System.String,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.TrimDateTime,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.TrimDateTime,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Constructs an input document based on an email message.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.InputDocument.#ctor(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore,System.String,System.Int64,System.String)
member.summary: Constructs an input document corresponding to a pre-existing item in an external store. Note that this does not allow multiple references to a single stored item - TRIM does not support single instancing in this way.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.InputDocument.#ctor(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.OfflineRecord,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Constructs an input document corresponding to an item in the TRIM offline records folder.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.InputDocument.Name
member.summary: Gets a string containing a descriptive title for this InputDocument object.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.InputDocument.IsMailMessage
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether this InputDocument is a mail message

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.InputDocument.TimesAreUniversal
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether the times of the 'SentDate' and 'ReceivedDate' properties of this InputDocument are based on Universal Time Coordinates / Greenwich Mean Time.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.InputDocument.Subject
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the subject of the mail message, if this InputDocument is a mail message.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.InputDocument.MessageId
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the unique message id of the mail message, if this InputDocument is a mail message.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.InputDocument.ConversationId
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the conversation id of the mail message, if this InputDocument is a mail message.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.InputDocument.Content
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the body (main content) of the mail message, if this InputDocument is a mail message

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.InputDocument.SentDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the date the mail message was sent, if this InputDocument is a mail message

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.InputDocument.ReceivedDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the date this mail message was received, if this InputDocument is a mail message

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.InputDocument.NativeMailFile
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the file path to the native mail file for this mail message, if this InputDocument is a mail message.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.InputDocument.AddAttachment(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds the nominated file as an attachment of the mail message of this Input Document, if it is a mail message.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.InputDocument.AddAttachment(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.EmailAttachment)
member.summary: Adds the attachment object as an attachment of the mail message of this Input Document,

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.InputDocument.GetAttachments
member.summary: Gets all the attachments associated with this InputDocument

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.InputDocument.HasAttachments
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether the email message has attachments. If you are passing a native email file such as .msg or .eml, this allows you to indicate the email has attachments without having to extract them and pass them into AddAttachment

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.InputDocument.AddRecipient(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.MailRecipientType,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds the person described by the nominated email address and display name to the 'To', 'Cc' or 'Bcc' field of the mail message, if this InputDocument is a mail message.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.InputDocument.AddRecipient(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.MailRecipientType,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.EmailParticipant)
member.summary: Adds the person described by the EmailParticipant object to the 'To' , 'Cc' or 'Bcc' field of the mail message, if this InputDocument is a mail message.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.InputDocument.GetRecipients(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.MailRecipientType)
member.summary: Gets the author iof this email message as an EmailParticipant object

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.InputDocument.SetAuthor(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sets the person described by the nominated email address and display name as the Author of the mail message, if this InputDocument is a mail message.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.InputDocument.SetAuthor(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.EmailParticipant)
member.summary: Sets the person described by the nominated EmailParticipant as the Author of the mail message, if this InputDocument is a mail message.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.InputDocument.GetAuthor
member.summary: Gets the author iof this email message as an EmailParticipant object

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.InputDocument.CleanupMailFiles
member.summary: Removes all attachment and native mail message files, as well as any temporary file associated with this InputDocument from the hard disk.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.InputDocument.IsAlreadyInStore
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating whether this inputDocument represents an item that has already stored in a TRIM document store. Note that this does not allow multiple references to a single item - TRIM does not support single instancing in this way.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.InputDocument.AlreadyInStoreUri
member.summary: Gets a Int64 value indicating the URI of the store that this input document is already stored in. Only relevant if IsAlreadyInStore is true.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.InputDocument.AlreadyInStoreID
member.summary: Gets a String value indicating the store ID that this input document is already stored as. Only relevant if IsAlreadyInStore is true.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.InputDocument.AlreadyInStoreExtension
member.summary: Gets a String value indicating the extension of an "already stored" item. Only relevant if IsAlreadyInStore is true.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.InputDocument.AlreadyInStoreSize
member.summary: Gets an Int64 value indicating the size (in bytes) of an "already stored" item. Only relevant if IsAlreadyInStore is true.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.InputDocument.OfflineRecord
member.summary: Gets the Offline Record object associated with this document.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.InputDocument.IsOfflineRecord
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating whether this document is an Offline Record.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.InputDocument.CheckinAs
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the checkin path as it is to be remembered in HP TRIM.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.InputDocument.UpdateOfflineRecord
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether the offline record should be updated or removed as part of the check in process

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.InputDocument.LocalFile
member.summary: Gets a string containing the path to the document corresponding to this Input Document. If this InputDocument is a mail message, this is the path to the .vmbx file created through this InputDocument object.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.InputDocument.SetAsFile(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the Input Document to correspond to the document at the nominated file path

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.InputDocument.SetAsMailMessage(System.String,System.String,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.TrimDateTime,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.TrimDateTime)
member.summary: Sets the Input Document to be of a TRIM mail message format (a .vmbx file). The supplied parameters should match the original email message fields and will be used in this Input Document object.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.InputDocument.SetAsMailMessage
member.summary: Sets the Input Document to be of a TRIM mail message format (a .vmbx file). The various fields of the original email message should be copied to the corresponding fields on this Input Document object.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.InputDocument.SetAsAlreadyStoredItem(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore,System.String,System.Int64,System.String)
member.summary: Sets the Input Document to correspond to a document that has already been stored in a TRIM document store. Note that this does not allow multiple references to a single stored item - TRIM does not support single instancing in this way.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.InputDocument.SetAsOfflineRecord(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.OfflineRecord,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the InputDocument from an Offline Record

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.InputDocument.VerificationHash
member.summary: Gets or sets a 64-byte MD5 hash of the document that can be used for end to end verification. When the document is submitted to the record this hash will be checked for validity, allowing an end-to-end verification mechanism to be established. For compatibility, you can calculated this hash using the Database.CalculateDocumentHash function.

members.member: Note that the IEnumerator documentation requires an InvalidOperationException to be thrown whenever the collection is modified. This has been done for changes in the size of the collection but not when one of the elements of the collection is modified as it is a bit tricky to detect unmanaged code that modifies the collection under our feet.

member.name: T:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Jurisdiction
member.summary: A jurisdiction is a legal entity that has the power to compel an organization to retain its records in a particular manner

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Jurisdiction.Comments
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing comments for this Jurisdiction.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Jurisdiction.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing a description of the Jurisdiction.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Jurisdiction.JurisdictionType
member.summary: Gets or sets a jurisdictionTypes enumeration value which determines what type of jurisidiction this is.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Jurisdiction.Members
member.summary: Gets or sets a string describing all of the member %bs_jurisdiction% of this %b_jurisdiction%.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Jurisdiction.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the abbreviation for this Jurisdiction

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Jurisdiction.ChildMembers
member.summary: Get the list of Member Jurisdictions

member.name: T:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.JurisdictionMember
member.summary: Represents a Jurisdiction which is a member of the parent Jurisdiction

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.JurisdictionMember.Jurisdiction
member.summary: Gets the jurisdiction for the member of this group jurisdiction.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.JurisdictionMembers.getItem(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Gets the item in this child list at the nominated index.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.JurisdictionMembers.Parent
member.summary: Gets the parent object of this child object collection

member.name: F:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.JurisdictionPurposes.ScheduleKeepForeverList
member.summary: Add to the 'Keep Forever' Jurisdiction list

member.name: T:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Keyword
member.summary: An individual term within the Content Manager thesaurus, used to provide a controlled terminology with which to index Records

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Keyword.HasRelatedKeywords
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether this Thesaurus Term has any 'krRelatedTo' type relationship with any other Thesaurus Terms.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Keyword.IdentificationNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets a string which uniquely identifies this Thesaurus Term.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Keyword.IsAPrimaryTerm
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether this Thesaurus Term is a Primary Term. A Primary Term is a term which is used at the beginning of Record Titles.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Keyword.IsForbidden
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether this Thesaurus Term is forbidden. A forbidden term cannot be applied to a record. Use the Keywords.SelectByUseTerms method to find the term to use instead.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Keyword.IsNodeLabel
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether this Thesaurus Term is a Node-label Term. A Node-label Term may be used to classify groups of terms but can not be applied to records.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Keyword.IsPrompt
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether this Thesaurus Term is a Prompt Term. A Prompt Term allows the user to add free text in square brackets after the Thesaurus Term.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Keyword.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the keyword. This is the string that is used in the generatedTitle when titling a Record by Thesaurus titling.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Keyword.Source
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the source authority of this Thesaurus Term. This may indicate, for example, the publisher of a Thesaurus Term imported from a standard set of terms used by the organization.

member.name: F:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.LayoutPurpose.Publish
member.summary: For Publishing a Content Manager Object Type

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.LocaleUserOptions.#ctor(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database)
member.summary: Constructor for the LocaleUserOptions option set.

member.name: T:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location
member.summary: The Location object is the second most important object in the HP Records Object Model. It is used to record the various relationships between people and places and records. There are many types of locations as indicated by the TypeOfLocation enumeration

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.ActualBarcode
member.summary: Gets a string containing the internal Content Manager Barcode of this Location.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.AdditionalLogin
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the additional Network Login by which this location may log in to the Content Manager Dataset.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.Administrator
member.summary: Gets the Location for which this Location holds a relationship of type 'Administered By'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.AfterHoursPhoneNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the home number of this Location.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.AllAdministrators
member.summary: Gets a string listing all locations that are administrators of this location.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.AllMembers
member.summary: Gets a string listing all locations that are members of this location.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.AllMemberships
member.summary: Gets a string listing all locations that this location is a member of.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.AllMembershipsRecursive
member.summary: Gets a string listing all locations that this location is a member of, and all locations that those locations are a member of, etc).

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.CanDeliverDirect
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean property indicating whether delivery requests can be handled by direct delivery to the request location, rather than via a transit location

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.CanLogin
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether this Location can log in to the Content Manager Context Dataset.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.Committee
member.summary: Gets the Location of Location Type 'Committee' for which this Location holds a relationship of type 'Member Of'. If there is more than one, it returns the Location designated as the default committee. Use the Location.AddRelationship method to create relationships between Locations, through which this property may be set.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.CutoffTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the time of day (in seconds past midnight) at which requests are cut-off and must be processed the following day.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.DateOfBirth
member.summary: Gets or sets the date of birth of this Location.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.DefaultJurisdiction
member.summary: Gets or sets the default jurisdiction of this location. A location can either have a default jurisdiction or a default jurisdiction group.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.DeliverContainersOnly
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean property indicating whether deliver requests are only support for container records (folders and boxes) rather than individual documents.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.DeliveryLocation
member.summary: Gets a location property which represents the location for staging pickup/delivery requests

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.EmailAddress
member.summary: Gets a string containing the email address of this Location. If there is more than one email address in the Electronic Addresses for this location, the default email address is returned. If there is no default, the latest added email address is returned.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.FaxNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the fax number of this Location.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.ForeignBarcode
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing an external system's Barcode for this Location.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.FormalPreamble
member.summary: Gets a string containing a form of this Location's name to be used in formal correspondence, to complete the salutation: 'Dear ...'. An example formal preamble could be: 'Mr. Abbott', so that the salutation becomes: 'Dear Mr. Abbott'. Note: This property is set automatically by Content Manager. For the title to be included in the formal preamble you must ensure the 'Display any Title' option is checked in Tools - System Options - Locations.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.FormattedAddress
member.summary: Gets a string containing the formatted address of this Location. This is by default the postal address of the location if there is one, otherwise the street address. It contains the country name in ISO format.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.FormattedName
member.summary: Gets a string containing the Display Name of this Location. The format of the Display Name is dependent on the system settings for 'Display and Reporting Format for names of People' under Tools - Content Manager Administration - System Options - Locations Tab.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.FullFormattedName
member.summary: Gets a string containing the Full Description of this Location. The Full Description consists of the Location's organization and Display Name. The Display Name is contained alone in the property Location.FormattedName

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.GenderValue
member.summary: Gets or sets a gnGender enum value indicating the gender of this Location.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.GivenNames
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the given names of this Location.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.GpsLocation
member.summary: Gets or sets a geography value representing the GPS reference point for this location

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.HasAValidLogin
member.summary: Gets a boolean property indicating whether this location has a valid login.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.HoldingOrganizationName
member.summary: Gets a string representing the name of the holding organization for this location. This is based on the default parent organization if it exists.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.HomeDataset
member.summary: Gets or sets a string value indicating, for a visitor login, the id of the dataset that is the home dataset that the visitor normally works with.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.Honorific
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the title of this Location (for example, Mr., Ms., Dr. etc).

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.IdNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the unique ID number for this Location

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.InformalPreamble
member.summary: Gets a string containing a form of this Location's name to be used in informal correspondence, to complete the salutation: 'Dear ...'. An example informal preamble could be: 'Peter', so that the salutation becomes: 'Dear Peter'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.Initials
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the full set of initials of this Location.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.InternetMailAddress
member.summary: Gets a string containing the email address of this Location which is of email Type 'Internet'. If there is more than one Internet email address in the Electronic Addresses for this location, the default Internet email address is returned. If there is no default, the latest added Internet email address is returned. Create a new LocEAddress child object of EAddress Type 'etEAdressType.etMail' and SubType 'SMTP' to add a new Internet email address for this Location.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.IsVisitor
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating if this user is a visitor login from the same managed service provider.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.IsWithin
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether this Location is internal.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.JobDescription
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the Job Title of this Location (for example, Chief Executive Officer).

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.KeepAddressHistory
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether a history of address changes for this Location should be kept. When the Address History is enabled, modifying an existing LocAddress will cause a new LocAddress child object containing the old address to be automatically created and set to inactive. The LocAddress object that was modified contains the new address and remains active.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.LdapSynchDN
member.summary: Gets or sets the LDAP Distinguished Name associated with this locations (used for LDAP Synchronization)

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.LdapSynchEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether LDAP synchronization is enabled for this location.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.LdapSynchLastUpdated
member.summary: Gets or sets a datetime value indicating when this location was last updated by the LDAP Synchronization tool.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.LoginDetails
member.summary: Gets a string containing the login details for this Location including 'login enabled' status and user type. The format of the string varies according to various circumstances of the location.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.LoginExpires
member.summary: Gets or sets the date the login for this Location will expire, if it is a time limited login.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.LogsInAs
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the Network Login by which this Location may log in to the Content Manager Dataset.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.LongHonorific
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the longer form of the title of this Location (for example, Mister ).

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.MobileNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the mobile number of this Location.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.NickName
member.summary: Gets or sets the string containing the unique name or abbreviation of this Location.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.OldPostalAddresses
member.summary: Gets a string containing all previous mailing addresses of this location.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.OldPostalAddressesISO
member.summary: Gets a string containing all previous mailing addresses of this location in ISO format.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.OldStreetAddresses
member.summary: Gets a string containing all previous street addresses of this location.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.OldStreetAddressesISO
member.summary: Gets a string containing all previous street addresses of this location in ISO format.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.PhoneNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the main telephone number of this Location. Mobile, fax and home telephone numbers are held in the mobileNo, faxNo and ahPhoneNo properties, respectively.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.Position
member.summary: Gets the Location of Location Type 'Position' for which this Location holds a relationship of type 'Member Of'. If there is more than one, it returns the Location designated as the default position. Use the Location.AddRelationship method to create relationships between Locations, through which this property may be set.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.PostalAddress
member.summary: Gets a string containing the formatted postal address of this location.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.PostNominal
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the suffix of this Location (for example, BA, PhD etc).

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.ProjectTeam
member.summary: Gets the Location of Location Type 'Project Team' for which this Location holds a relationship of type 'Member Of'. If there is more than one, it returns the Location designated as the default project team. Use the Location.AddRelationship method to create relationships between Locations, through which this property may be set.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.ProviderContainer
member.summary: Gets or sets a Record Container which will be used when automatically capturing electronic activity log files from storage providers.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.ProviderLogRecordType
member.summary: Gets or sets a Record Type which will be used when automatically capturing electronic activity log files from storage providers.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.RequestResponseHigh
member.summary: Gets or sets the time interval (in seconds) allowed for servicing of high priority requests.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.RequestResponseLow
member.summary: Gets or sets the time interval (in seconds) allowed for servicing of low priority requests.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.RequestResponseMedium
member.summary: Gets or sets the time interval (in seconds) allowed for servicing of medium priority requests.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.RequestsNeedApproval
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean property indicating whether requests for records that are located at this location (home) need to be approved by a Request administrator.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.ReviewDate
member.summary: Gets the date this Location's settings are due to be reviewed (for example, when a Temporary Staff Member is due to leave the organization).

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.Salutation
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing a custom greeting by which this Location is to be addressed in correspondence. For example:'Dear President'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.SecurityKeys
member.summary: Gets a comma-separated string listing a set of record viewing access keys held by this user.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.SecurityString
member.summary: Gets or sets a string listing the security level and security caveats assigned to this Location, delimited by commas ','. The first element listed is always the security level, followed by the caveats.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.SortName
member.summary: Gets or sets the string containing the sort name of this Location. This is the name that appears in the Locations List Pane.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.StreetAddress
member.summary: Gets a string containing the formatted street address of this location.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.Supervisor
member.summary: Gets the Location for which this Location holds a relationship of type 'Supervised By'. Use the Location.AddRelationship method to create relationships between Locations, through which this property may be set.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.Surname
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the full surname (including any prefix) of this Location.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.SurnameNoPrefix
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the non prefix part of the surname of this Location. For example 'Garderen' is the non prefix part of the full surname 'van Garderen'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.SurnamePrefix
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the prefix part of the surname of this Location. For example 'van' is the prefix part of the full surname 'van Garderen'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.TypeOfLocation
member.summary: Gets or sets the enum value containing the location type of this Location, for example: Person.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.Unit
member.summary: Gets the Location of Location Type 'organization' for which this Location holds a relationship of type 'Member Of'. If there is more than one, it returns the Location designated as the default organization.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.UseAddressOf
member.summary: Gets or sets a pre-existing Location from whom this Location's Street and Mailing Addresses are copied.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.UsedForStatistics
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether this location is to be used for aggregating statistics.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.UseProfileOf
member.summary: Gets or sets a pre-existing internal Location from whom this Location's Security and Access Permission Details are copied and set.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.UserLicenseType
member.summary: Gets ane enumerated value which determines which of the license seat counts is consumed by this user.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.UserType
member.summary: Gets or sets a utUserTypes value which determines the access permissions of this Location.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.ViewPaneId
member.summary: Gets a string containing the View Pane ID of this Location. This is used by Content Manager as a key for storing which fields are displayed in the Locations List Window for this Location.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.WebPage
member.summary: Gets a string containing the web page URL of this Location. If there is more than one web page in the Electronic Addresses for this location, the default web page is returned. If there is no default, the latest added web page is returned.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.Workgroup
member.summary: Gets the Location of Location Type 'Workgroup' for which this Location holds a relationship of type 'Member Of'. If there is more than one, it returns the Location designated as the default workgroup. Use the Location.AddRelationship method to create relationships between Locations, through which this property may be set.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.ChildAddresses
member.summary: Get the list of Physical Addresses

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.ChildEAddresses
member.summary: Get the list of Electronic Addresses

member.summary: Add a relationship to the location

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.RemoveRelationship(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.LocRelationshipType)
member.summary: Remove a specific relationship with the specified location

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.RemoveRelationship(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location)
member.summary: Remove all relationships with the specified location

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.HasPermission(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.UserPermissions)
member.summary: Flag to indicate whether the permission is valid

member.summary: Flag to indicate whether there is a relationship

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.DataEntryFormDefinition
member.summary: Get the xml data entry definition. This will be obsoleted shortly, use the FormDefinition property instead

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location.FindLocationByLDAPDN(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database,System.String)
member.summary: A static function to find a location with the supplied LDAP distinguished name

member.name: F:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.LocationAccess.ManageGroupItems
member.summary: Manage Group Items (User Labels, Check In Styles,...)

member.name: T:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.LocationAddress
member.summary: A physical address (ie street / post office box, etc) associated with the parent Location

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.LocationAddress.AddressLines
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the house number and street name of this LocAddress.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.LocationAddress.AddressType
member.summary: Gets or sets a atAddressType enum value indicating the Address Type of this LocAddress. For example, 'atStreet' or 'atPostal'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.LocationAddress.City
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the city of this LocAddress (this property was used to contain the suburb in an older version of Content Manager).

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.LocationAddress.Country
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the country for this address.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.LocationAddress.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the full Address of this locAddress; including house number and street name ('AddressLines' property), city ('Suburb' property), state ('State' property) and postcode ('Postcode' property).

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.LocationAddress.IsCurrent
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether this LocAddress is the current address for the Location.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.LocationAddress.Postcode
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the postcode for this LocAddress.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.LocationAddress.Region
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the region for this LocAddress

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.LocationAddress.State
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the state for this LocAddress.

member.name: T:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.LocationAddresses
member.summary: A collection of physical addresses associated with a location

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.LocationAddresses.getItem(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Gets the item in this child list at the nominated index.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.LocationAddresses.New
member.summary: Initialises a new object of this child object collection

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.LocationAddresses.Parent
member.summary: Gets the parent object of this child object collection

member.name: T:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.LocationEAddress
member.summary: The LocEAddress object is a child object of the Location object. Once initialized, it represents one of the electronic objects associated with its parent Location object. This may be a photo, web or email address

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.LocationEAddress.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets a string corresponding to the Display Name field of the Electronic Address.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.LocationEAddress.ElectronicAddressData
member.summary: Gets or sets the electronic address data for this LocEAddress. For example, the string contains the Web Page URL if the electronic address is a WebPage, the file path (set) or Electronic Store Reference (get) for the image file if the electronic address is a signature or an image, or the email address if the electronic address is an email.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.LocationEAddress.ElectronicAddressType
member.summary: Gets or sets an etEAddressType enum value indicating the Electronic Address Type of this LocEAddress. For example etMail(email), etUrl(Web Page), etRdn (Signature) and etImage (Image).

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.LocationEAddress.EmailAddressTypeString
member.summary: Gets or sets the email Address Type of this LocEAddress, if it is an email. The valid string values are: 'SMTP' (Internet), 'MS' (Microsoft Mail Server for PC), 'CCMAIL' (Lotus cc:Mail), 'NGW' (GroupWise), 'EX' (Microsoft Exchange), 'NOTES' (Lotus Notes), and 'UNKNOWN' (Unknown).

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.LocationEAddress.EStore
member.summary: Gets an ElectronicStore object which is the Electronic Store where this LocEAddress is kept, if the LocEAddress is an image or a signature.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.LocationEAddress.EStoreId
member.summary: Gets a string containing the ID of the Electronic Store where this LocEAddress is kept, if the LocEAddress is an image or a signature.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.LocationEAddress.IsPreferred
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether this LocEAddress is the preferred (default) Electronic Address of the Location.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.LocationEAddress.Name
member.summary: Gets a string corresponding to the Details field of the Electronic Address.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.LocationEAddress.SetEmailAddress(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sets up this LocEAddress object as an email LocEAddress of the nominated email address, name and type (as used in MAPI systems).

member.name: T:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.LocationEAddresses
member.summary: A collection of electronic addresses associated with a location

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.LocationEAddresses.getItem(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Gets the item in this child list at the nominated index.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.LocationEAddresses.New
member.summary: Initialises a new object of this child object collection

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.LocationEAddresses.Parent
member.summary: Gets the parent object of this child object collection

members.member: Note that the IEnumerator documentation requires an InvalidOperationException to be thrown whenever the collection is modified. This has been done for changes in the size of the collection but not when one of the elements of the collection is modified as it is a bit tricky to detect unmanaged code that modifies the collection under our feet.

member.name: F:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.LocationMatchType.MustMatch
member.summary: Must match - never create a new Location

member.summary: Session Lock Down - Users can modify settings but they are not retained

member.name: T:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.MailTemplate
member.summary: A mail template is designed to allow mail messages sent by Content Manager to be customized

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.MailTemplate.AttachReference
member.summary: Gets (or sets) a boolean value to indicate whether a Content Manager reference for the relevant object should be attached to the mail message when it is sent.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.MailTemplate.ContentTemplate
member.summary: Gets (or sets) the actual text to be provided for the content of the generated email message, containing any special substitution strings that will be replaced by details extracted from the relevant object or proposed recipient

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.MailTemplate.ForEventType
member.summary: Gets (or sets) the event type that this template will be used for

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.MailTemplate.ForPropertyId
member.summary: Gets (or sets) a unique property identification number that can be used to further differentiate which objects should use this template

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.MailTemplate.ForRecipientPropertyId
member.summary: Gets (or sets) a unique property identification number that can be used to further identify whether the template should be applied, based on the recipient

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.MailTemplate.ForRecipientUserDefinedField
member.summary: Gets (or sets) a user-defined field that can be used to further identify whether the template should be applied, based on the recipient

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.MailTemplate.ForRecipientWithValue
member.summary: Gets (or sets) the actual value of the property/user-defined field that will be used to distinguish whether this template should be used in for a particular recipient

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.MailTemplate.ForUserDefinedField
member.summary: Gets (or sets) a user-defined field that can be used to further differentiate which objects should use this template. Is mutually exclusive with 'forPropertyId'

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.MailTemplate.Name
member.summary: Gets (or sets) the unique name for this mail template

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.MailTemplate.ObjectsSelected
member.summary: Gets a description of the objects that are applicable for this mail template

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.MailTemplate.RecipientsSelected
member.summary: Gets a description of the recipients that are applicable for this mail template

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.MailTemplate.RelatingToObjectType
member.summary: Gets the type of Content Manager object that the email template relates to

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.MailTemplate.ReplyTo
member.summary: Gets (or sets) the email address that will appear in the 'From' field of any mail message generated using this template.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.MailTemplate.SubjectTemplate
member.summary: Gets (or sets) the actual text to be provided for the subject of the generated email message, containing any special substitution strings that will be replaced by details extracted from the relevant object or proposed recipient

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.MailTemplate.UseHTMLformat
member.summary: Gets (or sets) a boolean value to indicate whether the mail message uses HTML format.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.MailTemplate.WithValue
member.summary: Gets (or sets) the actual value of the property/user-defined field that will be used to distinguish whether this template should be used in a particular circumstance

member.name: T:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Meeting
member.summary: Used to describe meetings, conferences, events, etc

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Meeting.AgendaIssueDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the date and time when the agenda should be completed and distributed.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Meeting.AgendaOpen
member.summary: Gets a boolean property indicating whether the agenda for this meeting is till open for submissions.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Meeting.AgendaRecord
member.summary: Gets or sets the record representing the full agenda for this meeting.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Meeting.Apologies

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Meeting.Attendees
member.summary: Gets or sets a string listing the locations expected to be present at the meeting. That is, all Invitation child objects for whom the TypeOfAttendee property is 'maAttendanceType.maPresent'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Meeting.Chair
member.summary: Gets or sets a location who is to chair this Meeting.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Meeting.Invitations
member.summary: Gets or sets a string listing all locations that were invited to this Meeting. That is, all Invitation child objects.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Meeting.MeetingDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the date and time this meeting is to take place.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Meeting.MeetingDuration
member.summary: Gets or sets the time that this type of meeting is scheduled to take (seconds).

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Meeting.MeetingPlace
member.summary: Gets or sets the location that is the venue for this meeting.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Meeting.MeetingType
member.summary: Gets or sets the meeting template that this meeting is based on.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Meeting.MinutesRecord
member.summary: Gets or sets the record representing the minutes for this meeting.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Meeting.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the name identifying this meeting.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Meeting.Pending
member.summary: Gets a boolean property indicating whether the meeting is still pending.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Meeting.SubmissionsCutoffDate

member.summary: Get the list of Meeting Documents

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Meeting.ChildInvitations
member.summary: Get the list of Meeting Participants

member.name: T:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.MeetingDocument

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.MeetingDocument.DocumentType
member.summary: Gets or sets the meeting document type value indicating the type of meeting document.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.MeetingDocument.EditStatus
member.summary: Gets or sets a string describing the edit status of this Meeting Document, indicating whether it is checked out or not. For example: 'Checked Out' or 'Checked In'.

member.summary: Gets a string containing the record title of this meeting document.

member.summary: Gets or sets an integer containing the order number of this MtgDocument. The order number indicates the order in which this Meeting Document should be discussed in the Meeting. An order number may either be assigned automatically upon insertion of Agenda Items into a master Agenda document, or can be set manually by the user.

member.name: T:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.MenuItem
member.summary: The MenuItem class is a simple base class that allows different types of menu elements to be put into an array.

member.summary: Gets the identifier of the TRIM icon associated with this command.

members.member: Note that the IEnumerator documentation requires an InvalidOperationException to be thrown whenever the collection is modified. This has been done for changes in the size of the collection but not when one of the elements of the collection is modified as it is a bit tricky to detect unmanaged code that modifies the collection under our feet.
