member.name: T:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ObjectDef
member.summary: A helper class that allows you to determine generic capabilities of any of the objects in the TRIM object model.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.#ctor(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.BaseObjectTypes)
member.summary: Constructs an ObjectDef object based on the specified object type enumeration value.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.#ctor(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.BaseObjectTypes,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database)
member.summary: Constructs an ObjectDef object based on the specified object type enumeration value. This form of constructor allows you to specify a database which is used to retrieve customised captions.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier for this Object Definition

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.Name
member.summary: Gets a string containing the unique name for the object corresponding to this Object Definition. This unique name is not changed when the object is captioned.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.Abbreviation
member.summary: Gets a string containing the unique 3-character abbreviation used internally for the object corresponding to this Object Definition.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.Caption
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the descriptive caption for this object. Note that to set a caption, this object must have been constructed with a valid Database parameter. To make caption changes permanent, call the SaveCaptionChanges method of the database

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.CaptionPlural
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the descriptive caption for a collection of these objects Note that to set a caption, this object must have been constructed with a valid Database parameter. To make caption changes permanent, call the SaveCaptionChanges method of the database

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.Icon
member.summary: Gets the enumerated icon value for the icon which is associated with this object.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.IsChild
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether the object of this ObjectDef is a child object.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.HasFavorites
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether there are any objects of this ObjectDef in the current user's Favorites list.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.InXMLSchema
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether the object corresponding to this Object Definition has an XML Schema definition that enables it to be exported to XML in the ExportToXML method.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.HasHierarchy
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether the objects of this Object Definition have a hierarchical structure

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.HasValidDateRange
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether an object corresponding to this Object Definition may be assigned a date range within which it is active.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.HasUserFields
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether the objects of this Object Definition have any user fields assigned.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.HasBarcode
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether the objects of this Object Definition may have a foreign (external) barcode assigned.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.HasNotes
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether the objects of this Object Definition have a free text field for notes.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.HasAudit
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether objects of this Object Definition have audit capabilities

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.HasPrimaryACL
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether each object corresponding to this Object Definition has its own set of access controls that explicitly control access to the object

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.HasCopiedACL
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether the objects of this Object Definition have access controls that may be inherited by other objects. For example, Classifications have a set of access controls that may be inherited by records using the Classification.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.PrimaryACLEnum
member.summary: Gets the enum value describing the access control set that is applied to objects of this Object Definition as primary access controls. Primary access controls are the object's own set of access controls that explicitly control access to it.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.CopiedACLEnum
member.summary: Gets the enum describing the access control set that is inherited from this object by other TRIM objects, if it has copied access controls. This object has copied access controls if the 'HasCopiedACL' property is true.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.PurposeEnum
member.summary: Gets the enum describing the purpose for this object when testing whether it is valid for usage in a certain context. This is used by TrimMainObjectSearch.SetPurpose and TrimMainObject.IsValidFor functions.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.HasExtraPurposeParameter(System.Int32)
member.summary: For the given purpose, indicates whether extra information can be provided to supplement a given purpose value. For example, when testing whether a record is suitable as a container (RecordPurposes.FindContainerFor) you can specify an extra parameter as the contained item's record type, which allows the function to provide a more accurate validation.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.ExtraPurposeEnum(System.Int32)
member.summary: If the specified purpose has an extra purpose parameter, it will be either an object or an enum value. For example, RecordPurposes.FindContainerFor can have a RecordType object as an extra parameter, LabelPurposes.Attach can have a BaseObjectTypes enum value indicating what type of object you are selecting the label to attach to. If the extra purpose parameter for the specified purposeValue is an enumeration, this method returns the type of enumeration, otherwise it returns AllEnumerations.Unknown.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.ExtraPurposeObjectType(System.Int32)
member.summary: If the specified purpose has an extra purpose parameter, it will be either an object or an enum value. For example, RecordPurposes.FindContainerFor can have a RecordType object as an extra parameter, LabelPurposes.Attach can have a BaseObjectTypes enum value indicating what type of object you are selecting the label to attach to. If the extra purpose parameter for the specified purposeValue is a uri of an object, this method returns the type of object, otherwise it returns BaseObjectTypes.Unknown.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.HasSecurity
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether objects of this Object Definition may be assigned a security profile

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.HasCopiedSecurity
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether objects of this Object Definition have a security profile that may be inherited by other objects.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.NamePropertyId
member.summary: Gets a PropertyIds enum value containing the property id for the default 'unique naming' property for the object, by which it may be instantiated instead of by uri. For example, the Record object's Name property is the Record Number ('Number' property).

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.PrefixPropertyId
member.summary: Gets a PropertyIds enum value containing the id for the property of this object that is searched when selecting by prefix (that is, when using the 'SelectByPrefix' method).

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.ToolTipPropertyId
member.summary: Gets a PropertyIds enum value containing the id for the property of this object that should be used in a tool tip. For example, the ToolTip property for a record is the 'Title' property, which may be more informative to the user than the Record's Name property (the Record Number).

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.NotesPropertyId
member.summary: Gets a PropertyIds enum value containing the id for the property of this object that should be used in a tool tip. For example, the ToolTip property for a record is the 'Title' property, which may be more informative to the user than the Record's Name property (the Record Number).

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.HierarchySearchClauseId
member.summary: Gets a SearchClauseIds enum value containing the search clause id that can be used if searching by hierarchy.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.PrefixSearchClauseId
member.summary: Gets a SearchClauseIds enum value containing the search clause id that can be used if searching by hierarchy.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.HasLabels
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether objects of this type may be attached to user labels

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.AvailableOffline
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether objects of this type are available offline (i.e. without a workgroup server connection)

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.HasContextMenu
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether this object type has a context menu (usually displayed when clicking the right mouse button. See the MenuPopup class for more details on loading context menus.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.RequiresAProductFeature
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether this object requires a product feature to be activated before it can be made visible

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.ProductFeature
member.summary: Gets a ProductFeatures enumerate value indicating the product feature required before this object should be exposed in a user interface. Check the RequiresAProductFeature first before calling this function

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.FindByName(System.String)
member.summary: Constructs an Object Definition to correspond to that with the nominated unique object name.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.FindByName(System.String,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database)
member.summary: Constructs an Object Definition to correspond to that with the nominated unique object name. Providing the database object allows the returned objectDef object to be able to access any customised captions.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.FindByAbbreviation(System.String)
member.summary: Constructs an Object Definition to correspond to that with the nominated unique 3-character abbreviation.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.FindByAbbreviation(System.String,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database)
member.summary: Constructs an Object Definition to correspond to that with the nominated unique 3-character abbreviation. Providing the database object allows the returned objectDef object to be able to access any customised captions.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.SelectAllObjects
member.summary: Gets an array of all the Object Definitions currently defined in the TRIM object model

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.SelectAllObjects(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database)
member.summary: Gets an array of all the Object Definitions currently defined in the TRIM object model Providing the database object allows the returned array to have objectDef objects that will be able to access any customised captions.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.SelectAllMainObjects
member.summary: Gets an array of all the Object Definitions corresponding to a TrimMainObject currently defined in the TRIM object model. It excludes all child objects.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.SelectAllMainObjects(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database)
member.summary: Gets an array of all the Object Definitions corresponding to a TrimMainObject currently defined in the TRIM object model. It excludes all child objects. Providing the database object allows the returned array to have objectDef objects that will be able to access any customised captions.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.SelectAllChildObjects
member.summary: Gets an array of all the child Object Definitions for this TRIM object.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.SelectAllChildObjects(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database)
member.summary: Gets an array of all the child Object Definitions for this TRIM object. Providing the database object allows the returned array to have objectDef objects that will be able to access any customized captions.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.SelectAllSearchableObjects(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database)
member.summary: Gets an array of all the Object Definitions corresponding to a TrimMainObject currently defined in the TRIM object model that should be displayed in a search menu. It excludes objects that are part of an inactivate feature, excludes child objects, and objects that would only be useful if you could edit them.

members.member: Note that the IEnumerator documentation requires an InvalidOperationException to be thrown whenever the collection is modified. This has been done for changes in the size of the collection but not when one of the elements of the collection is modified as it is a bit tricky to detect unmanaged code that modifies the collection under our feet.

member.summary: The ObjectSelector class is used to select one or more objects from a TrimMainObjectList

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ObjectSelector.SelectOne(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Hwnd,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.TrimMainObjectSearch)
member.summary: Displays the TRIM tree box allowing the user to choose one of the items in the list. Will return null if the user did not make a selection.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ObjectSelector.SelectMany(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Hwnd,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.TrimMainObjectSearch)
member.summary: Displays the TRIM tree box allowing the user to choose one or more items from the supplied list, using the TRIM tag feature. Will return null if the user did not make a selection.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ObjectSelector.DisplayResults(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Hwnd,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.TrimMainObjectSearch)
member.summary: Displays the TRIM tree box allowing the user to browse the results in the supplied list.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ObjectSelector.EditQuery(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Hwnd,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.TrimMainObjectSearch)
member.summary: Displays the TRIM string-based search editor to allow the user to change details of the search

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ObjectSelector.EditQuery(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Hwnd,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.TrimMainObjectSearch,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Displays a TRIM Search editor to allow the user to change details of the search. You can allow the user to edit the query using their preferred editor, or simply force the use of the string based editor. Queries that are not editable with the Boolean editor will always be displayed using the editor most suitable.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ObjectSelector.SelectContainerRecord(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Hwnd,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database,System.String,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record)
member.summary: Displays the TRIM desktop dialog in order that the user can select a container record. You can pass in a record if you wan to ensure that the container is suitable for containing that record (pass NULL otherwise). The function return the container if the user makes a selection, otherwise a NULLvalue is returned. You can seed the search with a record number (or part thereof).

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ObjectSelector.SetSearchAsUserStartPoint(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Hwnd,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.TrimMainObjectSearch,System.Boolean)
member.summary: populates the supplied search object with the default search according to the current user's preference Since one preference involves editing the query, it is possible for the user to cancel out, in which case the function will return false. If you don't specify the overwrite option, the search will only be modified if it contains no existing clauses.

member.name: T:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ObjectViewer
member.summary: The ObjectViewer class is used to view an electronic object associated with a TRIM object.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ObjectViewer.ViewModal(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Hwnd,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.TrimObject)
member.summary: Displays a modal viewer window and displays the electronic document associated with the supplied object. If the object has no document attached or the document is not viewable for other reasons a TrimException will be thrown containing details of the problem.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ObjectViewer.ViewModeless(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Hwnd,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.TrimObject)
member.summary: Displays a modeless viewer window and displays the electronic document associated with the supplied object. If the object has no document attached or the document is not viewable for other reasons a TrimException will be thrown containing details of the problem.

members.member: Note that the IEnumerator documentation requires an InvalidOperationException to be thrown whenever the collection is modified. This has been done for changes in the size of the collection but not when one of the elements of the collection is modified as it is a bit tricky to detect unmanaged code that modifies the collection under our feet.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.PageItemDefinition.Field
member.summary: Gets the field definition object for this item - only available for items that are a field definition

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.PageItemDefinition.IsItemATab
member.summary: Gets a boolean property indicating if this page item is a special "tab" item

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.PageItemDefinition.IsItemALine
member.summary: Gets a boolean property indicating if this page item is a horizontal line

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.PageItemDefinition.CharacterLimit
member.summary: Gets or sets a user-defined character limit on this data entry item (must be smaller than the default limit). Basically limits how many characters the user can type into this field. Set it to 0 to revert the limit back to the maximum allowable for this field.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.PageItemDefinition.DefaultCharacterLimit
member.summary: Gets the character limit that normally applies for this page item (ignoring any custom-specified character limit).

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.PageItemDefinition.IsReadOnly
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean property indicating if this page item is a read-only item and should not be modifiable on the data entry form. If an editing object has been supplied to the form constructor, the test will be specific to the object being edited

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.PageItemDefinition.IsFullWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean property indicating if this item should be redered at the full width of the form

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.PageItemDefinition.IsVisible
member.summary: Gets a boolean property indicating if this page item should be made visible to the currently logged-in user

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.PageItemDefinition.Caption
member.summary: Gets or sets a string property indicating the caption that should be used for this page item

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.PageItemDefinition.DefaultCaption
member.summary: Gets a string property indicating the default caption that should be used for this page item

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.PageItemDefinition.IsMultiLine
member.summary: Gets a boolean property indicating if this page item should normally be displayed across multiple lines.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.PageItemDefinition.AcceptNewLine
member.summary: Gets a boolean property indicating if this page item should accept a new line character in the text.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.PageItemDefinition.IsMandatory
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean property indicating if this page item should be marked as mandatory on the data entry form

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.PageItemDefinition.IsMandatoryAlways
member.summary: Gets a boolean property indicating if this page item is always mandatory and the setting cannot be changed

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.PageItemDefinition.IsMandatoryForNewItems
member.summary: Gets a boolean property indicating if this page item should be marked as mandatory on the data entry form when editing a new object

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.PageItemDefinition.IsTimeMandatory
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean property indicating that if this page item is a dateTime item, the time component must be supplied.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.PageItemDefinition.IsTimeMandatoryAlways
member.summary: Gets a boolean property indicating if this page item must always have a time specified and the setting cannot be changed

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.PageItemDefinition.WarnWhenBlank
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating if it a warning should be issued (if a user interface is available) if this field has been left blank. An alternative to the available mandatory settings.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.PageItemDefinition.EditValue
member.summary: Gets the value for the property or field definition that is being edited by this form item. Only applies when an editing object has been supplied in the form constructor.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.PageItemDefinition.EditPurpose
member.summary: Gets a purposeEnum value relevant to the type of object being edited (when this item represents a TrimMainObject)

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.PageItemDefinition.EditPurposeExtra
member.summary: Gets a purposeExtra value (as a supplement for the EditPurpose) relevant to the type of object being edited (when this item represent a TrimMainObject)

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.PageItemDefinition.SearchStartingPoint
member.summary: Gets a starting point for object selection (when this item represents a TrimMainObject). For records, returns a suitable DesktopStartStates enum value, for other objects, returns a SearchStartPoint enum value

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.PageItemDefinition.IsTrimIcon
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating if this item represents a standard Trim Icon

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.PageItemDefinition.EnablingPageItem
member.summary: Gets a possible parent item that represents a boolean property used to determine if this item should be enable or not. For example, if the "LookupSet.ItemsHaveHierarchy" form item is checked, then the form item for "LookupSet.OnlySelectLowestLevel" should be enabled, otherwise it should be unavailable.

member.summary: Move this item up one position in its page

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.PageItemDefinition.MoveDown
member.summary: Move this item down one position in its page

If it is an enumerated type ('pfEnum'), the TRIM Enumeration type is held in the 'EnumType' property.

member.summary: Gets the length of this property if it is a string

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.PropertyDef.TrueString
member.summary: Gets the string representing true for a property of type boolean. Most likely this will be 'True', but for some boolean properties, it may contain something more descriptive. For example, the property 'IsActive' may have a true string of 'Active' and a false string of 'InActive'

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.PropertyDef.FalseString
member.summary: Gets the string representing false for a property of type boolean. Most likely this will be 'False', but for some boolean properties, it may contain something more descriptive. For example, the property 'IsActive' may have a true string of 'Active' and a false string of 'Inactive'.

members.member: Note that the IEnumerator documentation requires an InvalidOperationException to be thrown whenever the collection is modified. This has been done for changes in the size of the collection but not when one of the elements of the collection is modified as it is a bit tricky to detect unmanaged code that modifies the collection under our feet.

members.member: Note that the IEnumerator documentation requires an InvalidOperationException to be thrown whenever the collection is modified. This has been done for changes in the size of the collection but not when one of the elements of the collection is modified as it is a bit tricky to detect unmanaged code that modifies the collection under our feet.

member.summary: Compares two property values to see which should appear first in a sort sequence. Generally assumed that both property values would be based on the same propertyDef. Returns -1 to indicate that propertyValue1 is less than propertyValue2, 0 to indicate that the property values are equal +1 to indicate that propertyValue1 is greater than propertyValue2,

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.PropertyValue.SetValue(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.UserFieldValue)
member.summary: Sets the value of this property. Will set the modified state to true if the value is actually changed.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.PropertyValue.GetCurrentValue
member.summary: Gets a string representation of the current value.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.PropertyValue.SetValueFromString(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the current value of this property. Will set the modified state to true if the value is actually changed.

members.member: Note that the IEnumerator documentation requires an InvalidOperationException to be thrown whenever the collection is modified. This has been done for changes in the size of the collection but not when one of the elements of the collection is modified as it is a bit tricky to detect unmanaged code that modifies the collection under our feet.

member.name: T:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.PsoDateType
member.summary: Physical Inactive Record Selection Date Types

member.name: T:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record
member.summary: A Record is the fundamental object that is managed by Content Manager. It is usually a piece of evidence that must be kept for compliance or business reasons. To create a new record you must provide a RecordType object

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.internal_Dispose
member.summary: Disposes of this record (and any of its contents) according to specified disposal method. When processing contents, you can specify whether the task should halt if any failures occur.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.#ctor(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.TrimURI)
member.summary: Create a new record with the specified RecordType. This will not have a URI until it is saved.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.#ctor(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database,System.String)
member.summary: Constructor for a new Record object.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.AccessionNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets the accession number of a record. Traditionally the accession number is a number entered by archival staff when a record is retrieved from the archive. Content Manager does not base any business rules on the accession number.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.Actions
member.summary: Gets a string listing all Actions attached to this Record. The string contains the Action name, Responsible Location and the remaining time for completion for each Action, with a new line for each Action.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.Addressee
member.summary: Gets or sets the addressee of this Record. It can be set automatically, if there is an Electronic Document attached which is an email. Addressee is a type of contact location.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.AggregatedDisposal
member.summary: Gets a string describing the aggregated disposal schedule of a container by combining the innate disposal schedule for the container together with all the disposal instructions for the contents (recursively)

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.AllContacts
member.summary: Gets a string listing the names and contact types of all contacts attached to this Record. For example: 'Abbott, Peter (Mr) (Author); Ayling, A (Other)'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.AllHolds
member.summary: Gets a string listing all holds on this record. As long as the record has a hold, it cannot be updated or destroyed. The string contains the Hold names delimited by semicolons ';'. Create a new Record.RecHold child object to add a hold to this Record.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.AllMeetings
member.summary: Gets a string listing all meetings for which this record is associated.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.AllParts
member.summary: Gets a string listing all parts of this record.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.AllVersions
member.summary: Gets a string listing all versions of this record.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.AlternateContentsCount
member.summary: Gets a number indicating the number of records that are alternately contained within this record

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.AlternativeContainer
member.summary: Gets or sets the alternative container for this record.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.AlternativeContainers
member.summary: Gets a string listing Record Numbers and Record Titles of all alternative containers of this Record.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.AlternativeContents
member.summary: Gets or sets a string listing Record Numbers and Titles of any records alternatively contained by this Record.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.ArchivePermDate
member.summary: Gets the date this record is due for archival (keep) as a result of an applied retention schedule.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.ArchiveTransferDate
member.summary: Gets the date this record is due for archival (transfer) as a result of an applied retention schedule.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.Assignee
member.summary: Gets the assignee location of this Record. The assignee location is traditionally used to hold the current location of a record. Use the Record.SetCurrentLocation method to set the value of this property.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.AssigneeStatus
member.summary: Gets the lsRecLocSubType enum value representing the current location (assignee) status of the record. The value indicates whether the Record is currently at home ('At Home'), at another location ('At Location'), in a container ('In Container'), in the space system ('In Space') or at an unknown location ('Missing').

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.AttachedKeywords
member.summary: Gets a string listing the attached Thesaurus Terms NOT used in the title of this Record. The string contains the Thesaurus Terms delimited by semicolons ';'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.Author
member.summary: Gets or sets the author of this Record. It can be set automatically based on the logged in user or the document profile, if there is an Electronic Document attached. Author is a type of contact location.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.AuthorizationMethod
member.summary: Gets or sets an AuthorizationMethods enumerated value indicating how this record should be authorized.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.AutoClassificationConfidenceLevel
member.summary: Gets or sets a number value (1-100) indicating the confidence level attained for the classification selected for Auto-Classification

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.AutoRenderToPDFOnSave
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether the a PDF rendition of the electronic document will be requested on save.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.Barcode
member.summary: Gets a string containing the internal Content Manager Barcode of this record.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.BlueprintTitle
member.summary: Gets the Document Template used as the basis of this record.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.BypassRecordTypeAccessControls
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether this record bypasses any referenced access controls of the RecordType.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.CanUseClassification
member.summary: Gets a boolean property indicating whether the currently logged in use can use the classification associated with this record

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.CheckedInBy
member.summary: Gets a location object that represents the person who checked in the electonic document attached to this record.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.CheckedOutOn
member.summary: Gets the date on which the Electronic Document attached to this Record was checked out.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.CheckedOutPath
member.summary: Gets the file path to which the E.lectronic Document attached to this Record was checked out.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.CheckedOutTo
member.summary: Gets the Location to whom the Electronic Document attached to this Record is currently checked out to.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.Classification
member.summary: Gets or sets the Classification by which this Record is classified. If the Record is titled by Classification, this sets the generated title. If the Record is numbered by Classification, this sets the Record Number.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.ClassOfRecord
member.summary: Gets or sets the class of this record. The record class reflects the relevance of a record to the organization, such as Vital, Corporate, Personal etc.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.Client
member.summary: Gets or sets the Location used to title the record if the record uses Client Location titling.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.ClientName
member.summary: Gets a string which is equivalent to the record title of the client record.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.ClientNumber
member.summary: Gets a string which is equivalent to the record number of the client record.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.ClientRecord
member.summary: Gets or sets a record which is the client record for this record. Can only set this property for new matters.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.Consignment
member.summary: Gets or sets the string containing an identifier allocated by an archival authority when batches of records are transferred. The consignment number is used to group all records of a shipment to the archives. The consignment number is an integral part of the retention process.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.ConsignmentObject
member.summary: Gets the consignment object which this record has been added to when using the Disposition Workflow product feature.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.Container
member.summary: Gets or sets the Container Record object of this record, if it is a contained record.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.Contents
member.summary: Gets a string listing the Record Numbers and Titles of any Records contained by this Record.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.ConversationId
member.summary: Gets a string value which represents a unique identifier for a mail message conversation (e.g. original message and all replies).

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.Creator
member.summary: Gets the location by whom this Record was registered in Content Manager.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.CSdeclassifyDetails
member.summary: Gets a string value representing the classified security 'Declassify Details' property

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.CSdeclassifyOn
member.summary: Gets a datetime value representing the classified security 'Declassify On' property

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.CSdowngradeDetails
member.summary: Gets a string value representing the classified security 'Downgrade Details' property

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.CSdowngradeOn
member.summary: Gets a datetime value representing the classified security 'Downgrade On' property

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.CSguideEntries
member.summary: Gets a string value representing the classified security 'Security Guide Entries' property

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.CSinitialSecurity
member.summary: Gets a string value representing the classified security 'Initial Security' property

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.CSlastReviewed
member.summary: Gets a string value representing the classified security 'Last Reviewed By' property

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.CSlastUpdateDetails
member.summary: Gets a string value representing the classified security 'Last Update Details' property

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.CSsecurityDetails
member.summary: Gets a string value representing the classified security 'Security Details' property

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.CurrentAction
member.summary: Gets a string containing the Action name, Responsible Location and the remaining time for completion for the current Action assigned to this Record.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.CurrentVersion
member.summary: Gets the Record object which is the current version of this record.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.DateAssigned
member.summary: Gets the date and time when the assignee was last changed.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.DateClosed
member.summary: Gets or sets the date the record was closed. No further contents can be added to a closed record and no new parts can be created for it. With part records when a new part is created the previous part is closed automatically.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.DateCreated
member.summary: Gets or sets the date the record was created. It defaults to the date when the record is initially saved into Content Manager or to the date created of the electronic document, if one exists.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.DateDue
member.summary: Gets or sets the due date of the current action attached to this record, if there is any action attached. Else the due date can be set manually as a basic form of action tracking.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.DateFinalized
member.summary: Gets or sets the date when the Record was finalized. The electronic attachment of a finalized record cannot be edited.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.DateImported
member.summary: Gets or sets a datetime value indicating the date that this record was imported into the system.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.DateInactive
member.summary: Gets or sets the date that the disposition of this record was set to inactive.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.DateModified
member.summary: Gets the date the Electronic Document attached to this Record was modified, if there is an Electronic Document attached.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.DatePublished
member.summary: Gets or sets the date this Record was published to a Web Publish page. This date may be set when the Record is published as a web page through the Records.PublishAsHTML method. Else the Date Published can be set manually to track other forms of publishing, for example if the document was extracted and converted to PDF for distribution.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.DateReceived
member.summary: Get or sets a datetime indicating when a record was received by the organization. Defaults to DateRegistered, can be overwritten by the date received of an email message.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.DateRegistered
member.summary: Gets the date the record was registered in Content Manager.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.DateSuperseded
member.summary: Gets a datetime indicating when a record was supereceded (based on the when the superseded relationship was created)

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.DestructionDate
member.summary: Gets the date this Record is due for destruction. This calculated based on the Retention Schedule assigned to the record, if no retention schedule then it display the value specified for the manual destruction date property.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.DisposalDate
member.summary: Gets a datetime value indicating the date when this record was disposed

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.DisposalMethod
member.summary: Gets a DisposalType enumerated value indicating how this record was disposed

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.Disposition
member.summary: Gets or sets the current disposition of this record.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.DispositionChangedDate
member.summary: Gets the date of the most recent disposition change for this record.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.DispositionSchedule
member.summary: Gets a string containing the scheduled disposition events for this record.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.DocumentAttachPending
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether the user will be prevented from setting the DOSFile property on a record entry form. This is used when the SDK programmer wishes to put up a properties sheet for a record before SetDocument is called, and does not want the user to be able to select a document as part of completing the propertySheet (and the DOSfile field on the data entry form will allow them to do this in normal circumstances).

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.DocumentDetails
member.summary: Gets a string listing details about the attached Electronic Document. The string includes the current Electronic Document location, document type, file size, Document Store ID, and Status of the Electronic Document together with the date upon which the status was last updated to its current value. The details in the list are separated by commas.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.DocumentHash
member.summary: Gets an hash of the electronic document attached to this record. Note that the has will only be available if you had the Store Document Hashes system option enabled at the time the document was registered.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.DocumentLastAccessedDate
member.summary: Gets a datetime value indicating when the electronic document attached to this record was last accessed. Requires the document store being used by the record to support access date tracking.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.DocumentSize
member.summary: Gets the size of the Electronic Document attached to this Record in bytes.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.DocumentStatus
member.summary: Gets a string containing the status of the attached Electronic Document. Example string values are 'Checked In', 'Checked Out' or 'Finalized'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.DocumentType
member.summary: Gets the type of the Electronic Document attached to this Record. For example, 'Microsoft Word Document'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.Editor
member.summary: Gets or sets a location object representing the location resposible for editing the electronic document that is part of the document review process.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.ElasticMetadataJSON
member.summary: Gets a JSON-compliant string that lists the properties and field values of the record that should be included in the Elasticsearch schema for indexing.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.ESource
member.summary: Gets the file path from which the Electronic Document attached to this Record was first checked in. Note: Before the document is attached to the record (but the attach is pending) the file path of the Electronic Document is held in the Record.DOSfile property.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.EStore
member.summary: Gets the Document Store where the Electronic Document attached to this Record is kept.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.EStoreId
member.summary: Gets the filename (Store ID) for this Record's attached Electronic Document in the Electronic Store where it is kept.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.Extension
member.summary: Gets the file extension of the Electronic Document attached to this Record.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.ExternalReference
member.summary: Gets or sets the external identification number of the record. Traditionally this is used to register external reference numbers, such as a file reference on incoming correspondence.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.FilePath
member.summary: Gets or sets the file path of a pending electronic attachment. Once the document has been attached to the record, filePath no longer holds the original file path of the document - instead the original file path is held in the ESource property on the Record object.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.FinalizeOnSave
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether the record will be declared as final when saved.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.FolderOrigin
member.summary: Gets an Origin object that was used to allocate this folder when processing an import run.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.ForeignBarcode
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing an external organization's barcode for this record.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.FullClassification
member.summary: Gets the Expanded Classification Number of the Record. Set the Classification property to modify the value of this property.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.GeneratedTitle
member.summary: Gets or sets the structured part of the title generated if the record has a structured titling method. The generatedTitle must be set for the Thesaurus(ISO) and Thesaurus(Desc) titling methods.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.GpsLocation
member.summary: Gets or sets a geography value representing the GPS location of this record

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.HasEmailAttachments
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating whether the document attached to this record is an email with attachments.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.HasHold
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether there are one or more Holds on this Record.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.HasLinkedDocuments
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether the electronic document attached to this record has any linked child documents (is a compound document).

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.History
member.summary: Gets a string listing all active audit events for this Record.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.HomeLocation
member.summary: Gets the home location of this Record. The home location is traditionally used to hold the storage location of a record. If the home location is a Space, this property has a null value and the home location is stored in the 'homeSpace' property. Use the Record.SetHomeLocation method to set the value of this property.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.HomeLocationStatus
member.summary: Gets the lsrecLocSubType enum value representing the home location status of the record. It indicates whether the Home Location is a Location ('At Location'), a container ('In Container'), or a Space ('In Space').

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.HomeSpace
member.summary: Gets the Space which this record calls home. This Space represents a location in a storage facility where the record sits.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.HomeSpaceNumber
member.summary: Gets the identifying number of the Space which this record calls home. This Space represents a location in a storage facility where the record sits.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.IdolMetadataXML
member.summary: Gets an XML-compliant string that lists the properties and field values of the record that should be included in the IDOL schema for indexing.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.InitiateTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets a Workflow Template object for a new record. If you set this property a new workflow will be created based on that template as part of the Save() operation for the record. Note that this property is a little special in that it cannot be set for an existing record - if you try to do that you will get an error. It really is only applicable for new records. The value of the property is also forgotten once the record has been created.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.IsCheckedOut
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether the Electronic Document attached to this Record is currently checked out.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.IsContainer
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether this record has any contained records.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.IsElectronic
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether this Record has an electronic document attached.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.IsEnclosed
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether this record is enclosed in its container, if it has a container. If the value is set to true then the record will take on the assignee location of the container. Use the Record.SetContainer method to enclose a record in its container, and the Record.SetCurrentLocation method to unenclose the record (but not permanently remove it) from its container. Use the Record.RemoveFromContainer method to remove a record permanently from its container.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.IsInPartSeries
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating if this record is part of a part series. That is it indicates if this record is related to any other record with a part relationship.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.IsRootOfPartSeries
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating if it was the first or original part, if the record is in a part series.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.IsSigned
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether the electronic document attached to this record has been digitally signed.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.Jurisdictions
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the list of jurisdictions associated with record ( a list of jurisdiction names separated by a semi-colon)

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.Keywords
member.summary: Gets a string listing all Thesaurus Terms attached to this Record. The string contains the Thesaurus Terms delimited by semicolons ';'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.LastActionDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the latest date that this record has undergone one of the following actions: Change of location, Census, Action/Procedure attached, Action/Procedure completed, Electronic Document attached, existing Electronic Document replaced, New Part created, Record Title changed, Record Number changed, Record enclosed (if Record is a container) . This is NOT the last date of an Action, Procedure or Workflow attached to the record.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.LastPartRecord
member.summary: Gets the Record object for the latest part in the series, if this record is in a part series.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.LatestVersion
member.summary: Gets the Record object which is the latest version of this record.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.LongNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique string identifier for the record number (expanded version).

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.MakeInactiveDate
member.summary: Gets the date this record is due to be made inactive as a result of an applied Retention Schedule.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.ManualDestructionDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the date this Record is due to be destroyed. This is a manually set date which is used if the record has no retention schedule assigned.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.MatterName
member.summary: Gets a string which is equivalent to the record title of the matter record.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.MatterNumber
member.summary: Gets a string which is equivalent to the record number of the matter record.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.MatterRecord
member.summary: Gets or sets a record which is the matter record for this record. Can only set this property for new records that have the BelongToAMatter Record Type setting.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.MediaType
member.summary: Gets or sets a MediaTypes enumerated value to indicate the media type of this record.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.Meeting
member.summary: Gets the Meeting associated with this Record. If there is more than one Meeting, the most recent one is returned.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.MessageId
member.summary: Gets a string value which represents a unique identifier for a mail message.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.MimeType
member.summary: Gets or sets the Internet media type (MIME type) for the attached electronic document.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.MovementHistory
member.summary: Gets a string listing all the Location changes (movements) in the history of this record. The string contains the Record Number, Event Type ('Assignee Changed'), new Assignee, the Location by whom the Assignee was changed, and the date of the Record movement.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.MyAuthorizationComments
member.summary: Gets or sets a string value indicating the comments provided by the currently logged in user as part of the document authorization process. The user must have been nominated in the list of authorizers for the record.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.MyAuthorizationComplete
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether the currently logged in user has completed the authorization of a record. The user must have been nominated in the list of authorizers for the record.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.MyReviewComments
member.summary: Gets or sets a string value indicating the comments provided by the currently logged in user as part of the document review process. The user must have been nominated in the list of reviewers for the record.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.MyReviewComplete
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether the currently logged in user has completed the review of a record. The user must have been nominated in the list of reviewers for the record.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.NbrPages
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of pages contained within the attached electronic document.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.NeedsAuthorization
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating that this record should be authorized before being finalized.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.NeedsDataEntryForm
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether the data entry form is required when saving this Record.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.NeedsReview
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating that this record should be subject to review before being finalized.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.NewPartCreationRule
member.summary: Gets or sets the Automated Part Rule for this Record which governs the automated closure and creation of new record parts based on predefined criteria, if there is an Automated Part Rule applied.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.NextPartRecord
member.summary: Gets the Record object for the next part in the series, if this record is in a part series and is not the latest part.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.NextTaskDue
member.summary: Gets a string containing details about the Scheduled Task attached to this Record that is due soonest. The details include the Scheduled Task's title, interval size and type, due date and Assignee, delimited by colons ':'. A Scheduled Task may be assigned to a record by setting the Record's classification to a Classification level with a Scheduled Task, or by setting the Record's class manually to 'Vital'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.Number
member.summary: Gets the unique string identifier for the record number (compressed version).

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.OriginatedFrom
member.summary: Gets the origin object which this record was imported from.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.OriginatedFromRun
member.summary: Gets the origin run history which this record was imported from.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.OtherContact
member.summary: Gets or sets the contact location of type Other attached to this Record.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.OverdueActions
member.summary: Gets a string listing all Actions attached to this Record that are overdue. The string contains the Action name, Responsible Location and the remaining time for completion for each Action, with a new line for each Action.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.OwnerLocation
member.summary: Gets the owner location of this Record. The owner location is traditionally used to hold the owner of a record. Only users that belong to the owner location of a record can initially set its access controls. Use the Record.SetOwnerLocation method to set the value of this property.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.PreserveHierarchyOnDataEntry
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating if the hierarchy on the data entry form is to be preserved. It is used when preset values for Container or Classification are used and the SDK programmer wishes to prevent the user from changing the classification or the container on the data entry form.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.PrevPartRecord
member.summary: Gets the Record object for the previous part in the series, if this record is in a part series and is not the first part.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.PrimaryContact
member.summary: Gets the Contact location that has been set as the Primary Contact. Each record can only have one Primary Contact. Set the RecLocation.Primary property to modify the value of this property.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.Priority
member.summary: Gets or sets a string indicating the priority of the record. This is a standalone field which may be used to indicate a record's priority when there is no Action Tracking or Workflow being used.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.RecordType
member.summary: Gets (or sets) the record type template this record was based on. The RecordType determines some of the default properties of a new record as well as determining the titling method (structured or free text), the numbering pattern used and its basic behavior (Folder, Document, Box etc.). It is set when the record is instantiated, through Database.NewRecord(RecordType).

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.RedactedFrom
member.summary: Gets a string containing the record from which this record was redacted. That is, all the records related to this record with relationship type: Was Redacted To. Use the Record.AddRelationship method to create Relationships between Records.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.RedactionsOf
member.summary: Gets a string listing the redactions of this record. That is, all the records related to this record with relationship type: Redaction Of. Use the Record.AddRelationship method to create relationships between records.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.RelatedRecord
member.summary: Gets or sets the Record which is related to this record with Relationship Type 'Related To'. If there is more than one related record, the most recently related record is returned.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.RelatedRecs
member.summary: Gets a string listing the Record Number, Record Title, and Record Relationship Type for all records related to this Record.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.RenditionCount
member.summary: Gets the number of renditions attached to this Record. A rendition is a copy of the Electronic Document attached to this Record in a different format, for example the OCR rendition of an image file.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.Representative
member.summary: Gets or sets the contact location of type Representative attached to this Record.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.Requests
member.summary: Gets a string listing all current requests for this record. The string includes the requested Record Number, the requesting Location and the DateTime needed. Requests are delimited by semicolons ';'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.RetentionSchedule
member.summary: Gets or sets the Retention Schedule assigned to this Record. The Record's disposal schedule will be calculated based on this.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.ReturnDueDateTime
member.summary: Gets the date this record is due to be returned to its storage area after being on loan. This date is set by the Record.SetCurrentLocationEx method.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.ReviewDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the date that the attached Retention Schedule is due to be reviewed.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.ReviewDueDate
member.summary: Gets or sets a datetime value indicating the date when all document review activities should be complete and the document finalized.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.ReviewState
member.summary: Gets or sets a DocumentReviewStates value indicating which action is currently being untertaken for this record.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.ReviewStateDate
member.summary: Gets or sets a datetime value indicating the date when the previous document review action was completed and the current document review action was commenced.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.RevisionCount
member.summary: Gets a number indicating how many revisions of this document are currently available (includes the latest revision)

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.RevisionNumber
member.summary: Gets the number of revisions the Electronic Document attached to this Record has been through. The original document will have Revision Number = 1.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.RootPartRecord
member.summary: Gets the Record object for the first part in the series, if this record is in a part series.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.SapArchiveDate
member.summary: Gets or sets a datetime value corresponding the SAP data element 'Archived Date'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.SapArchiveLinkVsn
member.summary: Gets or sets a string value corresponding the SAP data element 'Archive Link Version'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.SapBusinessId
member.summary: Gets or sets a string value corresponding the SAP data element 'Business ID'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.SapBusinessObject
member.summary: Gets or sets a string value corresponding the SAP data element 'Business Object'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.SapCreatorLocUri
member.summary: Gets or sets a location value corresponding the SAP data element 'Creator Location'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.SapCreatorName
member.summary: Gets or sets a string value corresponding the SAP data element 'Creator Name'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.SapCustomerName
member.summary: Gets or sets a string value corresponding the SAP data element 'Customer Name'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.SapCustomerNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets a string value corresponding the SAP data element 'Customer Number'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.SapDocumentId
member.summary: Gets or sets a string value corresponding the SAP data element 'Document ID'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.SapDocumentProtection
member.summary: Gets or sets a string value corresponding the SAP data element 'Document Protection'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.SapDocumentType
member.summary: Gets or sets a string value corresponding the SAP data element 'Document Type'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.SapModifiedDate
member.summary: Gets or sets a datetime value corresponding the SAP data element 'Modified Date'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.SapReposId
member.summary: Gets or sets a string value corresponding the SAP data element 'Repository ID'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.ScheduledDisposalDate
member.summary: Gets a datetime value indicating the date when this record should be disposed

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.ScheduledDisposalMethod
member.summary: Gets a DisposalType enumerated value indicating how this record should be disposed

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.ScheduledDisposalStatus
member.summary: Gets a DisposalScheduleStatus enumerated value indicating the status of the calculation of the disposal method

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.ScheduledInactiveStatus
member.summary: Gets a DisposalScheduleStatus enumerated value indicating the status of the calculation of the make inactive date

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.SdmEnvironmentID
member.summary: Gets or sets a string value corresponding the SDM Environment ID property.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.SdmFileName
member.summary: Gets or sets a string value corresponding the SDM File Name property.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.SdmFolderName
member.summary: Gets or sets a string value corresponding the SDM Folder Name property.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.SdmRunID
member.summary: Gets or sets a string value corresponding the SDM Run ID property.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.SecCompliant
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating whether this record type implements SEC compliance rules. A record is SEC compliant if its attached document is in an SEC-Compliant document store.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.Security
member.summary: Gets or sets a string listing the security profile of the Record. It is made up of the security level and all caveats assigned to the record.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.SecurityLocks
member.summary: Gets a comma-separated string listing a set of record viewing access locks on this record.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.SeriesRecord
member.summary: Gets or sets the Series Record to which this Record belongs, if it is in a series.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.SpFarmGUID
member.summary: Gets or sets a GUID value representing the GUID of the server farm for the SharePoint Site that this record represents.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.SpGUID
member.summary: Gets or sets a GUID value representing the GUID of the SharePoint Site or List that this record represents.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.SpListItemCount
member.summary: Gets a number representing the number of sharePoint List items that are based on this record.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.SpListType
member.summary: Gets or sets a string value representing the type of SharePoint List that this record represents.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.SpSiteCollectionGUID
member.summary: Gets or sets a GUID value representing the GUID of the site collection containing the SharePoint Site that this record represents.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.SpType
member.summary: Gets an spElementType enum value indicating what type of SharePoint element this record represents.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.SpURL
member.summary: Gets or sets a string representing the URL of the SharePoint Site or List that this record represents.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.StorageDestructionDate
member.summary: Gets a datetime value indicating the date when the electronic record is scheduled for destruction by the document store

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.SuggestedFileName
member.summary: Gets the suggested filename for this record upon checkout.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.Title
member.summary: Gets or sets the full title of this record.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.TopLevelActions
member.summary: Gets a string listing the top level Actions (usually Procedures) attached to this Record. The string contains the Action name, Responsible Location and the remaining time for completion for each Action, with a new line for each Action.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.TypedTitle
member.summary: Gets or sets the free text part of a title using a structured titling method.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.ViewPaneId
member.summary: Gets a string containing the View Pane ID of this Record. This is used by Content Manager as a key for storing which fields are displayed in the Records List Window for this Record.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.ChildClientMatterParties
member.summary: Get the list of Client/Matter Parties

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.ChildClientMatterRoles
member.summary: Get the list of Client/Matter Roles
