member.summary: Get the list of Record Holds

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.ChildJurisdictions
member.summary: Get the list of Record Jurisdictions

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.ChildKeywords
member.summary: Get the list of Attached Thesaurus Terms

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.ChildLinkedDocuments
member.summary: Get the list of Linked Documents

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.ChildRelationships
member.summary: Get the list of Related Records

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.ChildSapComponents
member.summary: Get the list of SAP Components

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.GetDocument(System.String,System.Boolean,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the document associated with the record, extracting it to the filename specified in the outputDocumentName parameter. The checkDocumentOut parameter will allow you to lock the record so that no other user can edit it until you undo the checkout or check the document back in again. The comments parameter allows you to specify some comments which will be appended to the notes of the record. In some cases you may also want to record the place that the user has checked the document out to as a different place than the actual outputDocumentName parameter - if so you can specify this in the saveCheckoutPathAs parameter,

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.SetDocument(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.InputDocument,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Checks in the nominated Input Document as the electronic document for this record

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.DetachDocument
member.summary: Removes any electronic document currently associated with this record.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.SetAutoCheckin(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the record to automatically check-in its electronic document when the document is closed by the user. From 7.3, the record must be checked out to Offline Records, so the CheckinDocumentName parameter is no longer used and can be left blank. Recommend using OfflineRecord.SetAutoCheckin instead.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.GetEmailAttachment(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Gets a numeric value indicating the number of attachments contained in the email associated with this record Extracts an email attachment from the email associated with this record to the nominated file location.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.SetCheckedOutPath(System.String)
member.summary: Allows you to change the location where a document has been checked out to.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.UndoCheckout(System.String)
member.summary: Undo a previous checkout of the electronic document for this Record, disregarding any changes made since it was checked out.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.GetThumbnail(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets a thumbnail rendition of the Electronic Document, and it generate it if the rendition does not currently exist

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.GetSuggestedOutputPath(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.OutputPathTypes,System.String)
member.summary: Gets a suggested filename or folder name for this record, based on the purpose you plan to use it for. If you leave the withinWindowsFolder parameter blank, the path returned will be in a TEMP folder

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.CheckOutWorkingCopy
member.summary: Checkouts the document and creates a workingCopy BOB

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.GetWorkingCopy
member.summary: Checkouts the document and creates a workingCopy BOB

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.CheckInWorkingCopy(System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: CheckIns the WorkingCopy BOB and delete the workingCopyBob

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.DeleteAndDeleteContents
member.summary: Deletes this record and also deletes all records contained within this record

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.DeleteAndUnlinkContents(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location)
member.summary: Deletes this record and disassociates any contents from the container (i.e. all contents become 'unfiled'.)

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.BulkDeleteAndDeleteContents(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.TrimMainObjectSearch,System.Boolean)
member.summary: BulkDelete is an efficient way of removing a lot of records quickly. It bypasses any cache notifications, so should only be be used for records that are unlikely to be opened for day to day usage. It should only be used for records that have no contained items. If any of the records have contained items, they will also be bulk deleted.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.BulkDeleteAndUnlinkContents(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.TrimMainObjectSearch,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location,System.Boolean)
member.summary: BulkDelete is an efficient way of removing a lot of records quickly. It bypasses any cache notifications, so should only be be used for records that are unlikely to be opened for day to day usage. It should only be used for records that have no contained items. If any of the records have contained items, they will be moved out of the container and to the new home location provided.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.CreateNewCopy(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new record which is a copy of this record. Returns a record object that is the new copy. It is not necessary to subsequently save the new version record object to persist it to the TRIM Database

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.CreateNewPart(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new part for this record. Returns a record object that is the new part record. It is not necessary to subsequently save the new part record object to persist it to the TRIM Database.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.CreateNewVersion(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new version for this record. Returns a record object that is the new version. It is not necessary to subsequently save the new version record object to persist it to the TRIM Database

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.CreateNewVersion(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new version for this record, using the supplied file name rather than copying the latest revision. Returns a record object that is the new version. It is not necessary to subsequently save the new version record object to persist it to the TRIM Database

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.CreateNewVersion(System.String,System.String,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.InputDocument)
member.summary: Creates a new version for this record, using the supplied InputDocument as the first revision, rather than copying the latest revision. Returns a record object that is the new version. It is not necessary to subsequently save the new version record object to persist it to the TRIM Database

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.SetAsFinal(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets this record to finalized status. Once it is finalized, the electronic attachment of a record cannot be edited.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.SetAsDraft
member.summary: Sets this record from finalized to draft status.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.GetSuggestedNumber(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets the next available record number for a new record. Returns a string containing the suggested number.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.AutoCalculateNumber(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the next available record number for a new record. Also tests to ensure the calculated number is not already used. If it is used, it will iterate until an available number is found (up to the number of specified iterations). If the specified number of iterations is 0, the method will continually iterate until the number is found.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.SetOwnerLocation(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location)
member.summary: Sets the owner location of this Record. Only users that belong to the owner location of a record can initially set its access controls. Use the Record.SetOwnerLocation method to set the value of this property.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.SetCreatorLocation(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location)
member.summary: Sets the creator location of this Record.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.SetHomeLocation(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location)
member.summary: Sets the owner location of this Record. This is mostly used for physical records and indicates where the record should normally reside

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.SetCurrentLocationAsMissing
member.summary: Sets the current location (assignee) to missing. A record is missing if it can not be physically located at any of its Current, Home or Owner Locations.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.SetCurrentLocationAtHome
member.summary: Sets the current location (assignee) to the home location of the record

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.SetHomeLocationAsSpace(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Space)
member.summary: Sets the home location of the record to be the nominated space

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.FindCurrentRequest
member.summary: Find the most relevant outstanding request for this record, if such a request exists.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.SetAssignee(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location)
member.summary: Sets the assignee for this record to the nominated location. Allows a return due date to be specified.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.SetAssignee(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.TrimDateTime)
member.summary: Sets the assignee for this record to the nominated location. Allows a return due date to be specified.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.SetAssignee(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.TrimDateTime,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.TrimDateTime)
member.summary: Sets the assignee for this record to the nominated location. Allows a return due date to be specified (but null is ok), and also, mainly for import purposes, allows you to specify when the assignee actually changed.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.AttachContact(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ContactType,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds the nominated location to the record as a contact of the specified contact type

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.AttachRelationship(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordRelationshipType)
member.summary: Creates a relationship of the specified relationship type between this record and the nominated record

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.AttachKeyword(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Keyword)
member.summary: Adds the nominated Thesaurus Term (keyword) to the list of attached Thesaurus Terms for this record. This method does not add the thesaurus term to the title of the record. Thesaurus titling is done by setting the 'GeneratedTitle' property of the Record.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.SetContainer(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Puts this record inside the nominated container. The container record must be of a record type with a higher container level than this record.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.RemoveFromContainer(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location)
member.summary: Removes this record from its container. Resets the home location of the record to the nominated location.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.ImportHistory(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.HistoryTypes,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.TrimDateTime,System.String,System.String,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a new History object (Active Audit Event) for this record of the specified type, importing the given history details.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.LogEvent(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Events,System.String,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location,System.String)
member.summary: This function allows you to create an event to attach to the online and offline audit logs.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.AttachAction(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ActionDef,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location)
member.summary: Attaches the action of the nominated ActionName to this Record.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.CompleteCurrentAction
member.summary: Completes the current action in progress for this record, if the current user is permitted to complete it.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.ReassignAction(System.String,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location)
member.summary: Reassigns the nominated action to a specified location.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.ReassignAction(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.TrimURI,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location)
member.summary: Reassigns the nominated action to a specified location.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.CompleteAction(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.TrimURI,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.TrimDateTime,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Completes the nominated action, providing options to specify the completion date and whether any preceding actions should also be completed. In some cases, completing precedent actions may fail, in which case the ErrorMessage property will be populated with an appropriate warning message.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.CompleteAllActions
member.summary: Completes all incomplete actions that the current user is permitted to complete. In some cases, completing an action may fail, in which case the ErrorMessage property will be populated with an appropriate warning message.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.InsertAction(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ActionDef,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.ActionAssignmentOption,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.TrimDateTime)
member.summary: Insert a new action into the list of actions, having it start on the nominated date.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.InsertAction(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ActionDef,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.ActionAssignmentOption,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.TrimURI,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.ActionInsertPosition)
member.summary: Insert a new action into the list of actions, having it start before or after the nominated attached record action.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.RescheduleActions(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.TrimDateTime,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Reschedules all actions attached to this record

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.SetActionDuration(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.TrimURI,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean)

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.RemoveAllActions

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.SetActionNotes(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.TrimURI,System.String)

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.AddSharePointListItem(System.Int64,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record,System.String,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SpListItemOriginator,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SpManagedItemStatus,System.String)
member.summary: Establishes that this record is exposed in SharePoint as a SharePoint List Item with the supplied characteristics.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.RemoveSharePointListItem(System.Int32)
member.summary: Removes the link between this TRIM record and the SharePoint List Item at the nominated index.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.HasSharePointDocumentLink
member.summary: Gets a Boolean property indicating that this record manages a document that resides within SharePoint. Further details of this managed SharePoint item can be obtained by searching for SharePointItem objects associated with this record.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.DownloadSharePointDocument(System.String)
member.summary: This function is used for SharePoint documents that are managed in place. It allows you to download a document from SharePoint to the output file path specified. Use %TEMP% for the toOutputPath parameter if you wish the extract to create a temporary file, in which case the name of the created file is returned.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.TransferStorage(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Transfers the electronic document attached to this record from its current storage location to a new electronic store.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.TransferStorageInPlace(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore,System.String)
member.summary: Transfers the electronic document attached to this record from its current storage location to a new electronic store at the specified location

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.MakeInactive(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.TrimDateTime,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the dateInactive for this record and any of its contents. When processing contents, you can specify whether the task should halt if any failures occur.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.MakeInactive(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the dateInactive for this record and any of its contents. When processing contents, you can specify whether the task should halt if any failures occur.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.MakeActive(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Reverts the state of the record (and any of its contents) so that it is no longer inactive. When processing contents, you can specify whether the task should halt if any failures occur.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.Undispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Reverts the state of the record (and any of its contents) so that it is no longer disposed. When processing contents, you can specify whether the task should halt if any failures occur.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.CanMakeInactive(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.TrimDateTime)
member.summary: Tests whether the it is appropriate for this record to be made Inactive. If the function returns false, you can get more details by looking at the ErrorMessage property.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.CanMakeInactive
member.summary: Tests whether the it is appropriate for this record to be made Inactive. If the function returns false, you can get more details by looking at the ErrorMessage property.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.CanMakeActive
member.summary: Tests whether it is appropriate to reinstate this record to active. If the function returns false, you can get more details by looking at the ErrorMessage property.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.CanDispose(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.DisposalType)
member.summary: Tests whether the specified disposal type is appropriate for this record. If the function returns false, you can get more details by looking at the ErrorMessage property.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.CanUndispose
member.summary: Tests whether it is appropriate to revert the disposal for this record. If the function returns false, you can get more details by looking at the ErrorMessage property.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.RequestRendition(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RenditionType)
member.summary: Allows you to create a request for the automatic rendering engine to make a rendition of this record.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.DataEntryFormDefinition
member.summary: Gets a specially formatted XML string describing the layout of the data entry form to be used to edit this record. This definition also includes any default values that should be displayed for the record. This will be obsoleted shortly, use the FormDefinition property instead

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.GetClassifiedSecurity
member.summary: Gets the Classified Security object which can be used to update security classification according to the US DoD Classified Security standard.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.Exclusions
member.summary: Gets or sets a list of locations that have been specified as being excluded access due to conflicts of interest in a matter

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.NotifyViewed
member.summary: This method records an "electronic document was viewed" event for active and offline audit logs, as appropriate. Used by the web service when passing off a cached document to a browser client.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.HasDocumentHash
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating if there is an MD5 hash attached to this record that can be used to verify the attached document. If the function returns false, immediately check the ErrorMessage property for further information.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.RunHashCheck
member.summary: Returns a boolean value resulting from testing the electronic document attached to this record to see if it still matches the MD5 hash created at the time the record was submitted. If the function returns false, immediately check the ErrorMessage property for further information.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Record.CalculateHash
member.summary: Runs a special function to attach an MD5 hash to the record that can be used to verify the electronic document attached to this record. This will replace any existing MD5 hash if it is different.

member.summary: Gets a kaKeywordAttachMethod enum value indicating the method by which this keyword was attached to the parent Record. A keyword may be attached to a Record through setting the GeneratedTitle (kaByTitling) or by attaching the keyword manually by using the Record.AttachKeyword method (kaByAttach).

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordKeyword.Description
member.summary: Gets a string containing the name of the keyword. The additional text '(Title)' appears after the Keyword name, if this RecKeyword was used in the titling of the parent Record.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordKeyword.Prompt
member.summary: Gets a string containing the prompted text entered by the user at the time of creating the parent Record. Has a value only in the case where the Keyword object corresponding to this RecKeyword is a prompt term which has been used in titling the parent Record.

member.name: T:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordKeywords

member.name: T:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordLinkedDocument
member.summary: Documents contained as links within another document

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordLinkedDocument.Bytes
member.summary: Gets an integer containing the size (in bytes) of the electronic attachment for this RecLinkedDocument.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordLinkedDocument.DateModified
member.summary: Gets the date the electronic attachment for this RecLinkedDocument was last modified.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordLinkedDocument.DocumentName
member.summary: Gets a string containing the file path of the electronic attachment for this RecLinkedDocument. If the linked document is kept in Content Manager, this is just the path from which the linked document was first attached. If the linked document is kept external to Content Manager (not recommended), this is the file path to the actual document, which if moved will result in a broken link.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordLinkedDocument.EStore
member.summary: Gets the ElectronicStore object in which the Electronic Document corresponding to this RecLinkedDocument is kept, if it is not kept external to Content Manager.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordLinkedDocument.EStoreId
member.summary: Gets a string containing the filename (Store ID) of the Electronic Document corresponding to this RecLinkedDocument in the Electronic Store where it is kept, if it is not kept external to Content Manager.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordLinkedDocument.Extension
member.summary: Gets a string containing the file extension of the electronic attachment for this RecLinkedDocument.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordLinkedDocument.LinkedRecord
member.summary: Gets the Record object which holds the electronic attachment to this RecLinkedDocument, if the linked document is stored as a Content Manager Record.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordLinkedDocument.LinkedRevision
member.summary: Gets the revision number of the Record object for this RecLinkedDocument, indicating how many revisions the RecLinkedDocument's electronic attachment has been through. If the RecLinkedDocument is not stored in Content Manager as a Content Manager Record, the revision number is 0 by default.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordLinkedDocument.LinkType
member.summary: Gets a dlDocumentLinkType enum value indicating how this RecLinkedDocument is stored. That is, it will be stored in the Content Manager document store as a separate Content Manager record, stored as an external document or stored in the Content Manager document store but not as a separate Content Manager record.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordLinkedDocument.StorageDescription
member.summary: Gets a string containing the storage description for this RecLinkedDocument. It is a more detailed description of the linkType property.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordLinkedDocuments.getItem(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Gets the item in this child list at the nominated index.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordLinkedDocuments.Parent
member.summary: Gets the parent object of this child object collection

member.name: T:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordLocation
member.summary: Defines an association between the parent Record and a Location

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordLocation.Comments
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the comments as provided by the reviewer, authorizer or editor as part of the Document Review process.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordLocation.DueDate
member.summary: Gets or sets a datetime value indicating when a reviewer, authorizer or editor should have completed their work as part of the Document Review process.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordLocation.Email
member.summary: Gets a string containing the email address of the Location object corresponding to this RecLocation. If there is more than one email address in the Electronic Addresses for this location, the default email address is returned. If there is no default, the latest added email address is returned.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordLocation.FaxNo
member.summary: Gets a string containing the fax number of the Location corresponding to this RecLocation.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordLocation.FromDateTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the date this Location was attached to the parent Record as a RecLocation.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordLocation.IsComplete
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether a reviewer, authorizer or editor has completed their work as part of the Document Review process.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordLocation.IsOverdue
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether the reviewer, authorizer or editor has not completed their work and it is past the due date.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordLocation.IsPrimaryContact
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether this RecLocation is the primary Contact for this Record, if the RecLocation is of Location Type 'Contact'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordLocation.LatestDateTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the latest date at which the parent Record was last confirmed to be physically at the Location corresponding to this RecLocation. The value of this property only differs from the Record.FromDateTime property under circumstances where the parent Record is reassigned to this Location while already the Assignee. This may happen for example during a Census, in which all Content Manager records included in the Census are reassigned to ensure the Assignee locations are up to date with the physical locations of documents within the organization.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordLocation.Location
member.summary: Gets or sets the base Location object corresponding to this RecLocation.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordLocation.MobileNo
member.summary: Gets a string containing the mobile number of the Location corresponding to this RecLocation.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordLocation.Name
member.summary: Gets the string containing the sort name of the Location corresponding to this child Location.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordLocation.Organization
member.summary: Gets a string containing the sort name of the Location of Location Type 'Organization' for which this Location holds a relationship of type 'Member Of'. If there is more than one, it returns the Location designated as the default organization.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordLocation.OriginalName
member.summary: Gets a string containing the original name of the Location object corresponding to this RecLocation. Stores the name of the location as it was when the relationship to the record was first created.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordLocation.PAddress
member.summary: Gets a string containing the Mailing Address of this Location. Any new line characters from the Address are replaced by semicolons ';'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordLocation.PhoneNumber
member.summary: Gets a string containing the main telephone number of the Location object corresponding to this RecLocation. Mobile, fax and home telephone numbers are held in the mobileNo, faxNo and ahPhoneNo properties, respectively.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordLocation.ReturnDateTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the date at which this Record is due to be returned to the previously assigned Location, if the RecLocation is of Record Location Type 'Assignee'. Else, this date is blank, meaning the property will return the value 30/12/1899 (d,m,y).

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordLocation.SAddress
member.summary: Gets a string containing the Street Address of this Location. Any new line characters from the Address are replaced by semicolons ';'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordLocation.Space
member.summary: Gets the base Space object corresponding to this RecLocation, if this RecLocation is a Space.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordLocation.Status
member.summary: Gets a lsRecLocSubTypes enum value indicating the Location status of this RecLocation. If this RecLocation is of Record Location Type 'Assignee', the status indicates whether the Record is currently at home ('At Home'), at another location ('At Location'), in a container ('In Container'), in the space system ('In Space') or at an unknown location ('Missing'). If this RecLocation is of Record Location Type 'Home', it indicates whether the Home Location is a Location ('At Location'), a container Record ('In Container'), or a Space ('In Space'). Else, this property is simply set to 'At Location', indicating that this RecLocation is a Location (and not a container, etc.).

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordLocation.TypeOfContact
member.summary: Gets or sets a ctContactType enum value representing the Contact Type by which this RecLocation is attached to its parent Record, if the RecLocation is of Location Type 'Contact'. The Contact Type will be one of the following: 'Author', 'Addressee', 'Representative', 'Client', 'Other' or 'Custom1' to 'Custom10'. Use the Caption Editor under Tools - Content Manager Administration in Content Manager Context to change the caption of the Custom contact types.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordLocation.TypeOfRecordLocation
member.summary: Gets a rlRecordLocationType enum value representing the Record Location Type by which this RecLocation is attached to its parent Record. The Record Location Type will be one of the following: 'Assigned To', 'Home', 'Owner', 'Creator' or 'Contact'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordLocation.WebPage
member.summary: Gets a string containing the web page URL of the Location corresponding to this RecLocation. If there is more than one web page in the Electronic Addresses for this location, the default web page is returned. If there is no default, the latest added web page is returned.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordLocations.getItem(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Gets the item in this child list at the nominated index.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordLocations.New
member.summary: Initialises a new object of this child object collection

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordLocations.Parent
member.summary: Gets the parent object of this child object collection

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordLocations.AddReviewer(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location)
member.summary: Adds a new RecordLocation object into the list representing a Reviewer for the Document Review feature.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordLocations.AddAuthorizer(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Location)
member.summary: Adds a new RecordLocation object into the list representing an Authorizer for the Document Review feature.

member.name: T:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordRelationship
member.summary: Describes an association that has been made between the parent Record and another Record

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordRelationship.CanView
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether the Record object which is related to the parent Record via this RecRelationship can be displayed to the current user (according to the security profile of the current user).

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordRelationship.Description
member.summary: Gets a string containing a description of this RecRelationship. This string indicates the actual relationship between the parent Record and the related Record. For example, for a Relationship of Relationship Type 'rrDoesSupersede' this property will contain the value 'Supersedes' while for a Reverse Relationship of Relationship Type 'rrDoesSupersede' this property will contain the value 'Is superseded by'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordRelationship.IsReverse
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether this RecRelationship is a Reverse Relationship. If it is, then the parent Record is related to the Related Record via the reverse relationship of the relationType and reverseRelationType properties. For example a reverse Relationship of reverseRelationType 'rrDoesSupersede' indicates an actual relationship of 'Is Superseded By'. A description of the actual relationship is held in the RecRelationship.Description property.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordRelationship.RelatedRecord
member.summary: Gets the Record object which is related to the parent Record via this RecRelationship.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordRelationship.RelatedTitle
member.summary: Gets a string containing the title of the Record object which is related to the parent Record via this RecRelationship.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordRelationship.RelationNumber
member.summary: Gets the Part Number property of this RecRelationship indicating the number of this part in relation to the root part. For example, if the Part Number has the value '2' then this RecRelationship was the second Part Relationship attached to the root part record.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordRelationship.RelationType
member.summary: Gets an rrRecordRelationship enum value indicating the Relationship Type of this RecRelationship. For example: rrIsRelatedTo (Related To), rrIsTempCopy (Copy Of), rrIsRootPart (First part of), rrDoesSupersede (Supersedes), rrIsInSeries (Within Series), rrIsAttachmentOf (Attachment of), rrIsVersion (First Version of), rrContainsClause (Contains Clause), rrDerivedFrom (Derived From), rrIsAltIn (Alternatively within), rrRedactionOf (Redaction Of). There are also custom relationships: rrCustom1 to rrCustom10; use the Caption Editor under Tools - Content Manager Administration in Content Manager to change the captions for these relationships. Note: If this RecRelationship is a Reverse Relationship (isReverse = true) then the actual relationship between the parent Record and the related Record is the reverse of the value of this property.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordRelationship.ReverseRelationType
member.summary: Gets an rxRevRecRelationship enum value indicating the Reverse Relationship Type of this RecRelationship, if the RecRelationship is a Reverse Relationship (isReverse = true). The values are rxRisRelatedTo (Related To), rxRisTempCopy (Original Of), rxRisRootPart (Later Part Of), rxRdoesSupersede (Is superseded by), rsRisInSeries (Series Record For), rxRisAttachmentOf (Attached To), rxRisVersion (Later Version Of), rxClauseWithin (Is a Clause Within), rxRDerivedFrom (Derivations), rxRIsAltIn (Alternatively contains), rxRRedactionOf (WasRedactedTo). There are also custom relationships: rxRcustom1 to rxRcustom10; use the Caption Editor under Tools - Content Manager Administration in Content Manager to change the captions for these relationships.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordRelationships.getItem(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Gets the item in this child list at the nominated index.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordRelationships.New
member.summary: Initialises a new object of this child object collection

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordRelationships.Parent
member.summary: Gets the parent object of this child object collection

member.name: T:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordRendition
member.summary: The RecRendition object represents one of a Record's electronic attachments. It is therefore only available if the Record has an Electronic Document associated with it

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordRendition.AddedOn
member.summary: Gets the date this Rendition was added to the parent Record.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordRendition.Bytes
member.summary: Gets an integer containing the size (in bytes) of the Rendition's attached Electronic Document.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordRendition.ConfidenceLevel
member.summary: Gets or sets a number indicating the confidence level associated with the OCR pattern matching process (1-100), 0 = unknown.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordRendition.DateModified
member.summary: Gets the date the Electronic Document attached as this Rendition was last modified.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordRendition.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets a string corresponding to the Description field of this Rendition. It should be a description of the content or the usage of the Electronic Document attached as the Rendition.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordRendition.EStore
member.summary: Gets the Store object corresponding to the Electronic Store where this Rendition's attached Electronic Document is kept.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordRendition.EStoreId
member.summary: Gets a string containing the filename (Store ID) of the Electronic Document corresponding to this Rendition in the Electronic Store where it is kept.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordRendition.Extension
member.summary: Gets a string containing the file extension of this Rendition's attached Electronic Document. For example: 'pdf'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordRendition.MimeType
member.summary: Gets or sets the Internet media type (MIME type) for the attached electronic document.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordRendition.NbrPages
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of pages contained within the attached electronic document.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordRendition.PageNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets the page number of the single page view rendition.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordRendition.TypeOfRendition
member.summary: Gets or sets a rtRenditionType enum value indicating the Rendition Type of this RecRendition. For example, 'Multimedia Annotation', or'Redaction'.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordRendition.Extract(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Extracts this Rendition to the file system location specified in the 'OutputDocumentName' parameter. If '%TEMP%' is specified, the rendition will be extracted to the TEMP directory for the machine and a file name will be generated. Returns a string containing the filename of the extracted document.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordRendition.TransferStorageInPlace(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore,System.String)
member.summary: Transfers the electronic document attached to this rendition from its current storage location to a new electronic store at the specified location

member.name: T:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordRenditions
member.summary: The RecRendition Collection object is a Child List representing the electronic renditions of a Record. It is only available if the Record has one or more Electronic Documents associated with it

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordRenditions.getItem(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Gets the item in this child list at the nominated index.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordRenditions.Parent
member.summary: Gets the parent object of this child object collection

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordRenditions.NewRendition(System.String,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RenditionType,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new RecRendition child object that represents a rendition of the parent record's electronic document. The rendition will be of the specified rendition type.

member.name: T:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordRevision
member.summary: The RecRevision may be used only if the Record has an Electronic Document associated with it. The object is a child object and represents a revision of a Record's electronic document.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordRevision.Bytes
member.summary: Gets an integer containing the size of the Electronic Document corresponding to this Revision in bytes.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordRevision.CheckedInBy
member.summary: Gets a location object that represents the person who checked in this revision.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordRevision.DateModified
member.summary: Gets the date the Electronic Document attached as this Revision was last modified.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordRevision.Description
member.summary: Gets a string containing the source of this revision, that is the file path from which it was originally checked in.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordRevision.DocumentType
member.summary: Gets a string containing the type of the Electronic Document corresponding to this Revision.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordRevision.EStore
member.summary: Gets the ElectronicStore object in which the Electronic Document corresponding to this Revision is kept.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordRevision.EStoreId
member.summary: Gets a string containing the filename (Store ID) of the Electronic Document corresponding to this Revision in the Electronic Store where it is kept.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordRevision.Extension
member.summary: Gets a string containing the file extension of this Revision's attached Electronic Document. For example: 'pdf'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordRevision.MimeType
member.summary: Gets the Internet media type (MIME type) for this revision of the electronic document.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordRevision.NbrPages
member.summary: Gets the number of pages contained within this revision of the electronic document.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordRevision.PreservationNotes
member.summary: Gets or sets a string property describing the preservation notes for this revision, indicating why the revision should be preserved.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordRevision.Preserve
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating if this Revision should be preserved. This flags a Revision as being significant and therefore prevents it from being removed when the document is finalized or when a user elects to delete previous Revisions.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordRevision.RevisionNumber
member.summary: Gets the number of this Revision. The original document will have Revision Number = 1.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordRevision.Extract(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Extracts this Revision to the file system location specified in the 'OutputDocumentName' parameter. If '%TEMP%' is specified, the revision will be extracted to the TEMP directory for the machine and a file name will be generated. Returns a string containing the filename of the extracted document.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordRevision.Promote
member.summary: Extracts this revision and promotes to be the latest revision of the record. Note that the function automatically commits - no Save() is required.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordRevision.TransferStorageInPlace(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore,System.String)
member.summary: Transfers the electronic document attached to this revision from its current storage location to a new electronic store at the specified location

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordRevisions.getItem(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Gets the item in this child list at the nominated index.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordRevisions.Parent
member.summary: Gets the parent object of this child object collection

member.name: T:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordSapComponent
member.summary: Used to represent a SAP component - SAP documents are composed of one or more SAP components

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordSapComponent.ApplicationVersion
member.summary: Gets or sets a string value corresponding the SAP data element 'Application Version'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordSapComponent.ArchiveDate
member.summary: Gets or sets a datetime value corresponding the SAP data element 'Archive Date'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordSapComponent.ArchiveLinkVersion
member.summary: Gets or sets a string value corresponding the SAP data element 'Archive Link Version'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordSapComponent.Bytes
member.summary: Gets an integer containing the size (in bytes) of this SAP component's attached Electronic Document.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordSapComponent.CharacterSet
member.summary: Gets or sets a string value corresponding the SAP data element 'Character Set'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordSapComponent.ComponentId
member.summary: Gets or sets a string value corresponding the SAP data element 'Component ID'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordSapComponent.ContentType
member.summary: Gets or sets a string value corresponding the SAP data element 'Content Type'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordSapComponent.DateModified
member.summary: Gets or sets a datetime value corresponding the SAP data element 'Customer Number'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordSapComponent.Extension
member.summary: Gets a string containing the file extension of this SAP component's attached Electronic Document.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordSapComponent.FileName
member.summary: Gets a string containing the name of the file passed in by the SAPAlink for this component.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordSapComponent.StoreId
member.summary: Gets the identifier of this electronic document within the document store.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordSapComponent.StoreUri
member.summary: Gets the electronic store that this component is stored in.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordSapComponents.getItem(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Gets the item in this child list at the nominated index.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordSapComponents.New
member.summary: Initialises a new object of this child object collection

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordSapComponents.Parent
member.summary: Gets the parent object of this child object collection

member.name: T:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType
member.summary: This object represents a TRIM Record Type. A record type is required for the construction of a new record in TRIM and the record type has a number of properties that determine behavior and default settings for records

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.AcknowledgeRequests
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether requestors of records of this type need to acknowledge the receipt of the requested record before the request is consider complete. Only applies to delivery requests.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.AllowBlankFreeTextTitle
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether the Free Text Title field component may be left blank. This property is only active when a structured Titling method is used (Classification, Thesaurus or Client titling methods).

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.AllowMultipleExtensions
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether records of this type can have the borrowing return date extended multiple times

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.AllowParts
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating if this RecordType allows the creation of part relationships between Records. (Note for COM developers, use the SetPartNumberingDetails method to set the value of this property).

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.AllowReplace
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether users will be allowed to return Electronic Documents, replacing existing copies of the document.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.AllowVersions
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether users will be allowed to return Electronic Documents as new revisions, thereby retaining a history of all changes to the document. Note: This property does not allow or disallow versions. To control the creation of versions, the menu item (or task) 'New Version' must be enabled/disabled for this Record Type.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.AlwaysAuditSecurityBreaches
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether events that are security breaches should always be logged to the online audit log

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.AnnotateOnly
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether users without 'Record Administration' will be prevented from overwriting existing notes (annotations only allowed).

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.AnnotateWhenReadOnly
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether users without 'Modify Record' permission are allowed to annotate the notes for records of this Record Type.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.Assignee
member.summary: Gets or sets the default assignee location for records of this Record Type. The assignee location is traditionally used to hold the current location of a record.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.AuditCreateEventsOffline
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value to indicate that when a record of this type is created, there should be an entry added to the offline audit log.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.AuditDeleteEventsOffline
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value to indicate that when a record of this type is deleted, there should be an entry added to the offline audit log.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.AuditModifyEventsOffline
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value to indicate that when a record of this type is modified, there should be an entry added to the offline audit log.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.AuthorizationMethod
member.summary: Gets or sets an AuthorizationMethods enumerated value indicating how documents should be authorized.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.AuthorizerReminderDays
member.summary: Gets or sets a number value indicating how many days should pass before sending a reminder about completing the authorization process for a document (0 = don't issue reminders).

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.AutoFinalize
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether to automatically declare this record as final once the electronic document is attached.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.BelongsToAMatter
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether records of this type need to be associated with a matter before being created.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.BorrowingLimit
member.summary: Gets or sets a number of days that should be used to limit borrowing of physical records. When this value is set to a non-zero value, whenever a record is moved from it's home location, a due for return date is calculated based on the number of days specified for the borrowing limit

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.CanHaveSharePointItems
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether records of this type can be SharePoint List Item records, as designeated by the Content Manager SharePoint Integration.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.ChangeTitleWhenReadOnly
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether users without 'Modify Record' permission are allowed to change the free text title for records of this Record Type.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.CheckDuplicateTitles
member.summary: Gets or sets a geGeneralExceptionHandling enum value indicating how Content Manager should behave upon saving a record of this record type with a title that has already been used for another record. Note: Checking for Duplicate Titles only occurs if the records Indexing Event has been processed.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.Classification
member.summary: Gets or sets a classification that is the starting point for any classification attached to records of this Record Type. If the ClassificationMandatory property is set to true, all Records must be within this Classification.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.ClassificationMandatory
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether users will be forced to create records of this Record Type within the starting classification held in the Classification property. This property is enabled only when the Record Type has a starting classification.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.ClassOfRecord
member.summary: Gets or sets an rcRecordClass enum value indicating the default Record Class for records of this Record Type. A Record may be categorised as either Vital, Corporate (default value), Workgroup, Personal, Reference or Temporary.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.CompressPartNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether the Part Number will be compressed (displayed without any leading zeros). (Note for COM developers, use the SetPartNumberingDetails method to set the value of this property).

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.ConfirmEachNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether a dialog will be displayed when a record of this Record Type is saved, to confirm the record number.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.ConfirmPreview
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether the preview pane should display a confirmation message before automatically displaying a preview of the document.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.ContainerRule
member.summary: Gets or sets a ContainmentRule enumerated value indicating the business rule for what is a suitable container for records of this type

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.ContentsRule
member.summary: Gets or sets a ContainmentRule enumerated value indicating the business rule for what sort of contents can be added to a container record of this type

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.DaysDue
member.summary: Gets or sets an integer containing the number of days until due. If creating documents that require an action to be performed within a certain time period from the date of registration, set the value of this property to the number of business days that are to be calculated until the due date. This property is only activated when the RecordType.SetDueDateFromActions property is false, whereupon the Date Due field will operate independently of Action Tracking or Workflow.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.DefaultJurisdiction
member.summary: Gets or sets the default jurisdiction of this record type. A record type can either have a default jurisdiction or a default jurisdiction group.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.DefaultSeries
member.summary: Gets or sets the default series record for any record created using this Record Type. The default series should be a valid series record, that is a record of a RecordType with UsualBehaviour 'bhSeries'. This property is only activated when the RecordType.WithinSeries property is set to 'true'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.Disposition
member.summary: Gets or sets a rdRecordDisp enum value indicating the default disposition for records of this Record Type

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.EditorReminderDays
member.summary: Gets or sets a number value indicating how many days should pass before sending a reminder about completing the drafting process for a document (0 = don't issue reminders).

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.EndUsersCanModify
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether users without 'Modify Record' permission can update record metadata if the record is not finalized. Users must have the Document Update permission.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.EsoActionType
member.summary: Gets or sets a esoActionType enumeration value indicating what type of action to perform on documents when they are selected for Inactive Record Management

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.EsoAllowEvents
member.summary: Gets or sets whether documents can be moved to other storage by the event processor

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.EsoDateType
member.summary: Gets or sets the date field used to select candidate documents for Inactive Record Management

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.EsoEnable
member.summary: Gets or sets whether this record type support Electronic Inactive Record Management

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.EsoMonths
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of months to pass before a document is eligible for Inactive Record Management

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.EsoStoreUri
member.summary: Gets or sets the electronic store an inactive document is moved to

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.EsoYears
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of years to pass before a document is eligible for Inactive Record Management

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.EStore
member.summary: Gets or sets the ElectronicStore object used to store electronic attachments to records of this Record Type. Setting this property to an existing non-default Electronic Store will automatically replace any previous value for the RecordType.StoreType property with 'tsUseStore'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.ExtensionLimit
member.summary: Gets or sets a number of days that should be used to limit extension of borrowing of physical records. When this value is set to a zero value, there is no extension allowed

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.ExternalId
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the External Identification Number for this Record Type. This identifier cannot be changed through the Content Manager user interface and so guarantees your program a reliable handle to the record type aside from the URI. If this field contains a value and the Database.HideCustomRecordTypes property is set to true, then the whole record type will not be visible in the Content Manager user interface.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.FinalisePreviousVersion
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether the previous version should be set to final (meaning no more modifications may be made) upon creation of a new version for a record of this Record Type. Any old revisions of the finalized record may be automatically removed when this occurs by setting the RecordType.PurgePreviousVersion property to 'true'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.FinalReminderDays
member.summary: Gets or sets a number value indicating how many days should pass before sending a reminder about completing the finalization of a document (0 = don't issue reminders).

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.FollowupReminderDays
member.summary: Gets or sets a number value indicating how many days should pass before sending a further reminder about completing an action in the review process (0 = don't issue reminders).

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.HideFreeTextTitle
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether the Free Text Title field should be suppressed on the Data Entry Form. This is used in conjunction with the Record.AllowBlankFreeTextTitle property and only becomes active when a blank Free Text Title is allowed.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.HomeCanBeSpace
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether records of this Record Type are allowed to have a home location within the Space Management System.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.HomeLocation
member.summary: Gets or sets the default home location for records of this Record Type. The home location is traditionally used to hold the storage location of a record. If this property does not have a value, the default Location set in Tools - System Options - Locations will be assigned. Note: This Location must not have a lower Security Profile than the Record Type.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.InsecureContainer
member.summary: Gets or sets a csContainerSecurityHandling enum value indicating the behavior for a record of this Record Type if it becomes an insecure container. That is if records (documents) of a higher Security Level are enclosed in a container of this Record Type which has a lower Security Level.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.InsecureDocument
member.summary: Gets or sets a dsDocumentSecurityHandling enum value indicating the behavior for a record of this Record Type if it becomes an insecure document. That is if records (documents) of this Record Type with a lower Security Level are enclosed in a container of a higher Security Level.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.LastNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the starting number for any new records created with this Record Type. This must be set to a value that matches the numbering pattern determined by the RecordType.NumberPattern property before this RecordType object can be saved.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.Level
member.summary: Gets or sets a number (0-9) indicating the container level allocated to this Record Type. A record may only contain records of a lower level number.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.MediaType
member.summary: Gets or sets a MediaTypes enumerated value to indicate the default media type for records of this record.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.MoveWhenReadOnly
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether users with no 'Modify Record' permission are allowed to move (change Assignee) records of this Record Type.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the name of this Record Type.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.NeedsAuthorizationProcess
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean property indicating where records of this type should be subject to an authorization process before being finalized.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.NeedsClassification
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating whether records of this type need to have a classification provided as part of the record creation process

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.NeedsReviewProcess
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean property indicating where records of this type should be subject to a review process before being finalized.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.NewPartCreationRule
member.summary: Gets or sets the default Automated Part Rule used by records of this Record Type which governs the automated closure and creation of new record parts based on predefined criteria.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.NotesInsertStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets an niNotesInsertStyle enum value indicating how notes should be added to the notes field on records of this Record Type. The possible styles are: only at the top, only at the bottom, or either at the top or the bottom.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.NumberFromType
member.summary: Gets or sets a RecordType object whose numbering pattern and starting number this Record Type shares.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.NumberingIsManual
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether the numbering of records using this Record Type requires manual input.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.NumberMethod
member.summary: Gets or sets an nmNumberingMethods enum value indicating whether records of this Record Type should be numbered by container, by a numbering pattern, or by copying the numbering pattern of another Record Type. To number based on Classification, include one of the characters 'P' or 'S' within the number pattern set via the RecordType.NumberPattern property.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.NumberPattern
member.summary: Gets or sets the number pattern for this Record Type. It establishes the form of the record number for records created using this Record Type. The RecordType.LastNumber property must also be set before the RecordType can be saved.If the Record Type is to be numbered by classification, one of the characters 'P' or 'S' must be included within the number pattern. If the number pattern includes a 'P', (along with any of the alphabetic characters), the record number will be generated from the Record Numbering Pattern defined in the Classification.RecPattern property for this classification, and no RecordType.LastNumber property needs to be set. If it includes an 'S' (in which case some alphabetic and some numeric characters must also be specified within the number pattern), the record number will be generated in the usual way for record numbers, with the full classification level number replacing the 'S' character. For more information on the characters used to create a numbering pattern, refer to the Content Manager Help File.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.OldVersionPurgeStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets a oldVersionPurgeOptions enumeration value indicating whether old revisions of the previous version for records of this Record Type should be removed when the a new version is created upon creation of a new version. This property is activated when the RecordType.FinalizePreviousVersion is set to true.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.OwnerLocation
member.summary: Gets or sets the default owner location for records of this Record Type. The owner location traditionally has responsibility for a record. Only users that belong to the owner location of a record can initially set its access controls. Note: This Location must not have a lower Security Profile than the Record Type.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.PartSeparator
member.summary: Gets or sets a string which separates the Record Number from the Part Number of any parts created for records of this Record Type. (Note for COM developers, use the SetPartNumberingDetails method to set the value of this property).

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.PreventDispChangeIfNoSchedule
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether the record's disposition is prevented from being changed if it does not have an attached schedule.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.PsoActionType
member.summary: Gets or sets a psoActionType enumeration value indicating what type of action to perform on records when they are selected for Inactive Record Management

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.PsoBoxRTY
member.summary: Gets or sets the record type that will be used to create boxes during the inactive physical record management process

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.PsoDateType
member.summary: Gets or sets the date field used to select physical candidate records for Inactive Record Management

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.PsoEnable
member.summary: Gets or sets whether this record type support Inactive Record Management

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.PsoMonths
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of months to pass before a physical record is eligible for Inactive Record Management

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.PsoNewHomeLoc
member.summary: Gets or sets the new home location of a physical inactive record

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.PsoYears
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of years to pass before a physical record is eligible for Inactive Record Management

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.PurgePreviousVersion
member.summary: You should use the oldversionPurgeStyle property instead.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.ResetAtYearEnd
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether any automatic component of this Record Type's numbering pattern will restart at number one at the beginning of a new year.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.RetentionSchedule
member.summary: Gets or sets the Schedule object which is the default Retention Schedule to be attached to new records of this Record Type. Setting a value for this property automatically sets the RecordType.UseRetention property to true.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.ReviewerReminderDays
member.summary: Gets or sets a number value indicating how many days should pass before sending a reminder about completing the review process for a document (0 = don't issue reminders).

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.SapContainerRecordType
member.summary: Gets or sets the default Record Type to be used when creating containers for SAP documents.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.SapCreateContact
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether the SAP interface should create contacts (for customer ID) when creating SAP documents.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.SapCreateContainers
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether the SAP interface should create containers (based on customer id/name) when creating SAP documents.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.SapCreateCountries
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether the SAP interface should create a new jurisdiction if one is no found to match the supplied 'LAND1' SAP metadata value.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.SapCreateCreatorLoc
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether the SAP interface should create a creator location when creating SAP documents.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.SapForceDeleteDate
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether the SAP interface should override any existing retention schedule with a manual destruction date when using the delete date metadata.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.SapRepositoryId
member.summary: Gets or sets a string value indicating if this record type is the default for the specified SAP repository

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.SapTitleTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets a string value for the title of SAP documents created for this record type.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.SapTitleTemplateKS
member.summary: Gets or sets a string value for the title of SAP documents created for this record type. This form is used after a call to DocumentKeysSet has been made for the new document.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.SapUseCountryCode
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether the SAP interface should attach jurisdictions based on the SAP metadata property 'LAND1'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.SapUseDeleteDate
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether the SAP interface should set the manual destruction due date based on the SAP metadata property 'DEL_DATE'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.SecCompliant
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating whether this record type implements SEC compliance rules. A record type is SEC compliant if it uses an SEC-Compliant document store.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.SetDueDateFromActions
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether the Record.DateDue property should be updated based on the current action (Action Tracking) of the Record. If set to false, the Date Due field will operate independently of any Actions associated with the record.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.SetLastActionOnView
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether the Last Action Date of a record should be updated when a document is viewed.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.SortOrder
member.summary: Gets or sets an alphabetic string (up to 3 characters long) by which this Record Type is sorted within the Record Types list. This is helpful if there is a large number of Record Types and there is a preferred order in which they should be displayed to the user. When the string is empty, the Record Types will be sorted alphabetically by Record Type name.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.StartupTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the default Workflow Template used to initiate a new workflow whenever a new record of this Record Type is created.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.StoreType
member.summary: Gets or sets a tsUseStoreType enum value indicating whether the record type will use the default electronic document store, the nominated store set in the RecordType.Store property, or not use a store at all (no electronic object support for this Record Type).

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.SuppressContentIndexing
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether Content Manager should suppress document content indexing for records of this Record Type. Document content indexing enables the ability to search for records in Content Manager by words that occur inside the attached electronic documents.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.TitlingMethod
member.summary: Gets or sets a tmTitlingMethod enum value indicating the default titling method for records of this Record Type. A record may be titled by: Free Text (default) in which there is no controlled list of values for the title the user sets; Classification in which record titles are created according to a hierarchical Classification system; Thesaurus (ISO Standard) in which titles are created according to a hierarchical word list of standard terms; Thesaurus (Descriptor) in which titles are created with any thesaurus terms, as long as the first term is a top term; or Client in which titles contain a Location name at the start of the title.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.TrimIconId
member.summary: Gets or sets a number indicating the style of icon that will depict records of this type throughout Content Manager.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.UseCensus
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether records of this Record Type will be tracked during a census. The object of a Census is to create an accurate count of records assigned to a particular location during a defined date/time period.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.UsePartNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether this Record Type should use part numbering. (Note for COM developers, use the SetPartNumberingDetails method to set the value of this property).

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.UseRetention
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether a Retention Schedule may be attached to records of this Record Type.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.UsualBehaviour
member.summary: Gets or sets a bhRecordBehaviour enum value determining the general behavior for records of this Record Type. The record may behave like a Document, used to catalog/register individual documents that may then be placed on file; Folder, used to create records that will contain documents or other records; Series, used to link records with disparate metadata; Box, used to contain records (usually for archival purposes); Folder (Paper Only), used to create paper based records; Document Template, a Word Template used in Content Manager's Document Assembly module; or Content Block, an individual document section used within Content Manager's Document Assembly module.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.VersionNumbering
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether version numbering should be used when creating new versions for records of this Record Type. A new version of a document is registered as a record in its own right with a link to its previous version. This is different from a revision, which gets attached to the same record.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.WithinSeries
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether records of this Record Type should be placed within a series. The RecordType.DefaultSeries property is only activated upon setting this property to true.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.ChildAutoSubFolders
member.summary: Get the list of Automatic Sub Folders

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.RecordPropertiesFormDefinition
member.summary: Gets or sets the form definition used for editing records of this type.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.ActiveAuditEventEnabled(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.HistoryTypes)
member.summary: Returns a boolean value indicating whether the nominated event should be logged in the active audit event log

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.EnableActiveAuditEvent(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.HistoryTypes,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Turns on or off the logging of the nominated event within the active audit event log

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.EnableAllActiveAuditEvents
member.summary: Turns on the the logging of all events within the active audit event log

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.Reviewers
member.summary: Gets or sets a list of locations representing the default reviewers of a document when using the Document Review feature

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.Authorizers
member.summary: Gets or sets a list of locations representing the default authorizers of a document when using the Document Review feature

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.NewCopy
member.summary: Sets up a new record type by copying attributes of this record type

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.ContainerTypes
member.summary: Gets or sets a list of record types representing the list of valid record types that can be containers of this record type. Use this with the ContainerRule value of ByList

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.ContentsTypes
member.summary: Gets or sets a list of record types representing the list of valid record types that can be contains of a container record of this record type. Use this with the ContentsRule value of ByList

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.CanContain(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType)
member.summary: Use this function to determine if a record of this type can act as a container for a record of the specified contentType. If it returns false, the ErrorMessage property will be set to provide extra information

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType.CanHaveContainer(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordType)
member.summary: Use this function to determine if a record of this type can be contained within a container of the specified containerType. If it returns false, the ErrorMessage property will be set to provide extra information

member.summary: Gets or sets the classification object that will be used when creating this sub folder

member.summary: Gets or sets the record type object that will be used when creating this sub folder

member.summary: Gets or sets the schedule object that will be used when creating this sub folder

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.RecordTypeAutoSubFolder.Title
member.summary: Gets or sets a string that will be used to title the sub folder.

member.summary: A collection of Automatic Sub Folders
