member.name: T:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Report
member.summary: A template used to design a printable listing of items in the Content Manager database

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Report.DefaultDevice
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the default printer device. The value of this property should match the name of an available printer within your Windows environment. A collection of objects will be printed in a report by using the PrintList method of the object collection.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Report.DefaultDriver
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the Default Print Driver to be used when printing this report. A collection of objects will be printed in a report by using the PrintList method of the object collection.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Report.DefaultPort
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the default printer port to be used when printing a report using this Report Layout. A collection of objects will be printed in a report by using the PrintList method of the object collection.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Report.DefaultTray
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the default printer tray to be used when printing a report using this Report Layout. A collection of objects will be printed in a report by using the PrintList method of the object collection.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Report.ForObject
member.summary: Gets an integer containing the object id of the type of object to be printed to reports of this Report Layout. This property has a value of '6' (corresponding to a Record object type) by default.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Report.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the name of the Report Layout represented by this Report object. Setting the value of this property will modify the value of the Report.ReportName property.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Report.PrintReport(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.TrimMainObjectSearch,System.String)
member.summary: Generates a report for the given object list, and prints it to the given printer.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Report.PrintReportToPdf(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.TrimMainObjectSearch)
member.summary: Generates a PDF report for the given object list. Returns the path of the generated PDF report. Requires the Onstream PDF printer driver to be installed.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Report.PrintReportToHTML(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.TrimMainObjectSearch,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Generates a report on a list of objects with output in HTML and following the report design layout. The image folder name is used as a location for any hyper-links to images created by the report generator. If you leave the value blank, the function will create a sub-folder within the path of the outputHTMLfileName if one is needed.

member.name: T:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SavedSearch
member.summary: The RecordSearch object enables TRIM records to be retrieved by creating a search expression from a number of search methods. The object has methods to allow boolean AND, OR and NOT relationships (these use the Reverse Polish notation), and also the ability to set Record Type filters and sort criteria. RecordSearch instances(Searches) may also be loaded or saved

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SavedSearch.AnyWordContents
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean parameter indicating that when using the Any Word search, include document content

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SavedSearch.AnyWordNotes
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean parameter indicating that when using the Any Word search, include %B_record% notes

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SavedSearch.AnyWordTitle
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean parameter indicating that when using the Any Word search, include %B_record% titles

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SavedSearch.AssigneeSearchIncludesAuthorisation
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean parameter indicating that when searching for %BS_activity% by assignee, include %BS_activity% requiring authorization

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SavedSearch.AssigneeSearchIncludesDelegates
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean parameter indicating that when searching by assignee, include delegates for current user

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SavedSearch.AssigneeSearchIncludesEscalated
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean parameter indicating that when searching for %BS_activity% by assignee, include escalated %BS_activity%

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SavedSearch.AssigneeSearchIncludesGroups
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean parameter indicating that when searching by assignee, include groups for current user

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SavedSearch.AssigneeSearchIncludesPosition
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean parameter indicating that when searching by assignee, include person's position

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SavedSearch.CanEdit
member.summary: Gets a boolean property indicating whether the current user can edit the query

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SavedSearch.CanExecute
member.summary: Gets a boolean property indicating whether the current user can execute the query

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SavedSearch.DefaultIncludesContent
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean property indicating that when using a default record search, look for matching record document content

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SavedSearch.DefaultIncludesNotes
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean property indicating that when using a default record search, look for matching record notes

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SavedSearch.DefaultIncludesNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean property indicating that when using a default record search, look for matching record numbers

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SavedSearch.DefaultIncludesTitle
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean property indicating that when using a default record search, look for matching record titles

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SavedSearch.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets a string value that provides a more detailed explanation of when this search should be used

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SavedSearch.ExtendedIDOLOptimization
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean parameter indicating whether to use extended IDOL optimization when processing the query

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SavedSearch.FilterString
member.summary: Gets or sets a string value which defines filters for the search.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SavedSearch.FullName
member.summary: Gets the full name of this search (includes any parent search name).

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SavedSearch.IconId
member.summary: Gets or sets an Icons enumeration value to associate a standard Content Manager icon with this saved search.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SavedSearch.IdolSearchStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets an IdolSearchStyles value indicating how the IDOL engine will be used in resolving the query

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SavedSearch.IsGrouping
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating whether this search is simply a grouping level for a hierarchy, and not actually a search.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SavedSearch.IsOldFormat
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating if this search is an old format record search.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SavedSearch.IsPublic
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating whethe this search is a search available to all Content Manager users.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SavedSearch.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets a string value uniquely identifying this search

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SavedSearch.ObjectType
member.summary: Gets a BaseObjectTypes enum value indicating the type of object this search is designed to retrieve.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SavedSearch.Owner
member.summary: Gets or sets a location value indicating the owner of this search. A null value indicates a public search.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SavedSearch.Parent
member.summary: Gets or sets a SavedSearch to be the parent of this saved search when displaying a hierarchical view of searches

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SavedSearch.QueryString
member.summary: Gets or sets a string value which defines the main criteria search.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SavedSearch.SortString
member.summary: Gets or sets a string value which defines the sorting order for the search results.

member.name: T:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Schedule
member.summary: Defines a set of rules that determine the lifecycle of a set of one or more Records

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Schedule.ActionSummary
member.summary: Gets a string describing a summary of the retention management actions of this retention schedule.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Schedule.CanOnlyDestroyInactive
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether records with this retention schedule can only be disposed if they are not currently active.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Schedule.ExpandedTitle
member.summary: Gets a string which is an expansion of the schedule title by prepending all higher level schedule titles.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Schedule.HasChildSchedules
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating if this schedule has any subordinate schedules.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Schedule.IgnoreBlankDestroyTriggers
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether disposal triggers will be ignored if the date calculation results in a blank due date (presumably because a date on the record has not been set)

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Schedule.IsAgencySpecific
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether the schedule only applies to the organization that is using Content Manager, or whether it is a schedule published by an archival authority for use across a number of organizations.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Schedule.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the schedule number of this Retention Schedule. This number uniquely identifies this Schedule amongst all other Retention Schedules.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Schedule.ParentSchedule
member.summary: Gets the parent schedule which this schedule belongs to, if any.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Schedule.PolicyCentreGUID
member.summary: Gets or sets a GUID value indicating the unique identifier for this retention schedule in the Policy Center integration

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Schedule.RetainJurisdictions
member.summary: Gets or sets a string value containing a list of jurisdictions which have a retain permanent requirement. Only used if the Retain property is set to KeepForeverInSomeJurisdictions.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Schedule.Retention
member.summary: Gets or sets a RetainStyles enumerated value indicating if a retain permanent requirement is in force

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Schedule.Source
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the source from which the Retention Schedule originated, e.g. the archival authority publication number.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Schedule.SuppressTriggerCalculationAlways
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating if the creation of a retention trigger reindex event should be suppressed whenever an updated is committed to this schedule.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Schedule.SuppressTriggerCalculationEventOnCommit
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating if the creation of a retention trigger reindex event should be suppressed when an update is committed. This setting is transient and needs to be specified whenever the schedule is updated.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Schedule.Title
member.summary: Gets or sets the title of this Retention Schedule. This is a brief reference to the subject matter of records this schedule will be applied to.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Schedule.UseEarliestDestroyDate
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether the earliest disposal date will be used in a disposition schedule calculation involving multiple destroy triggers (normally the latest destruction date is used).

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Schedule.ReplaceReferences(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Schedule,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Replaces all references to this schedule (in records, classifications, record types, origins, check in styles). You can also opt to make the schedule inactive after the references are done and also to keep the existing schedule on records that have been archived or destroyed according this schedule.

member.name: T:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ScheduledTask
member.summary: Describes a computerised task that is to be performed regularly by the Content Manager scheduler

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ScheduledTask.Assignee
member.summary: Gets or sets the Location object to whom this Scheduled Task is assigned. This location must perform the Scheduled Task.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ScheduledTask.AttachDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the date this ScheduledTask object was attached to its record (i.e. the date this Scheduled Task object was created).

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ScheduledTask.CompletionDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the date this Scheduled Task is due to finish. If this field is left blank, the task will keep repeating forever.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ScheduledTask.Description
member.summary: Gets a string containing a description of what is involved in this Scheduled Task. For example, 'Vital Record Review and Update : Record : G05/1'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ScheduledTask.IntervalSize
member.summary: Gets or sets a diDateInterval enum value indicating the type of time interval between repetitions of this Scheduled Task (e.g. Days, Weeks, Months, Years). The size of the interval of this type is specified in the property 'ScheduledTask.IntervalSize'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ScheduledTask.IntervalType
member.summary: Gets or sets a diDateInterval enum value indicating the type of time interval between repetitions of this Scheduled Task (e.g. Days, Weeks, Months, Years). The size of the interval of this type is specified in the property 'ScheduledTask.IntervalSize'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ScheduledTask.IsComplete
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether this Scheduled Task has been completed or not.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ScheduledTask.LastActionedOn
member.summary: Gets the date this Scheduled Task was last performed. If the Scheduled Task has not yet been performed, this date is blank, meaning the property will return the value 30/12/1899 (d,m,y).

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ScheduledTask.NextDueDate
member.summary: Gets the date this Scheduled Task is next due to be performed (i.e. due for its next repetition).

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ScheduledTask.Repetitions
member.summary: Gets or sets an integer containing the maximum number of times this Scheduled Task should be repeated.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ScheduledTask.RepetitionsDone
member.summary: Gets an integer indicating the number of repetitions of this Scheduled Task that have already been carried out. That is, the number of times this Scheduled Task has been performed since it was started.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ScheduledTask.ScheduleDescription
member.summary: Gets a string containing a description of the frequency this Scheduled Task should be performed. Its value is determined by the values of the ScheduledTask.IntervalSize and ScheduledTask.IntervalType properties. For example: 'Perform Scheduled Task every 6 months'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ScheduledTask.StartDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the date this Scheduled Task is due to start.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ScheduledTask.Status
member.summary: Gets a tuTaskStatus enum value indicating whether this Scheduled Task is complete, due or overdue.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ScheduledTask.ChildHistorys
member.summary: Get the list of Scheduled Task Actions

member.name: T:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ScheduledTaskHistory
member.summary: Summarises a completed scheduled task for audit purposes

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ScheduledTaskHistory.ActionDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the date the Scheduled Task Action corresponding to this TskHistory object was performed.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ScheduledTaskHistory.ActionedBy
member.summary: Gets or sets the Location by whom the Scheduled Task Action corresponding to this TskHistory object was performed.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ScheduledTaskHistory.Details
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the free text field on this TskHistory child object for notes. The TskHistory.SetNotes method may also modify the value of this property.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ScheduledTaskHistory.DueDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the date the Scheduled Task Action corresponding to this TskHistory object was due to be performed.

member.name: T:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ScheduledTaskHistorys
member.summary: A collection of Scheduled Task Actions

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ScheduledTaskHistorys.getItem(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Gets the item in this child list at the nominated index.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ScheduledTaskHistorys.New
member.summary: Initialises a new object of this child object collection

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ScheduledTaskHistorys.Parent
member.summary: Gets the parent object of this child object collection

member.name: T:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ScheduleTrigger
member.summary: An individual rule of the parent Schedule that defines circumstances under which a Record should undergo archival/disposal action

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ScheduleTrigger.AfterDays
member.summary: Gets or sets an integer indicating how many months this trigger should wait before initiating the disposition change.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ScheduleTrigger.AfterMonths
member.summary: Gets or sets an integer indicating how many months this trigger should wait before initiating the disposition change. The value of this property must be between 0 and 11. The length of the waiting period is determined by the combination of the SchTrigger.Years property and this property. The wait begins upon a date event determined by the value of the SchTrigger.DateType property.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ScheduleTrigger.AfterYears
member.summary: Gets or sets an integer indicating how many years this trigger should wait before initiating the disposition change. The length of the waiting period is determined by the combination of this property and the SchTrigger.Months property. The wait begins upon a date event determined by the value of the SchTrigger.DateType property.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ScheduleTrigger.DateType
member.summary: Gets or sets a tgTriggerTypes enum value indicating a record event upon which the waiting period for this trigger should begin. When the waiting period is over, the record which invoked the trigger is ready to undergo a disposition change according to the type of this trigger.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ScheduleTrigger.DelayType
member.summary: Gets an integer indicating how long after the specified date that this trigger should wait before initiating the disposition change.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ScheduleTrigger.Description
member.summary: Gets a string containing a description of this Trigger. It includes the type of trigger and the date type upon which it is activated, for example: 'Destroy 10 years after Date Inactive'

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ScheduleTrigger.FixedDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the Fixed Trigger Date upon which date the waiting period for this trigger should begin, if it is to begin on a fixed date. This property is only activated when the SchTrigger.DateType property is set to 'tgTriggerTypes.tgFixedDate'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ScheduleTrigger.IsForDestroy
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether this SchTrigger is a destroy trigger

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ScheduleTrigger.Jurisdiction
member.summary: Gets and sets the jurisdiction of this schedule trigger.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ScheduleTrigger.PolicyCentreGUID
member.summary: Gets or sets a GUID value indicating the unique identifier for this retention schedule trigger in the Policy Center integration rule list

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ScheduleTrigger.PolicyCentreMappingGUID
member.summary: Gets or sets a GUID value indicating the unique identifier for this retention schedule trigger in the Policy Center integration rule mapping list

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ScheduleTrigger.PolicyCentreNotes
member.summary: Gets or sets a string value indicating the disposal event/action associated with this retention schedule trigger in the Policy Center integration

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ScheduleTrigger.PolicyCentreTitle
member.summary: Gets or sets a string value indicating the title of this retention schedule trigger in the Policy Center integration

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ScheduleTrigger.Rounding
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount the scheduled date is to be adjusted by rounding up to the end of the appropriate period as indicated in the triggerRounding enumeration.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ScheduleTrigger.TransferTo
member.summary: Gets or sets a Location object that indicates where the new custodian of the records once they have been transferred.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ScheduleTrigger.TriggerType
member.summary: Gets or sets a rdRecordDisp enum value indicating the type of disposition change this trigger should perform. That is, it represents the new disposition a record should acquire after the waiting period triggered by the date event defined in DateType property has been reached.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ScheduleTrigger.TriggerTypeDescription
member.summary: Gets a string containing a summary description of this retention action trigger.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ScheduleTrigger.UserDefinedDate
member.summary: Gets or sets a FieldDefinition object of type DateTime. The value of this user defined date for records using this trigger's Retention Schedule determines the date the waiting period for the trigger should begin, if it is to begin according to a user defined date. This property is only activated when the SchTrigger.DateType property is set to 'tgTriggerTypes.tgUserDefined'.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ScheduleTriggers.getItem(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Gets the item in this child list at the nominated index.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ScheduleTriggers.New
member.summary: Initialises a new object of this child object collection

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ScheduleTriggers.Parent
member.summary: Gets the parent object of this child object collection

member.name: T:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SearchClauseDef
member.summary: A helper class that allows you to determine generic capabilities of any of the search clauses defined for selecting TRIM objects in the TRIM object model.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SearchClauseDef.#ctor(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SearchClauseIds,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database)
member.summary: Constructs an SearchClauseDef object based on the specified SearchClauseIds enumeration value. This form of constructor allows you to specify a database which is used to retrieve customised captions.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SearchClauseDef.Id
member.summary: Gets an integer containing the unique search clause identifier for this search clause definition.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SearchClauseDef.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the name for this search clause. The name is used when constructing a search string containing one or more search clauses. Note that to set a name, this search clause must have been constructed with a valid Database parameter. To make name changes permanent, call the SaveCaptionChanges method of the database

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SearchClauseDef.Icon
member.summary: Gets the identifier of the TRIM icon associated with this search clause.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SearchClauseDef.InternalName
member.summary: Gets a string containing the internal name for this search clause. It will be the same as the Name property unless there has been a customisation done for this database.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SearchClauseDef.Caption
member.summary: Gets or sets a caption for this search clause. This is usually the caption for the associated property, where the clause is based on that property. In other cases, this is a short but more user friendly name for the search clause.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SearchClauseDef.GetTooltip(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.BaseObjectTypes)
member.summary: Gets a string containing a tool tip for this search clause.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SearchClauseDef.GetParametersTooltip(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.BaseObjectTypes)
member.summary: Gets a string containing a tool tip about the parameters required for this search clause.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SearchClauseDef.CanSort(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.BaseObjectTypes)
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating whether this search clause can be used a sort criteria for searching for the specified object type.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SearchClauseDef.GetSortTooltip(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.BaseObjectTypes)
member.summary: Gets a string containing a tool tip when using this search clause for sorting.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SearchClauseDef.IsRelevantForType(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.BaseObjectTypes)
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating whether this search clause is relevant for the nominated type of TRIM object.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SearchClauseDef.IsAvailableForType(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.BaseObjectTypes)
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating whether this search clause is available for the nominated type of TRIM object. If the function returns false, the ErrorMessage property will contain an informational message indicating why the search method is unavailable.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SearchClauseDef.IsActivatedForType(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.BaseObjectTypes)
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating whether this search clause is available for the nominated type of TRIM object. It also checks if it is linked to a product feature and whether that product feature is activated. If the function returns false, the ErrorMessage property will contain an informational message indicating why the search method is unavailable.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SearchClauseDef.OnlyForType
member.summary: Gets a BaseObjectTypes enumeration value indicating the specific object type this search clause belongs to. If the search clause is a generic one (i.e. it applies to more than one object type), a value of Unknown will be returned.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SearchClauseDef.BasedOnProperty
member.summary: Gets a PropertyIds enumeration value indicating the object property that is associated with this search clause. Many search clauses are simply based on selecting a value for a particular property, some are not specifically associated with a property (in which case the Unknown value will be returned.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SearchClauseDef.MethodGroup
member.summary: Gets a SearchClauseGroup enumeration value indicating the particlar group of search clauses that this clause belongs to. Search clauses grouped in this way to aid in presentation, in some cases.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SearchClauseDef.ParameterFormat
member.summary: Gets a PropertyFormats enumeration value indicating the format of the data value that needs to be provided when using this search clause for searching.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SearchClauseDef.GetObjectTypeParameter(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.BaseObjectTypes)
member.summary: Gets a BaseObjectTypes enumeration value indicating the type of object that needs to be supplied as a data value when search by this search clause. Is only relevant when the ParameterFormat is of type Object.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SearchClauseDef.GetEnumTypeParameter
member.summary: Gets an AllEnumerations enumeration value indicating the TRIM enum that is associated with a search is being made by this search clause. Is only relevant when the ParameterFormat is of type Enum.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SearchClauseDef.NeedsAccessControlTypeParameter
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating whether this search clause needs the additional AccessControlType parameter.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SearchClauseDef.NeedsSubQueryObjectTypeParameter
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating whether this search clause needs the additional SubQueryObjectType parameter.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SearchClauseDef.NeedsRelationshipTypeParameter
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating whether this search clause needs the additional SubQueryRelationshipType parameter.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SearchClauseDef.IsBlocked(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.BaseObjectTypes)
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating whether this search clause has been blocked by the administrator for the current user

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SearchClauseDef.FindSearchClauseIdFromString(System.String,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.BaseObjectTypes,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database)
member.summary: Gets an SearchClauseIds enumeration value from a search string name. Returns Unknown if there is no matching search clause available for the nominated TRIM object type. This form also allows you to supply a Database in order that any customised search strings will be examined.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SearchClauseDef.GetAllSearchClauseIds(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.BaseObjectTypes,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database)
member.summary: Constructs an array of all SearchClauseIds for the nominated object type.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SearchClauseDef.GetAllSearchClauseIds(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.BaseObjectTypes,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Constructs an array of all SearchClauseIds for the nominated object type, providing an option to exclude methods that have been blocked for the current user

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SearchClauseDef.GetSearchClauseIdsForGroup(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.BaseObjectTypes,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SearchClauseGroup,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database)
member.summary: Constructs an array of SearchClauseIds for the nominated object type and within the specified group.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SearchClauseDef.GetSearchClauseIdsForGroup(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.BaseObjectTypes,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SearchClauseGroup,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Constructs an array of SearchClauseIds for the nominated object type and within the specified group, providing an option to exclude methods that have been blocked for the current user

members.member: Note that the IEnumerator documentation requires an InvalidOperationException to be thrown whenever the collection is modified. This has been done for changes in the size of the collection but not when one of the elements of the collection is modified as it is a bit tricky to detect unmanaged code that modifies the collection under our feet.

member.name: T:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SearchForm
member.summary: A search form contains a definition of the search methods and layout to be used by the Content Manager Web Client when searching for a particular type of object

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SearchForm.Definition
member.summary: Gets a xml string which defines the search methods that will be provided with this search form.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SearchForm.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets a string value that provides a more detailed explanation of when this search form should be used and by whom

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SearchForm.FactoryDefinition
member.summary: Gets a xml string which defines the factory default search form that would be used for the search form.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SearchForm.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets a string value uniquely identifying this search form

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SearchForm.ObjectType
member.summary: Gets a BaseObjectTypes enum value indicating the type of object this search form is designed to retrieve.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SearchUserOptions.#ctor(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database)
member.summary: Constructor for the SearchUserOptions option set.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SearchUserOptions.IsOptionRelevantFor(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.PropertyIds,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.BaseObjectTypes)
member.summary: determines if the specified search option is relevant for using with searches for the nominated object type

member.name: T:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SecurityCaveat
member.summary: A privacy control allowing Records to be marked as requiring users to ave the corresponding control before being given access

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SecurityCaveat.Abbreviation
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the abbreviation for this Security Caveat (for example, SiC for Staff in Confidence)

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SecurityCaveat.CaveatNumber
member.summary: Gets a unique number identifying this security caveat. This number is allocated automatically when a new security caveat is created and is used internally as part of the security filtering algorithm.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SecurityCaveat.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing a description of this Security Caveat.

member.name: T:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SecurityGuide
member.summary: Describes standard security settings which can be used in specialised security scenarios

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SecurityGuide.Declassify
member.summary: Gets a string containing details of the declassification process for records using this Security Guide Entry. These details are determined by the value of the SecurityGuide.DeclassifyType property and the relevant values of the DeclassifyEvent, DeclassifyYears, DeclassifyExemption or DeclassifyDate properties.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SecurityGuide.DeclassifyDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the date upon which records using this Security Guide Entry should be declassified. The SecurityGuide.DeclassifyType must be set to 'DeclassifyType.Exempt' to activate this property.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SecurityGuide.DeclassifyEvent
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing a description of the event upon which records using this Security Guide Entry should be declassified. The SecurityGuide.DeclassifyType must be set to 'DeclassifyType.AfterEvent' to activate this property.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SecurityGuide.DeclassifyExemption
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the reason for this record to be exempt from declassification. The SecurityGuide.DeclassifyType must be set to 'DeclassifyType.AfterDate' to activate this property.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SecurityGuide.DeclassifyYears
member.summary: Gets or sets a number indicating the number of years after publication that records using this Security Guide Entry should be declassified. The SecurityGuide.DeclassifyType must be set to 'DeclassifyType.AfterDate' to activate this property.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SecurityGuide.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing a description for this Security Guide Entry.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SecurityGuide.EntryReference
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the reference number identifying the Security Guide Entry corresponding to this SecurityGuide object.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SecurityGuide.Reason
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the reason for applying this Security Guide Entry to a record.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SecurityGuide.SecurityString
member.summary: Gets or sets a string listing the security level and security caveats assigned to this Security Guide, delimited by commas ','. The first element listed is always the security level, followed by the caveats.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SecurityGuide.TypeOfDeclassification
member.summary: Gets or sets a DeclassifyType enum value indicating the type of declassification that should occur to records using this Security Guide Entry. The values are 'dcExempt' for which the record should be exempt from declassification (the reason for this held in the DeclassifyExemption property); 'dcAfterDate' for which the record should be declassified after a specified date or a specified number of years after publication (the date for this held in the DeclassifyDate property, or number of years in the DeclassifyYears property); or 'dcAfterEvent' for which the record should be declassified after a specified event (details of the specific event held in the DeclassifyEvent property)

members.member: Note that the IEnumerator documentation requires an InvalidOperationException to be thrown whenever the collection is modified. This has been done for changes in the size of the collection but not when one of the elements of the collection is modified as it is a bit tricky to detect unmanaged code that modifies the collection under our feet.

member.name: T:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SecurityLevel
member.summary: A hierarchical security indicator that can be associated with Records and Locations to determine access rights

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SecurityLevel.Abbreviation
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the abbreviation for this Security Level (for example, TS for Top Secret).

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SecurityLevel.LevelNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets a unique number indicating the ranking of this Security Level. This number must be in the range 1 to 99, and establishes the order of precedence.A greater number represents a higher Security Level.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SecurityLevel.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing a description of the Security Level.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SecurityLevel.DeleteEx(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SecurityLevel)
member.summary: If you specify a NULL replacement parameter, all items using this security level will be set to 0 (lowest security level).

member.name: F:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ServerMessageTypes.DbNoNewConnections
member.summary: Dataset is not accepting any new connections

member.summary: Indicates that an application is not running as a service

member.name: F:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ServiceTypes.WindowsService
member.summary: Indicates that an application is running as a Windows Service

member.name: F:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.ServiceTypes.WebService
member.summary: Indicates that an application is running as a Web Service

member.name: T:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SharePointItem
member.summary: Describes a SharePoint Document that is managed by Content Manager SharePoint Integration

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SharePointItem.#ctor(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database,HP.HPTRIM.SDK.TrimURI)
member.summary: Construct a new SharePoint Item to be managed by the nominated record

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SharePointItem.IsDocument
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether the SharePoint item is a downloadable document.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SharePointItem.ItemURL
member.summary: Gets the URL representing a hyperlink to the SharePoint document.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SharePointItem.ListGUID
member.summary: Gets the GUID representing the SharePoint List containing this SharePoint document.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SharePointItem.ListItemId
member.summary: Gets a number indicating the Item ID within the SharePoint List for the SharePoint document.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SharePointItem.ListItemRecord
member.summary: Gets a Record object representing the List Item Record for the SharePoint document.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SharePointItem.ListRecord
member.summary: Gets a Record object representing the SharePoint List that the SharePoint document belongs to.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SharePointItem.ListType
member.summary: Gets a string describing the type of SharePoint List that contains this SharePoint document.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SharePointItem.ListURL
member.summary: Gets the URL representing a hyperlink to the SharePoint List containing this SharePoint document.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SharePointItem.ModifiedTitle
member.summary: Gets a string describing a modification to the title of the SharePoint Document.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SharePointItem.Originator
member.summary: Gets or sets an spListItemOriginator enumerated value to indicate the origin of the SharePoint document.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SharePointItem.Relationship
member.summary: Gets or sets a string describing various details of the relationship between the Content Manager List Item Record and the related SharePoint list item. Details will vary depending on the type of list item.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SharePointItem.Status
member.summary: Gets or sets an spManagedItemStatus enumerated value to indicate the SharePoint managed item status.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SharePointItem.SynchPending
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether this SharePoint item needs synchronization with the Content Manager List Item Record. Take care in calling accessing property as it will always do a round trip the the %R_workgroup% to evaluate the status.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SharePointItem.UniqueId
member.summary: Gets a string containing the unique identifier of this SharePoint document.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SharePointItem.Viewable
member.summary: Gets a boolean property indicating if the current user has access rights to view the metadata of the record associated with this SharePoint item.

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SharePointItem.ResetSynchronizationFlag
member.summary: Reset the Synchronization flag used by the SharePoint event processor

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SharePointItem.InitSpUniqueIdAndProperties(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes the unique SharePoint identifier of the SharePoint List Item. It is only used by the SharePoint 8.1 Conversion utility

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SharePointItem.Relocate
member.summary: Relocate is a method you can use to transfer the item from SharePoint to HPE Content Manager. Relocate will extract the document from SharePoint and copy it to HP RM, then remove the links back into SharePoint. This SharePointItemobject will effectively be removed after a relocate

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SharePointItem.ReindexContent
member.summary: Request that the record associated with this SharePoint item have the content be reindexed due to a change in the underlying content in the SharePoint item

member.name: T:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SortAndFilterUserOptions
member.summary: Default Sort and Filters|Default search sorting and filtering (SortAndFilterUserOptions)

member.name: M:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SortAndFilterUserOptions.#ctor(HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Database)
member.summary: Constructor for the SortAndFilterUserOptions option set.

member.name: T:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Space
member.summary: Represents a location for long term archival storage of physical records, typically within a warehouse

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Space.AdvancedUsageDetails
member.summary: Gets a string containing a description of the usage of this space. Includes advanced calculations.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Space.Available
member.summary: Gets a number indicating the number of records that may still be added to this space (including lower level spaces) before it reaches its total capacity. The total capacity of this space is held in the Space.Capacity property. The total number of records that are already stored in this space and its lower level spaces is held in the Space.Used property.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Space.Capacity
member.summary: Gets or sets a number indicating the total capacity of this space level. That is, the total number of records that can be stored within this space including all spaces within this selected space level. The number of records that are already stored in this space is held in the Space.Used property. The number of records that may still be added to this space is held in the Space.Available property.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Space.Description
member.summary: Gets a string containing a description of this Space object, which consists of its Level Name and Number. For example, 'Area 1' or 'Slot 4'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Space.DestroyedAllBays
member.summary: Gets an integer indicating how many records from all holding bays within this selected space level have been destroyed. That is, the number of records with the holding bay of this space or any of its lower levels as home location that have a disposition of 'Destroyed'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Space.DestroyedInBay
member.summary: Gets a number indicating how many records within the holding bay for this space have been destroyed. That is, the number of records with the holding bay of this space as home location that have a disposition of 'Destroyed'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Space.DestroyedRecords
member.summary: Gets a number indicating how many records within this space have been destroyed. That is, the number of records with this space as home location that have a disposition of 'Destroyed'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Space.ForeignBarcode
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing an external organization's barcode for this Space. This property may be used in conjunction with a barcode scanner in 'Set Home Location' mode to transfer records into this storage location.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Space.FullDescription
member.summary: Gets a string containing a full description of this space, including the hierarchy it belongs to. For example, 'Warehouse 1, Floor 3, Bay 7.'

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Space.HasHoldingBay
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether this space has a holding bay. A holding bay is a temporary storage place where records may be held until they are ready to be transferred.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Space.IsCaptioned
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether this level has been captioned. That is, if the title of this level has been customized by the user. Use the Content Manager client interface to change the level captions.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Space.IsLowestLevel
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether this space is the lowest level in the Space System. If it is the lowest level, it will not contain any spaces. Use the Space.CreateLowerLevels method to create new lower levels for this Space.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Space.Level
member.summary: Gets a slSpaceLevel enum value indicating the level name of this space. The values are: Warehouse, Floor, Area, Bay, Row, Shelf, Slot.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Space.NickName
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the unique name for this Space object. This is the Quick Search Key by which this space may be identified in a Content Manager search. It is left empty by default.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Space.NodeAvailable
member.summary: Gets a number indicating the number of records that may still be added to this space (including lower level spaces) before it reaches its total capacity. The total capacity of this space is held in the Space.Capacity property. The total number of records that are already stored in this space and its lower level spaces is held in the Space.Used property.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Space.NodeCapacity
member.summary: Gets or sets a number indicating the total capacity of this space level. That is, the total number of records that can be stored within this space including all spaces within this selected space level. The number of records that are already stored in this space is held in the Space.Used property. The number of records that may still be added to this space is held in the Space.Available property.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Space.NodeUsed
member.summary: Gets a number indicating the number of records that are currently stored in this space including all spaces within this selected space level. The number of records that may still be added to this space is held in the Space.Available property. The total capacity of this space is held in the Space.Capacity property.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Space.Number
member.summary: Gets a string containing the number of this space. The number differentiates this space from the other spaces of the same level which are contained within the same parent space. By default the first new lower level created will have a value of 0001, unless the numbering is started at a different value at the time of lower level creation. For example, the 1st row of the 3rd area of the 2nd Warehouse created will have a default number of '0002-0003-0001'.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Space.RecordsActualAllBays
member.summary: Gets a number indicating how many records are actually in any holding bays within this selected space level. That is, the number of records with the holding bay for this space or any of its lower levels as home location which are currently assigned to the holding bay.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Space.RecordsActuallyAtHome
member.summary: Gets an integer indicating how many records are actually at home. That is, the number of records with this Space as their home location which are currently assigned to this space.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Space.RecordsActuallyInBay
member.summary: Gets an integer indicating how many records are actually in the holding bay for this space. That is, the number of records with the holding bay for this space as home location which are currently assigned to the holding bay.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Space.RecordsAdded2YearsAgo
member.summary: Gets a number indicating how many records were added to this space during the calendar year previous to last year (i.e. two years ago).

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Space.RecordsAddedLastYear
member.summary: Gets a number indicating how many records were added to this space within the previous calendar year.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Space.RecordsAddedThisYear
member.summary: Gets a number indicating how many records have been added to this space since the beginning of this year.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Space.RecordsAllBays
member.summary: Gets a number indicating how many records are stored in all holding bays within this selected level. That is, the number of records with the holding bay for this space or any of its lower levels as home location.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Space.RecordsAtHome
member.summary: Gets an integer indicating how many records have this Space object as home location.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Space.RecordsInHoldingBay
member.summary: Gets an integer indicating how many records have the holding bay for this space as home location. A holding bay is a temporary storage place where records may be held until they are ready to be transferred. This space has a holding bay if the Space.HasHoldingBay property is set to true.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Space.RecordsLoanAllBays
member.summary: Gets a number indicating how many records are on loan from all holding bays within this selected space level. That is, the number of records with the holding bay for this space or any of its lower levels as home location which are not currently assigned to the holding bay.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Space.RecordsOut
member.summary: Gets a number indicating how many records are currently out on loan. That is, the number of records with this Space as their home location which are currently not assigned to this space.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Space.RecordsOutOfBay
member.summary: Gets a number indicating how many records belonging in the holding bay for this space are out on loan. That is, the number of records with the holding bay for this space as home location which are not currently assigned to the holding bay.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Space.UsageDetails
member.summary: Gets a string containing a description of the usage of this space. This includes information about the total capacity of this space, remaining capacity available, total records allocated, and records allocated to a holding bay.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Space.Used
member.summary: Gets a number indicating the number of records that are currently stored in this space including all spaces within this selected space level. The number of records that may still be added to this space is held in the Space.Available property. The total capacity of this space is held in the Space.Capacity property.

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.Space.Within
member.summary: Gets the Space object which is the parent level within which this space is contained. If this space is a top-level space, a null value will be returned.

member.name: F:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SpaceAllocation.Contiguous
member.summary: To contiguous set of lowest level Spaces

member.name: F:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SpaceRecordsSelection.InBay
member.summary: All Records in the Holding Bay for this Space

member.name: F:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SpaceRecordsSelection.InSpaceRecursive
member.summary: All Records in lowest level Spaces of this Space

member.name: F:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SpaceRecordsSelection.InBayRecursive
member.summary: All Records in the Holding Bays for this Space and any lower level Holding Bays

member.name: F:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.SpaceRecordsSelection.InEitherRecursive
member.summary: All Records in this Space and any lower levels (including Holding Bays)

member.name: T:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.StopWord
member.summary: A word that will not be indexed when Content Manager indexes long text strings (e.g. for a Record title word search)

member.name: P:HP.HPTRIM.SDK.StopWord.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the stop word itself. This is a word that will not be indexed by Content Manager if the word appears in a record title or Notes field.

members.member: Note that the IEnumerator documentation requires an InvalidOperationException to be thrown whenever the collection is modified. This has been done for changes in the size of the collection but not when one of the elements of the collection is modified as it is a bit tricky to detect unmanaged code that modifies the collection under our feet.
